False Appearance.name: 拟形
False Appearance.description: 当[[lookup @name lowercase]] 静止不动时，它看起来和无生命的雕像一样

Faultless Tracker.name: 完美追踪者
Faultless Tracker.description: 唤醒[[lookup @name lowercase]的生物会变成它的猎物，只要[[lookup @name lowercase]还没被摧毁，且该猎物身处德拉肯海姆，[[lookup @name lowercase]就可以知晓其猎物所在的方位和距离。

Rejuvenation.name: 复生
Rejuvenation.description: 若[[lookup @name lowercase]]被摧毁，其在 1 小时后恢复所有生命值，除非对其残骸施展@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplDisintegra]{Disintegrate}

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]]发动一次[[/item .xSBZX1FfBpnaeNml]]攻击和一次[[/item .MYvmkUBJOrsQEqXa]]攻击。

Bite.name: 啃咬
Bite.description: [[/attack extended]]。[[/damage extended]]。

Delerium Dust.name: 妄质尘
Delerium Dust.description: 感知豁免检定：DC 13，[[lookup @name lowercase]] 30 尺空间爆发内的每个生物。失败：[[/damage average]]伤害，并且目标陷入&reference[Addled]状态（豁免解除）。

Delerium Dust.name: 妄质尘
Delerium Dust.description: 你陷入&reference[Addled]状态。你可以在自己每一回合结束时重复进行针对此效应的豁免检定，成功则终止该效应。

Hypnotic Flutter.name: 催眠振翅
Hypnotic Flutter.description: 智力豁免检定：DC 13，[[lookup @name lowercase]] 60 尺空间爆发内能看见它的每名生物（[[lookup @name lowercase]] 自动成功）。失败：目标陷入 &reference[Slowed] 状态（豁免解除）。如果目标已处于迟缓状态，则改为陷入 &reference[Immobilized] 状态（豁免解除）。如果目标已陷入禁锢状态，则还会陷入 &reference[Incapacitated] 状态（两者均豁免解除）。

Hypnotic Flutter: Slowed.name: 催眠振翅：迟缓
Hypnotic Flutter: Slowed.description: 你陷入&reference[slowed apply=false]状态。你可以在自己每一回合结束时重复进行针对此效应的豁免检定，成功则终止该效应。

Hypnotic Flutter: Immobilized.name: 催眠振翅：禁锢
Hypnotic Flutter: Immobilized.description: 你陷入&reference[immobilized apply=false]状态。你可以在自己每一回合结束时重复进行针对此效应的豁免检定，成功则终止该效应。

Hypnotic Flutter: Immobilized & Incapaci.name: 催眠振翅：禁锢与失能
Hypnotic Flutter: Immobilized & Incapaci.description: 你陷入&reference[immobilized apply=false]和&reference[incapacitated apply=false]状态。你可以在自己每一回合结束时重复进行针对此效应的豁免检定，成功则终止该效应。

Proboscis.name: 吸喙
Proboscis.description:
[[/attack extended]]。[[/damage extended]]。如果目标陷入 &reference[Incapacitated apply=false]状态，其智力属性将降低 [[/r 1d4]]，直至其完成一次短休或长休。如果此效果使目标的智力属性降至 0，则该目标死亡。

Foundry Note

此攻击具有多个不同的主动效应，用于在降低目标智力时应用。请使用“智力吸取”小队来掷 d4 并应用相应版本的主动效应。

Intelligence Drain (-1).name: 智力吸取 (-1)
Intelligence Drain (-1).description: 你的智力属性值减少 1，直至你完成一次短休或长休前。若此效应使你的智力属性值降至 0，你将死亡。

Intelligence Drain (-2).name: 智力吸取 (-2)
Intelligence Drain (-2).description: 你的智力属性值减少 2，直至你完成一次短休或长休前。若该效应使你的智力属性值降至 0，则你死亡。

Intelligence Drain (-3).name: 智力吸取 (-3)
Intelligence Drain (-3).description: 你的智力属性值减少 3，直至你完成一次短休或长休前。若该效应使你的智力属性值降至 0，则你死亡。

Intelligence Drain (-4).name: 智力吸取 (-4)
Intelligence Drain (-4).description: 你的智力属性值减少 4，直至你完成一次短休或长休前。若该效应使你的智力属性值降至 0，则你死亡。

Blood Scent.name: 血腥感知
Blood Scent.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]]在为搜寻非构装或亡灵生物进行的感知（察觉）检定具有优势。它能够自动察觉到自己 10 尺范围内的任何非构装或亡灵生物。

Soulbinding Mace.name: 缚魂钉头锤
Soulbinding Mace.description: [[/attack extended]] [[/damage extended]] 魅力豁免检定：DC 13。失败：目标陷入&reference[Jinxed]状态（1d6；豁免终止）。

Jinxed (1d6).name: 厄运（1d6）
Jinxed (1d6).description: 你在攻击检定和豁免上减 1d6。你可以在自己每一回合结束时重复进行针对此效应的豁免检定，成功则终止该效应。

Abyssal Pull.name: 深渊拖拽
Abyssal Pull.description: [[/attack extended]]。[[/damage extended]]，且目标向食尸鬼领主方向移动至多 15 尺。

Unyielding.name: 坚韧
Unyielding.description: 触发：[[lookup @name lowercase]]受到迫使它移动、使其陷入&reference[Prone]状态，或者两者兼有的效应影响。响应：[[lookup @name lowercase]]既不会被强制移动，也不会陷入&reference[Prone]状态。

utility.condition: 当食尸鬼领主受到迫使它移动、使其陷入倒地状态的效应影响时

Shield Slam.name: 盾牌猛击
Shield Slam.description: 力量豁免检定：DC 14，[[lookup @name lowercase]] 5 尺范围内的一个生物。失败：目标从[[lookup @name lowercase]]身边被推离 10 尺，且陷入&reference[Prone]状态。

Shield.name: Shield
Shield.description: You gain the Armor Class benefit of a Shield only if you have training with it.

Psychic Barrage.name: Psychic Barrage
Psychic Barrage.description: Intelligence Saving Throw: DC 17, up to three creatures the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within 60 feet. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &reference[Jinxed] condition (1d8; save ends). Success: Half damage only.

Jinxed (1d8).name: Jinxed (1d8)
Jinxed (1d8).description: 你在攻击检定和豁免上减 1d8。你可以在自己每一回合结束时重复进行针对此效应的豁免检定，成功则终止该效应。

Thought Shield.name: Thought Shield
Thought Shield.description: Trigger: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] or a creature it can see fails a saving throw or is hit by an attack. Response: The target rolls 1d6 and adds the result to its AC or saving throw, potentially turning a hit into a miss or a failure into a success.

utility.condition: When the host or a creature it can see fails a saving throw or is hit by an attack.

Detect Thoughts.name: 侦测思想
Detect Thoughts.description:
你激活下述效应之一。直到法术结束为止，你可以在你随后的回合用一个魔法动作以激活下述任意效应之一。

感知思想。 你感知距你 30 尺内，知晓语言或能够心灵感应的思想的存在。你并不会阅读这些思想，但你知道这里存在一名有理智的生物。

此法术会被 1 尺厚的岩石、泥土或木头，1 寸厚的金属，或薄薄一层铅阻隔。

阅读思想。 选择一名距你 30 尺内的可见生物，或一名距你 30 尺内被感知思想侦测到的生物。你了解到此时目标最关心的事情。如果目标不知晓任何语言也不会心灵感应，则你不能得到任何信息。

在你的下一回合，用一个魔法动作，你可以尝试深入目标的心灵。如果你选择这么做，目标进行一次感知豁免。豁免失败，则你了解到他的逻辑推理、情绪状态以及他头脑中的一些大事（比如忧虑、挚爱和仇恨的事物）。豁免成功，法术终止。无论哪种情况，目标都会知道你正在窥探其心灵，且直到你的注意力从它的心灵上移开为止，目标均可以在其回合内使用动作进行一次 [[/check ability=int skill=arc dc=@attributes.spelldc]] 检定，对抗你的法术豁免DC，目标胜出对抗时，法术终止。

Invisible Mage Hand.name: Invisible Mage Hand
Invisible Mage Hand.description:
一只漂浮的幽灵手出现在施法距离内你指定的一点。幽灵手持续存在至法术终止。如果幽灵手距你的距离超过 30 尺，或者当你再次施展了该法术时，则现存的幽灵手消失不见。

你可以在施展该法术时使用幽灵手实施一个行为：你可以操控一个物件，或者打开一扇未上锁的门或容器，或者将一件物品放入或取出一个打开的容器，或者将小瓶中的内容物倾倒出来。

在后续的回合中，以一个魔法动作，你可以控制幽灵手再次实施一个行为。作为那个动作的一部分，你可以令幽灵手移动至多 30 尺。

该幽灵手不能攻击，也不能激活魔法物品或承载超过 10 磅重的物质。

Levitate.name: Levitate
Levitate.description:
指定施法距离内你能看见的一个生物或未固定的物件，使其垂直上升至多 20 尺，并在该处维持悬浮直至持续时间结束。该法术可悬浮一个重量至多 500 磅的目标。一个非自愿的生物可以对法术进行一次体质豁免，若成功将避免受其影响。

目标只能通过推或拉一个固定的物件或平面（例如一面墙或者天花板）来进行移动，这种移动方式视为等同于攀爬。你可以在自己回合里将目标的悬浮高度向上或向下改变至多 20 尺：如果你自身就是该法术的目标，则你可以进行上升和下降并将其作为你移动的一部分；如果你不是该法术的目标，则你可以使用&Reference[magic]{魔法}动作来移动目标，但目标必须始终处于你的施法距离内。

法术终止时，仍处于空中的目标会缓缓飘落到地面。

Levitating.name: Levitating
Levitating.description: The target can move only by pushing or pulling against a fixed object or surface within reach (such as a wall or a ceiling), which allows it to move as if it were climbing.

Suggestion.name: Suggestion
Suggestion.description:
你以魔法影响施法距离内一个你能看见的生物，并对其施以某种行动暗示（不超过 25 个词）。由你指定的受术目标必须能听到并理解你的话语。暗示必须听起来可行，也不涉及明显会对目标及其盟友造成伤害的内容。比如说，你可以说“把邪教的宝库钥匙找来，然后给我。”或者：“别打了，让图书馆保持安静，然后出去别回来。”

目标必须成功通过一次感知豁免，否则在法术持续时间内陷入&Reference[charmed]{魅惑}，若你或你的盟友对其造成伤害此法术将提前结束。被魅惑的生物会尽其所能地执行你所描述的行为。你所暗示的行为可能会在法术持续时间内始终一直进行，而如果你所暗示的活动可以用更短的时间完成，则此法术会在目标完成了你的要求后随即终止。

Pursuing Suggestion.name: Pursuing Suggestion
Pursuing Suggestion.description: The Charmed target pursues the suggestion to the best of its ability. The suggested activity can continue for the entire duration, but if the suggested activity can be completed in a shorter time, the spell ends for the target upon completing it.

Dominate Person.name: 支配类人
Dominate Person.description:
一名法术范围内你可见的类人必须成功于一次感知豁免，否则在持续时间内陷入 &Reference[Charmed apply=false] 状态。若你或你的盟友正在与其战斗，则目标在此豁免上具有优势。目标受到伤害时，可以重复进行豁免，豁免成功则其身上的此法术终止。

该目标被魅惑期间，只要你与其处于同一位面就可以与之保持心灵感应。在你的回合，你可以通过心灵感应命令该生物（无需动作），比如“攻击那个生物”“跑到那个位置”或是“去拿那个物品”。目标完成一项指令却未收到你的进一步指示时，将会凭自身喜好行动，尽可能的保护自己。

你可以用自己的反应去要求目标执行一项反应

升环施法： 使用更高环阶法术位施展时，你的专注能持续更长时间，六环至多 10 分钟，七环至多 1 小时，八环及以上至多 8 小时。

Dominated.name: Dominated
Dominated.description: Whenever the &Reference[charmed apply=false] target takes damage, it repeats the [[/save ability=wis]] save, ending the spell on itself on a success.

Bile Blast.name: Bile Blast
Bile Blast.description: Constitution Saving Throw: DC 14, each creature in a 10-foot cone. Failure: 9 (2d8) Acid damage and are Burning (2d8 Acid). Success: Half damage only.

Burning (2d8 Acid).name: Burning (2d8 Acid)
Burning (2d8 Acid).description:
You are &reference[burning apply=false] from being covered in acid.

  • At the end of each of your turns, you take [[/damage average acid 2d8]] damage.

  • The condition ends if you or another creature within 5 feet of you spends an action to scrape off the acid or if some other effect removes it.

Hurl Fetid Flesh.name: Hurl Fetid Flesh
Hurl Fetid Flesh.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] rips off a chunk of its mutated flesh and hurls it at a point it can see within 120 feet. Constitution Saving Throw: DC 14, each creature within a 10-foot-radius Sphere centered on that point. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage. Success: Half damage.

Regeneration.name: Regeneration
Regeneration.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] regains 10 Hit Points at the start of each of its turns. If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes Cold damage, this trait doesn’t function at the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies only if it starts its turn with 0 Hit Points and doesn’t regenerate.

Sulfurous Belch.name: Sulfurous Belch
Sulfurous Belch.description: Constitution Saving Throw: DC 16, each creature in a 20-foot-radius Sphere centered on the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage and has the &reference[Blinded] condition until it or another creature within 5 of it uses an action to clean the ash from their eyes. Success: Half damage only.

Sulfurous Belch.name: Sulfurous Belch
Sulfurous Belch.description: You are &reference[blinded apply=false] by ash. You or another creature within 5 feet of you can take an action to clean the ash from your eyes, ending this effect.

Fiery Claw.name: Fiery Claw
Fiery Claw.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and the target has the &reference[Burning] condition (4d6 Fire).

Burning (4d6 Fire).name: Burning (4d6 Fire)
Burning (4d6 Fire).description:
You are &reference[burning apply=false] from being covered in fire.

  • At the end of each of your turns, you take [[/damage average fire 4d6]] damage.

  • The condition ends if you or another creature within 5 feet of you spends an action to douse the fire or if some other effect removes it such as submerging yourself in water.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes two [[/item L6LrxugIqsZwHWWK]] attacks and one [[/item xP4fqsRza5T8J5ZO]] attack. It can replace its Volcanic Bite attack with [[/item 2u5tmAsFzpJM9wQc]], if available.

Order Over Chaos.name: Order Over Chaos
Order Over Chaos.description: Whenever the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is present when a roll is made on the Arcane Anomaly, Drakkenheim Madness, or Mutations table, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes an additional roll on the table and chooses which result applies.

Wing Blast.name: Wing Blast
Wing Blast.description: Strength Saving Throw: DC 25, each creature in a 30-foot Cone. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target is pushed up to 20 feet away from the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. Success: Half damage only.

Aberrant Traits.name: Aberrant Traits
Aberrant Traits.description:
Given the contamination and delerium present within the Space Between Worlds, all creatures who dwell there are the product of contamination and unaffected by the normal dangers of delerium. As an aberrant, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has the following traits:

  • Fully Contaminated. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is immune to &reference[drakkenheimContamination] and has Advantage on saving throws against contaminated spells. This creature may cast contaminated spells even though it does not gain Contamination levels.

  • Delerium Healing. As an action, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can touch a delerium shard to regain 10 (3d6) Hit Points. Once the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has used a delerium shard in this way, the shard can't be used in this manner again for 24 hours.

  • Alien Intellect. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is immune to any effect that would sense its emotions or read its thoughts, as well as any divination spell that it refuses. Wisdom (Insight) checks made to ascertain the [[lookup @name lowercase]]s intentions or sincerity have Disadvantage.

Haze Aura.name: Haze Aura
Haze Aura.description: A creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes [[/damage average]] damage.

Epic Boss.name: 史诗 Boss
Epic Boss.description:
This creature is an Epic Boss, a unique foe designed to pose a solo threat to an entire adventuring party. As such, it has additional game rules that sets it apart from normal creatures:

The [[lookup @name lowercase]] always takes their turn on Initiative count 20. On their turn, they can use their movement and interaction as normal. However, they do not take an action or Bonus Action on their turn unless forced to do so by a spell or other effect. Instead, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes one of the following Epic Actions at the end of each player character's turn.

All this creature's actions are Epic Actions.

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.2AbJFoacX0UZf45m.Item.LeSn0uTS2Q0scq1L]{Bite}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.2AbJFoacX0UZf45m.Item.7HcFiFw1UjAORwqS]{Claw}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.2AbJFoacX0UZf45m.Item.hGgkBTrkpTy5Fnpj]{Tail}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.2AbJFoacX0UZf45m.Item.QlLejsiksoqmGsng]{Mindfire}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.2AbJFoacX0UZf45m.Item.5WKziAPYyTeFapj7]{Wing Blast}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.2AbJFoacX0UZf45m.Item.qLv8mfNHpJkIiPjZ]{Terrifying Roar}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.2AbJFoacX0UZf45m.Item.A6en4nt8LWprbsHk]{Breathe Deep}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.2AbJFoacX0UZf45m.Item.fCSUpTgTabF0uutq]{Breath Weapon}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.2AbJFoacX0UZf45m.Item.UvBVX28gdwyd2HVa]{Spellcasting}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.2AbJFoacX0UZf45m.Item.4hmVOYn3DPbkA8rK]{Epic Resistance}

Epic Boss.name: 史诗 Boss
Epic Boss.description:
This creature is an Epic Boss, a unique foe designed to pose a solo threat to an entire adventuring party. As such, it has additional game rules that sets it apart from normal creatures.

The creature always takes their turn on Initiative count 20. On their turn, they can use their movement and interaction as normal. However, they do not take an action or Bonus Action on their turn unless forced to do so by a spell or other effect. Instead, the creature takes one of the Epic Actions they have available.

Epic Resistance.name: Epic Resistance
Epic Resistance.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] chooses one condition, spell, or other effect currently affecting them and rolls [[/r 1d20]]. On an 11 or higher, the effect ends on them. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can use this Epic Action even if they would otherwise be unable to take actions, their actions are being controlled by another creature, or if a spell or effect alters their game statistics.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and if the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it has the &reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC 26). While Grappled, the target has the &reference[Restrained] condition.

Grappled by Bite.name: Grappled by Bite
Grappled by Bite.description: You are &reference[grappled apply=false] (escape DC 26). While grappled in this way, you are also &reference[restrained apply=false].

Tail.name: Tail
Tail.description: Strength Saving Throw: DC 26, one creature within 20 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and if the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it has the &reference[Prone] condition.

Mindfire.name: Mindfire
Mindfire.description: Wisdom Saving Throw: DC 25, one creature the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within 120 feet. Failure: The target takes [[/damage average]] damage and has the &reference[Burning] condition (2d8 Psychic). Success: Half damage only.

Burning (2d8 Psychic).name: Burning (2d8 Psychic)
Burning (2d8 Psychic).description:
You are &reference[burning apply=false] from being covered in psychic fire.

  • At the end of each of your turns, you take [[/damage average psychic 2d8]] damage.

  • The condition ends if you or another creature within 5 feet of you spends an action to douse the psychic flames or if some other effect removes it.

Spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
Spellcasting.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts one of the spells it knows, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 22, +14 to spell attacks).

Breathe Deep.name: Breathe Deep
Breathe Deep.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s Breath Weapon recharges. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can only use this Epic Action if it's the first Epic Action it has taken this round.

Terrifying Roar.name: Terrifying Roar
Terrifying Roar.description: Wisdom Saving Throw: DC 25, each creature in a 120-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]] that can hear it. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &reference[Frightened] condition (save ends).

Terrifying Roar.name: Terrifying Roar
Terrifying Roar.description: 你陷入&reference[frightened apply=false]状态。你可以在自己每一回合结束时重复进行针对此效应的豁免检定，成功则终止该效应。

Breath Weapon.name: Breath Weapon
Breath Weapon.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can only use this Epic Action if it’s the last Epic Action it takes this round. It chooses one of the following effects:

  • Octarine Breath. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] breathes a 120-foot cone of prismatic rays. Each ray is a different color and has a different power and purpose. Choose one ability score, then choose Cold, Fire, Lightning, Necrotic, Psychic, or Radiant damage. Each target must succeed on a DC 25 saving throw using the chosen ability score; it takes [[/damage 30d6 average]] damage of the chosen type on a failed saving throw, or half as much on a successful one.

  • Mutation Breath. Constitution Saving Throw: DC 25, each creature in a 120-foot Cone. Failure: [[/damage average activity=SwA8rsAJ8l7kUJtv]] damage, and the target gains one &reference[drakkenheimContamination] level. Instead of rolling to determine if it gains a mutation, the target automatically gains a mutation. Success: Half damage only.

  • Madness Breath. Intelligence Saving Throw: DC 25, each creature in a 120-foot Cone. Failure: [[/damage average activity=XP1bjOnPtpgalyG6]] damage, and the target has the &reference[Dazed] condition (save ends). Failure by 5 or More: [[/damage average 24d10 psychic]] damage, and the target instead has the &reference[Incapacitated] condition (save ends). Success: Half damage only.

  • Wild Magic Breath. Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 25, each creature in a 120-foot long, 5-foot wide Line. Failure: [[/damage average activity=e6BCIDaJZTBLpmP5]] damage, and the target triggers an Arcane Anomaly centered on itself. Success: Half damage only.

Madness Breath: Dazed.name: Madness Breath: Dazed
Madness Breath: Dazed.description: 你陷入&reference[dazed apply=false]状态。你可以在自己每一回合结束时重复进行针对此效应的豁免检定，成功则终止该效应。

Madness Breath: Incapacitated.name: Madness Breath: Incapacitated
Madness Breath: Incapacitated.description: 你陷入&reference[incapacitated apply=false]状态。你可以在自己每一回合结束时重复进行针对此效应的豁免检定，成功则终止该效应。

Draconic Rebuke.name: Draconic Rebuke
Draconic Rebuke.description: Trigger: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] becomes &reference[Bloodied]. It can use this Reaction even if it has the &reference[Incapacitated] condition or is otherwise unable to take Reactions. Response: All conditions and spells on the dragon immediately end unless it chooses to be affected by them, and it can move up to its Fly Speed without provoking Opportunity Attacks and ignoring &reference[DifficultTerrain]. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] recharges and immediately uses its [[/item qLv8mfNHpJkIiPjZ]].

utility.condition: When the dragon becomes bloodied.

Dimension Door.name: Dimension Door
Dimension Door.description:
You teleport to a location within range. You arrive at exactly the spot desired. It can be a place you can see, one you can visualize, or one you can describe by stating distance and direction, such as "200 feet straight downward" or "300 feet upward to the northwest at a 45-degree angle."

You can also teleport one willing creature. The creature must be within 5 feet of you when you teleport, and it teleports to a space within 5 feet of your destination space.

If you, the other creature, or both would arrive in a space occupied by a creature or completely filled by one or more objects, you and any creature traveling with you each take 4d6 Force damage, and the teleportation fails.

Telekinesis.name: 心灵遥控
Telekinesis.description:
你获得以思想移动或操纵生物或物件的能力。你施展法术时或在法术终止前的其后回合中用一个魔法动作，你可以向施法距离内可见的一名生物或一个物件伸展你的意志，造成对应的下述效应。你可以一轮接一轮地影响同一个目标，也可以在任何时候选择一个新的目标。如果你改变了目标，则之前的目标将不再受该法术影响。

生物。 你可以尝试移动一名巨型或更小的生物。目标必须成功于一次力量豁免，否则你可以将其往任意方向移动 30 尺，但不能让它离开施法距离。在你的下个回合结束前，该生物陷入 &Reference[Restrained] 状态，而被你举到空中的生物会在半空中悬停。除非你再次使用此选项且目标失败于豁免，否则被举到空中的生物会在你的下个回合结束坠落。

物件。 你可以尝试移动一个巨型或更小的物件。如果该物品没有被着装或携带，则你可以自动使它朝任何方向移动 30 尺，但不能让它离开施法距离。

如果该物件已被一名生物着装或携带，则那名生物必须成功于一次力量豁免，否则你可以把目标物件从该生物身上拿走，并且使该物体朝任意方向移动 30 尺，但不能让它离开施法距离。

你可以使用心灵遥控对物体进行精密操作，例如操纵一件简单的工具，打开一扇门或一个容器，把东西放进或拿出一个打开的容器中，或是把一个小瓶子里的东西倒出来。

Contact Other Plane.name: Contact Other Plane
Contact Other Plane.description:
你与一名半神、一名古老贤者的亡魂或是其他位面的博学实体建立了精神的连接。与超越人智存在的连接可能会破坏你的心智。当你施展该法术时，进行一次[[/save int dc=15]]豁免。豁免成功时，你可以询问该实体最多五个问题。你必须在法术结束前提出你的问题。DM 将以一个单词回答你的每个问题，例如“是”、“不是”、“可能”、“不可能”、“无关”或“不清楚”（意味着该实体不知道该问题的答案）。如果一个单词的答案会造成误解，DM 可能会用一句短语作为答案。

豁免失败时，你将受到[[/damage 6d6 type=psychic]]伤害并且直到你完成一次长休为止，你陷入&Reference[Incapacitated]{失能}状态。对你施展法术@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplGreaterRes]{高等复原术}将结束该效应。

Dispel Magic.name: 解除魔法
Dispel Magic.description:
在施法距离内指定一名生物、一个物件或一处魔法效应。所有影响该目标的三环或更低环阶法术即告终止。每个影响目标的四环或更高环阶法术都需要以你的施法属性进行一次属性检定（DC 10 + 目标法术环阶），检定成功时目标法术终止。

升环施法： 你直接终止影响目标的小于等于该施法环阶的法术效应。

Scrying.name: 探知术
Scrying.description:
你能看见和听见一个和你处于同一存在位面上的生物。目标生物必须进行一次感知豁免；该豁免的调整值与你对目标的了解程度有关（见下文），也与你和目标之间的物理联系程度有关。目标不知道它进行此豁免在对抗什么，只是会感觉不自在。

你对目标的了解有… 豁免调整值
二手信息（你曾经听说过目标） +5
直接信息（你曾经见过目标） +0
熟悉（你对目标很了解） −5
你持有目标的… 豁免调整值
肖像或其他图像 −2
衣物或其他物品 −4
身体部位如头发或指甲 −10

如果对方豁免成功，则目标不受该法术影响，并且在 24 小时内你不能尝试探知同一个目标。

如果对方豁免失败，则你在目标身边 10 尺内创造出一个隐形的传感器。通过传感器，你可以身临其境地看见和听见周围的环境。传感器会跟随目标移动，并在法术持续时间内始终保持在目标 10 尺之内。在能够看到传感器的生物眼中，你的传感器是一个拳头大小的光球。

除生物之外，你也可以选择一个你以前见过的地点作为该法术的目标。这种情况下，传感器会出现在目标地点且不会移动。

Create Sensor.name: 创造探测器
Create Sensor.target: at target location or within 10 feet of target creature

Self Plane Shift.name: Self Plane Shift
Self Plane Shift.description:
You and up to eight willing creatures who link hands in a circle are transported to a different plane of existence. You can specify a target destination in general terms, such as the City of Brass on the Elemental Plane of Fire or the palace of Dispater on the second level of the Nine Hells, and you appear in or near that destination, as determined by the DM.

Alternatively, if you know the sigil sequence of a teleportation circle on another plane of existence, this spell can take you to that circle. If the teleportation circle is too small to hold all the creatures you transported, they appear in the closest unoccupied spaces next to the circle.

Wish.name: 祈愿术
Wish.description:
祈愿术是凡间生物所能施展的最强大法术。你只需要大声说出自己的愿望就能改变现实世界本身。

法术最基础的用法是用来模仿任意一个八环或更低环阶的法术。如果你以此种方式使用该法术，你不需要满足目标法术所需的任何前提条件（包括有价值的材料成分）就可以让该法术生效。

作为另一种方式，你也可以选择让法术创造下列效应之一：

创造物件。你创造出一个价值不超过 25000GP 的物件，令其出现在地面上你能看见的一处未占据空间中。该物件不能是魔法物品，其在任意方向上的长度都不能超过 300 尺。

即刻治疗。你让你自己和至多二十个你可见的生物恢复全部生命值，并且终止它们身上一切在@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplGreaterRes]{高等复原术}中列举过的所有效应。

伤害抗性。你让至多十个你能看见的生物获得你所指定的一种伤害类型的抗性。此抗性是永久存在的。

免疫法术。你让最多十个你能看见的生物免疫于某道法术或某种其他魔法效应，持续 8 小时。

突来学识。你将你的一个专长替换为符合条件的另一个专长。你失去旧专长带来的全部好处，并获得新专长的好处。你无法取代作为你其他专长或特性先决条件的专长。

重新掷骰。你改变一件刚刚发生的事件。重掷前一轮（包括你的上一个回合）到现在期间的任意一次掷骰，并让现实随着你的新掷骰结果改变。例如，祈愿术以撤销队友的失败豁免或敌人的重击。你可以迫使重新进行的掷骰具有优势或劣势 ，并且可以选择是使用重投后的结果还是使用原来的结果。

重塑现实。你可能会许愿一些没有包含在上述效应中的东西。为了做到这样的效果，请尽可能准确地向地下城主描述你的愿望。在这种情况下，地下城主有极高的自由来裁决究竟会发生什么。不过愿望越大，出错的概率就越大。法术可能会直接失败，也可能部分的达成你想要的结果，还有可能因表述愿望时措辞不当而遭到意想不到的结果。例如，许愿让一个坏人死去可能会让你穿越到多年后该人已死的一个时间段，使你相当于离开了游戏一样。此外，许愿获取一件传说中的魔法物品或神器可能会立即将你传送到该物品当前的持有者身边。如果你许的愿望太过庞大，其效应影响到了社群、区域或是世界，你可能会引来强大的敌人。如果你的愿望会影响神，这名神的神仆会立刻干涉，阻止它或是鼓励你以一种特殊的方式许愿。如果你的愿望将会撤销多元宇宙本身，或是威胁到了印记城，或是以某种方式影响到了痛苦女士，你的心灵中就会浮现出一段她的影像：她摇了摇自己的脑袋，然后你的愿望失效了。

除了模仿其他法术外，施展该法术以达成的任何其他目的都会使你的身躯承受极大的负担，令你变得无比虚弱。承受负担后，直到你完成长休之前，你每次施展法术时都将受到一定伤害（伤害数值取决于你施展的法术的环阶，每环阶 1d10 点的暗蚀伤害），此伤害无法被任何方式减免。此外，你的力量属性值将变为 3，持续 2d4 日。这段时间内，你每花一整日休息（不从事轻度活动以外的行为），恢复需要的日数就减少 2 日。最后，承受负担时，你将有 [[/r 1d3cs1]]{33%} 的概率永远也无法再次施放祈愿术。

Wish Stress.name: Wish Stress
Wish Stress.description: Each time you cast a spell until you finish a Long Rest, you take [[/damage 1d10 type=necrotic]] damage per level of that spell. This damage can’t be reduced or prevented in any way. In addition, your Strength score becomes 3 for [[/r 2d4]] days.

Contaminating Presence.name: Contaminating Presence
Contaminating Presence.description: A creature that starts its turn within 120 feet of the [[lookup @name]] is subjected to the following effect. Constitution Saving Throw: DC 20. Failure: The target gains a Contamination level. Failure or Success: [[/damage average]] damage.

Immutable Form.name: Immutable Form
Immutable Form.description: The [[lookup @name]] has Immunity to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

Malignancy.name: Malignancy
Malignancy.description: The [[lookup @name]] can't be teleported or travel to another plane against its will.

Rejuvenation.name: Rejuvenation
Rejuvenation.description: If the [[lookup @name]] is destroyed in the Mortal World, it reappears [[/r 1d10]] days later with all of its Hit Points unless its roots in the Space Between Worlds are also destroyed.

Ultimate Corruption.name: Ultimate Corruption
Ultimate Corruption.description: Necrotic damage dealt by the [[lookup @name]] ignores Resistance and treats Immunity as Resistance instead.

Fling.name: Fling
Fling.description: One Large or smaller object held or creature &reference[Grappled apply=false] by the [[lookup @name]] is thrown up to 60 feet, landing with the &refernce[Prone] condition. If the target strikes a solid surface, it takes [[/damage average]] damage. If the target is thrown at another creature, that creature must succeed on a [[/save]] saving throw or take the same damage and have the Prone condition.

save.target: A creature grappled by the Amalgamation

Mind-Breaking Whispers.name: Mind-Breaking Whispers
Mind-Breaking Whispers.description: Intelligence Saving Throw: DC 25, one creature within 120 feet of the [[lookup @name]]. Failure: The target becomes insane until it finishes a Long Rest. While insane, the target can't take actions, understand other creatures, read, or speak anything but gibberish. A @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplGreaterRes]{Greater Restoration} or @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplHeal000000]{Heal} spell ends the effect early. Failure or Success: [[/damage average]] damage.

Insanity.name: Insanity
Insanity.description:
You have gone insane. Until you finish a Long Rest, you can't take actions, understand other creatures, read, or speak anything but gibberish.

A @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplGreaterRes]{Greater Restoration} or @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplHeal000000]{Heal} spell ends this effect early.

Forced Mutation.name: Forced Mutation
Forced Mutation.description: Each creature within 120 feet of the [[lookup @name]] with one or more Contamination levels takes [[/damage average]] damage and gains a randomly determined mutation.

Piper at the Gate.name: Piper at the Gate
Piper at the Gate.description: A @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.CuSUJc5NnYVVaU0K]{Pyknic Maunder} appears in an unoccupied space within 30 feet of the [[lookup @name]], acting after the [[lookup @name]] on Initiative count 20 and under the [[lookup @name]]'s direct control. The [[lookup @name]] can have up to ten Pyknic Maunders under its control at a time.

Epic Boss.name: 史诗 Boss
Epic Boss.description:
This creature is an Epic Boss, a unique foe designed to pose a solo threat to an entire adventuring party. As such, it has additional game rules that sets it apart from normal creatures:

The [[lookup @name]] always takes its turn on Initiative count 20. On its turn, the [[lookup @name]] can use its movement and interaction as normal. However, it does not take an action or Bonus Action on its turn unless forced to do so by a spell or other effect. Instead, the [[lookup @name]] takes one of the following Epic Actions at the end of each player character’s turn:

All this creature's actions are Epic Actions.

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.2Msb23l9F9GpB7hy.Item.cF1kS518WmXs8Nrm]{Bite}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.2Msb23l9F9GpB7hy.Item.ZhM0kT3pzfJePm8m]{Tentacle}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.2Msb23l9F9GpB7hy.Item.qEoDtzugJE0aa4QL]{Fling}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.2Msb23l9F9GpB7hy.Item.oO3QYiQuiPEUPvPr]{Mind-Breaking Whispers}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.2Msb23l9F9GpB7hy.Item.MTE3NX82dJ0Lrd4U]{Forced Mutation}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.2Msb23l9F9GpB7hy.Item.IZyfs8Gl605KvI24]{Piper at the Gate}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.2Msb23l9F9GpB7hy.Item.QTduz9sU8acJdnoq]{Epic Resistance}

Epic Resistance.name: Epic Resistance
Epic Resistance.description: [[lookup @name]] chooses one condition, spell, or other effect currently affecting her and rolls [[/r 1d20]]. On an 11 or higher, the effect ends on her. [[lookup @name]] can use this Epic Action even if she would otherwise be unable to take actions, her actions are being controlled by another creature, or if a spell or effect alters her game statistics.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]]. If the target is a Large or smaller creature &reference[Grappled apply=false] by the [[lookup @name]], the grapple ends and the target is swallowed. While swallowed, the target has the &reference[Blinded] and &reference[Restrained] conditions, has &reference[TotalCover] from effects originating from outside the [[lookup @name]], and takes [[/damage average activity=RkKX3DzZ97Tr79Md]] damage and gains a Contamination level at the start of each of the [[lookup @name]]'s turns.

If the [[lookup @name]] takes 50+ damage in a single turn from a creature inside it, it must succeed on a [[/save activity=nvPCqXss7YBWUbNu]] saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which land in spaces within 10 feet of the [[lookup @name]] and have the &reference[Prone] condition. If the [[lookup @name]] dies, a swallowed creature no longer has the Restrained condition and can escape the corpse using 15 feet of its movement, exiting with the &reference[Prone] condition.

Regurgitate Save.name: Regurgitate Save
Regurgitate Save.condition: When the Amalgamation takes 50+ damage in a single turn from a creature inside it.

Swallowed.name: Swallowed
Swallowed.description:
You have been swallowed by the Amalgamation. While swallowed, you are &reference[blinded apply=false], &reference[restrained apply=fale], and have &reference[totalcover] from effects originating from outside the Amalgamation.

At the start of each of the Amalgamation's turns, you take [[/damage 12d6 necrotic average]] damage and gain a Contamination level.

Tentacle.name: Tentacle
Tentacle.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and the target has the &reference[Grappled] condition (escape DC 25). While Grappled, the target has the &reference[Restrained] condition. The [[lookup @name]] has twelve tentacles, each of which can grapple one target.

Grappled by Tentacle.name: Grappled by Tentacle
Grappled by Tentacle.description: You are &reference[grappled apply=false] (escape DC 25). While Grappled, you are also &reference[restrained apply=false].

Blessed Weapons.name: Blessed Weapons
Blessed Weapons.description: When the [[lookup @name lowercase]] hits with any weapon, the weapon unleashes holy fire, causing the target to have the &reference[Burning] condition (4d6 Radiant; included in the attacks below).

Grasping Ghost.name: Grasping Ghost
Grasping Ghost.description: Strength Saving Throw: DC 15, one creature the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within 60 feet. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target is moved 30 feet in a horizontal direction of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s choice. At the end of this movement, the target has the &reference[Immobilized] condition until the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn. Success: Half damage only.

Expel Evil.name: Expel Evil
Expel Evil.description: Wisdom Saving Throw: DC 15, each Celestial, Fey, Fiend, and Undead that can see and hear the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. Failure: The target has the &reference[Frightened] and &reference[Incapacitated] conditions and must move as far from the [[lookup @name lowercase]] as it can on its turns. The effect lasts for 1 minute or until the target takes damage, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has the &reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition, or the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies.

save.target: Each Celestial, Fey, Fiend, and Undead that can hear the exorcist.

Last Rites.name: Last Rites
Last Rites.description: Wisdom Saving Throw: DC 15, one creature the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within 60 feet that isn't a Celestial or Construct (Fiends and Undead have Disadvantage). Failure: [[/damage average]] damage. If the target is a Fiend or Undead, it instead takes [[/damage 64 radiant]] damage and is turned to ash if the effect reduces it to 0 Hit Points. Success: Half damage.

save.target: A creature that isn't a Celestial or Constuct.

Negate Spell.name: Negate Spell
Negate Spell.description: Trigger: A creature the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within 60 feet is casting a spell. Response: If the spell is level 3 or lower, the spell fails, but any spell slots or charges aren't wasted.

utility.condition: When a creature the exorcist can see within 60 feet is casting a spell.

Spiritual Healing.name: Spiritual Healing
Spiritual Healing.description: One creature the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see regains 35 (10d6) Hit Points. Once a creature benefits from Spiritual Healing, it can't do so again until it finishes a Short or Long Rest.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes two attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of [[/item hGqujnT0H2Dffaxf]].

Radiant Sword.name: Radiant Sword
Radiant Sword.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and the target has the &reference[Burning] condition (4d6 Radiant).

Burning (4d6 Radiant).name: Burning (4d6 Radiant)
Burning (4d6 Radiant).description:
You are &reference[burning apply=false] from being covered in holy fire.

  • At the end of each of your turns, you take [[/damage average radiant 4d6]] damage.

  • The condition ends if you or another creature within 5 feet of you spends an action to douse the fire or if some other effect removes it such as submerging yourself in water.

Blessed Crossbow.name: Blessed Crossbow
Blessed Crossbow.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and the target has the &reference[Burning] condition (4d6 Radiant).

Burning (4d6 Radiant).name: Burning (4d6 Radiant)
Burning (4d6 Radiant).description:
You are &reference[burning apply=false] from being covered in holy fire.

  • At the end of each of your turns, you take [[/damage average radiant 4d6]] damage.

  • The condition ends if you or another creature within 5 feet of you spends an action to douse the fire or if some other effect removes it such as submerging yourself in water.

Uncanny Dodge.name: Uncanny Dodge
Uncanny Dodge.description: Trigger: A creature [[lookup @name]] can see deals damage to him with an attack. Response: [[lookup @name]] halves the damage he takes from that attack.

utility.condition: When a creature Blackjack Mel can see deals damage to him with an attack.

Evasion.name: Evasion
Evasion.description: If [[lookup @name]] is subjected to an effect that allows him to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, he instead takes no damage if he succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if he fails, provided he doesn't have the &reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition.

Cunning Action.name: Cunning Action
Cunning Action.description: [[lookup @name]] takes the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

Potion of Invisibility.name: Potion of Invisibility
Potion of Invisibility.description:
Potion, Rare

This potion's container looks empty but feels as though it holds liquid. When you drink the potion, you have the &Reference[Invisible apply=false] condition for 1 hour. The effect ends early if you make an attack roll, deal damage, or cast a spell.

Mass of Tails.name: Mass of Tails
Mass of Tails.description: Ranged attacks against the [[lookup @name]] from further than 60 feet away have Disadvantage.

Verminous Aura.name: Verminous Aura
Verminous Aura.description: The [[lookup @name]] is surrounded by a 60-foot radius of vermin, pouring out of it and spilling over into the area as they claw and gnash. The area is &reference[DifficultTerrain] and a creature that starts its turn in the area takes [[/damage average]] damage.

Flail of Skulls.name: Flail of Skulls
Flail of Skulls.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and the target has the &reference[Burning] condition (3d6 Acid).

Burning (3d6 Acid).name: Burning (3d6 Acid)
Burning (3d6 Acid).description:
You are &reference[burning apply=false] from being covered in acid.

  • At the end of each of your turns, you take [[/damage average acid 3d6]] damage.

  • The condition ends if you or another creature within 5 feet of you spends an action to scrape off the acid or if some other effect removes it.

Great Feeding.name: Great Feeding
Great Feeding.description: Constitution Saving Throw: DC 26, each creature within 60 feet of the [[lookup @name]]. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &reference[Sickened] condition (save ends). Success: Half damage only. Failure or Success: The [[lookup @name]] regains Hit Points equal to the total damage dealt to all targets.

Great Feeding.name: Great Feeding
Great Feeding.description: 你陷入&reference[sickened apply=false]状态。你可以在自己每一回合结束时重复进行针对此效应的豁免检定，成功则终止该效应。

Rodent Rifts.name: Rodent Rifts
Rodent Rifts.description: The [[lookup @name]] teleports to an unoccupied space within 120 feet. Each creature within 15 feet of the [[lookup @name]] when it arrives is subjected to the following effect. Strength Saving Throw: DC 26. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target is pushed 10 feet away from the [[lookup @name]].

Warp Bolt.name: Warp Bolt
Warp Bolt.description: Constitution Saving Throw: DC 22, one creature the [[lookup @name]] can see within 120 feet. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target suffers a &reference[drakkenheimContamination] level.

Infernal Chittering.name: Infernal Chittering
Infernal Chittering.description: Intelligence Saving Throw: DC 26, one creature the [[lookup @name]] can see within 60 feet that can hear the [[lookup @name]]. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the Weakened condition (save ends).

Infernal Chittering.name: Infernal Chittering
Infernal Chittering.description: 你陷入&reference[weakened apply=false]状态。你可以在自己每一回合结束时重复进行针对此效应的豁免检定，成功则终止该效应。

Epic Boss.name: 史诗 Boss
Epic Boss.description:
This creature is an Epic Boss, a unique foe designed to pose a solo threat to an entire adventuring party. As such, it has additional game rules that sets it apart from normal creatures:

The [[lookup @name]] always takes their turn on Initiative count 20. On their turn, they can use their movement and interaction as normal. However, they do not take an action or Bonus Action on their turn unless forced to do so by a spell or other effect. Instead, the [[lookup @name]] takes one of the following Epic Actions at the end of each player character's turn.

All this creature's actions are Epic Actions.

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.32bLDrk0tZkvAt5w.Item.ev0rR0PuEdPuAR3X]{Flail of Skulls}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.32bLDrk0tZkvAt5w.Item.DfGFEfN7CjIvbZPo]{Great Feeding}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.32bLDrk0tZkvAt5w.Item.7uTvzgG64SRM5hW0]{Rodent Rifts}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.32bLDrk0tZkvAt5w.Item.KSRvfFz8kigWHgzW]{Warp Bolt}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.32bLDrk0tZkvAt5w.Item.ugChi2RqzXRPzDd4]{Infernal Chittering}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.32bLDrk0tZkvAt5w.Item.ubEGU64T3qRvGRGn]{Epic Resistance}

Epic Boss.name: 史诗 Boss
Epic Boss.description:
This creature is an Epic Boss, a unique foe designed to pose a solo threat to an entire adventuring party. As such, it has additional game rules that sets it apart from normal creatures.

The creature always takes their turn on Initiative count 20. On their turn, they can use their movement and interaction as normal. However, they do not take an action or Bonus Action on their turn unless forced to do so by a spell or other effect. Instead, the creature takes one of the Epic Actions they have available.

Epic Resistance.name: Epic Resistance
Epic Resistance.description: The [[lookup @name]] chooses one condition, spell, or other effect currently affecting them and rolls [[/r 1d20]]. On an 11 or higher, the effect ends on them. The [[lookup @name]] can use this Epic Action even if they would otherwise be unable to take actions, their actions are being controlled by another creature, or if a spell or effect alters their game statistics.

Cacophonous Chorus.name: 呕哑嘲哳
Cacophonous Chorus.description: 喧嚣奇美拉创造出一个 30 尺的[[lookup @name lowercase]]空间爆发噪音。在该空间爆发中开始其回合且能听到此噪音的生物将受到[[/damage average]]伤害。

Keen Sight and Smell.name: 敏锐视嗅觉
Keen Sight and Smell.description: [[lookup @name]]依赖视觉或嗅觉进行的感知（察觉）检定具有优势。

Aerial Maneuver.name: 空中机动
Aerial Maneuver.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]]以其移动速度飞起，且不会引发借机攻击。

Cacophony.name: 刺耳音波
Cacophony.description:
[[lookup @name lowercase]]的三只头唱出不谐的乐章，乐章效果由领唱的头部决定。每次使用此史诗动作时，它不能选择上一轮相同的效应。

  • 困惑吱吱（鼠怪）。 智力豁免检定： DC 17，对[[lookup @name lowercase]]为中心、半径 300 尺且能听见它的所有生物。 失败： [[/damage average activity=uTTRGhmckAlajFS4]]伤害，且目标陷入&reference[Bewildered]状态（可豁免终止）。

  • 冷冽嚎叫（加米尔）。 感知豁免检定： DC 17，对[[lookup @name lowercase]]为中心、半径 300 尺且能听见它的所有生物。 失败： [[/damage average activity=MEqHpjHbfAiaq9gT]]伤害，且目标陷入&reference[Immobilized]状态（可豁免终止）。

  • 蹒跚尖啸（鸟妖）。 魅力豁免检定： DC 17，对[[lookup @name lowercase]]为中心、半径 300 尺且能听见它的所有生物。 失败： [[/damage average activity=rGDE6tQPzwkQ6RJ1]]伤害，且目标陷入&reference[Staggered]状态（可豁免终止）。

Chilling Howl (Garmyr).name: 冷冽嚎叫（加米尔）
Chilling Howl (Garmyr).target: Creatures that can hear the cacophonous chimera.

Staggering Screech.name: 蹒跚尖啸
Staggering Screech.target: Creatures that can hear the cacophonous chimera.

Bewildering Chitter (Ratling).name: 困惑吱吱（鼠怪）
Bewildering Chitter (Ratling).target: Creatures that can hear the cacophonous chimera.

Bewildering Chittering.name: 困惑吱吱
Bewildering Chittering.description: 你陷入&reference[bewildered apply=false]状态。你可以在自己每一回合结束时重复进行针对此效应的豁免检定，成功则终止该效应。

Chilling Howl.name: 冷冽嚎叫
Chilling Howl.description: 你陷入&reference[immobilized apply=false]状态。你可以在自己每一回合结束时重复进行针对此效应的豁免检定，成功则终止该效应。

Staggering Screech.name: 蹒跚尖啸
Staggering Screech.description: 你陷入&reference[staggered apply=false]状态。你可以在自己每一回合结束时重复进行针对此效应的豁免检定，成功则终止该效应。

Wing Blast.name: 翼爆
Wing Blast.description: 力量豁免检定：DC 17，[[lookup @name lowercase]] 15 尺内的每名生物。失败：[[/damage average]]伤害，并且目标被推离 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 10 尺。成功：仅半伤。

Crescendo of Chaos.name: 渐强混沌
Crescendo of Chaos.description:
触发： [[lookup @name lowercase]]陷入&reference[Bloodied]。即使其具有&reference[Incapacitated apply=false]状态或因其他原因无法执行反应，它仍可执行此反应。 效应： 其身上所有状态与法术立即结束，除非它选择继续受影响；随后它可移动至多其速度的距离，此次移动不引发借机攻击且无视&reference[DifficultTerrain]。

随后它爆发出雷鸣般的冲击波。距它 300 尺内且能听见它的生物将受到以下影响。 感知豁免： DC 17。 失败： [[/damage average]]伤害，且目标陷入&reference[Prone]状态，直至其下一回合结束前无法起身。

save.condition: 喧嚣奇美拉处于浴血时。

This creature is an Epic Boss, a unique foe designed to pose a solo threat to an entire adventuring party. As such, it has additional game rules that sets it apart from normal creatures:

[[lookup @name]] always takes their turn on Initiative count 20. On their turn, they can use their movement and interaction as normal. However, they does not take an action or Bonus Action on their turn unless forced to do so by a spell or other effect. Instead, [[lookup @name]] takes one of the following Epic Actions at the end of each player character's turn.

All this creature's actions are Epic Actions.

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.3GyiTiyeMxJ8rXM5.Item.YQnK52PJiLktKm1I]{Contaminated Bite}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.3GyiTiyeMxJ8rXM5.Item.HbXwjydKuD75GSJB]{Lamprey Tail}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.3GyiTiyeMxJ8rXM5.Item.dgFVt6xVKSDAilKo]{Aerial Maneuver}
