HZ9eH1OfJ7F3bvMg.description:
A creature of your choice that you can see within range regains Hit Points equal to 2d4 plus your spellcasting ability modifier.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The healing increases by 2d4 for each spell slot level above 1.

Banishment.name: Banishment
Banishment.description:
一个在你施法距离内你可见的生物必须进行一次魅力豁免，豁免失败者会在法术持续期间被转移到一个无害的半位面，身处半位面期间，目标会陷入&Reference[Incapacitated apply=false]{失能}状态。当法术终止时，目标将重新出现在其被放逐前的位置。如果该位置被占据，则目标将出现在距离该位置最近的一个未被占据空间。

若该目标的生物类型为异怪、天族、元素、妖精或邪魔，则在法术持续一分钟后，目标不会返回。该目标会被改为转移到与其生物类型相关的一个位面（由 DM 决定）中的随机地点。

升环施法：使用的法术位每比四环高一环，你就能多指定一个生物作为此法术的目标。

Banished.name: Banished
Banished.description:
身处半位面期间，目标会陷入&Reference[Incapacitated apply=false]状态。当法术终止时，目标将重新出现在其被放逐前的位置。如果该位置被占据，则目标将出现在距离该位置最近的一个未被占据空间。

若该目标的生物类型为异怪、天族、元素、妖精或邪魔，则在法术持续一分钟后，目标不会返回。该目标会被改为转移到与其生物类型相关的一个位面（由DM决定）中的随机地点。

Bless.name: Bless
Bless.description:
You bless up to three creatures within range. Whenever a target makes an attack roll or a saving throw before the spell ends, the target adds 1d4 to the attack roll or save.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You can target one additional creature for each spell slot level above 1.

Blessed.name: 祝福
Blessed.description: 在法术终止前，每当你进行攻击检定或豁免检定时，都可以在检定结果中额外加入 1d4。

Dispel Magic.name: 解除魔法
Dispel Magic.description:
在施法距离内指定一名生物、一个物件或一处魔法效应。所有影响该目标的三环或更低环阶法术即告终止。每个影响目标的四环或更高环阶法术都需要以你的施法属性进行一次属性检定（DC 10 + 目标法术环阶），检定成功时目标法术终止。

升环施法： 你直接终止影响目标的小于等于该施法环阶的法术效应。

Flame Strike.name: Flame Strike
Flame Strike.description:
A vertical column of brilliant fire roars down from above. Each creature in a 10-foot-radius, 40-foot-high Cylinder centered on a point within range makes a Dexterity saving throw, taking 5d6 Fire damage and 5d6 Radiant damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The Fire damage and the Radiant damage increase by 1d6 for each spell slot level above 5.

Greater Restoration.name: Greater Restoration
Greater Restoration.description:
你触碰一名生物并魔法性地移除目标身上的下列效应之一：

  • 1 级 &Reference[Exhaustion apply=false]{力竭}
  • &Reference[Charmed apply=false]{魅惑}或&Reference[Petrified apply=false]{石化}状态
  • 一道诅咒，包括目标因与一件被诅咒魔法物品的同调所陷入的诅咒。
  • 目标某项属性值的减损
  • 目标生命值上限的降低

Mass Cure Wounds.name: Mass Cure Wounds
Mass Cure Wounds.description:
A wave of healing energy washes out from a point you can see within range. Choose up to six creatures in a 30-foot-radius Sphere centered on that point. Each target regains Hit Points equal to 5d8 plus your spellcasting ability modifier.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The healing increases by 1d8 for each spell slot level above 5.

Heal.name: Heal
Heal.description:
Choose a creature that you can see within range. Positive energy washes through the target, restoring 70 Hit Points. This spell also ends the &Reference[Blinded], &Reference[Deafened], and &Reference[Poisoned] conditions on the target.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The healing increases by 10 for each spell slot level above 6.

Raise Dead.name: Raise Dead
Raise Dead.description:
你触碰一名已死，但死亡时间不超过 10 日，且死亡时并不是亡灵的生物，使其回生。

生物以 1 点生命值重生。该法术同样会中和在该生物死亡时仍在生效的毒素。

该法术能治愈所有致命伤，但无法恢复失去的身体部位。如果该生物缺失了它生存所必要的身体部位或器官（比如头），则该法术自动失败。

死而复生是一个痛苦的体验。目标进行 D20 检定时具有 -4 减值。目标每完成一次长休，其减值就减少 1，直至减值变为 0。

Resurrection Sickness (Day 1).name: Resurrection Sickness (Day 1)
Resurrection Sickness (Day 1).description: Coming back from the dead is an ordeal. The target takes a −4 penalty to D20 Tests. Every time the target finishes a Long Rest, the penalty is reduced by 1 until it becomes 0.

Resurrection Sickness (Day 2).name: Resurrection Sickness (Day 2)
Resurrection Sickness (Day 2).description: Coming back from the dead is an ordeal. The target takes a −4 penalty to D20 Tests. Every time the target finishes a Long Rest, the penalty is reduced by 1 until it becomes 0.

Resurrection Sickness (Day 4).name: Resurrection Sickness (Day 4)
Resurrection Sickness (Day 4).description: Coming back from the dead is an ordeal. The target takes a −4 penalty to D20 Tests. Every time the target finishes a Long Rest, the penalty is reduced by 1 until it becomes 0.

Resurrection Sickness (Day 3).name: Resurrection Sickness (Day 3)
Resurrection Sickness (Day 3).description: Coming back from the dead is an ordeal. The target takes a −4 penalty to D20 Tests. Every time the target finishes a Long Rest, the penalty is reduced by 1 until it becomes 0.

Sunbeam.name: Sunbeam
Sunbeam.description:
You launch a sunbeam in a 5-foot-wide, 60-foot-long Line. Each creature in the Line makes a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 6d8 Radiant damage and has the Blinded condition until the start of your next turn. On a successful save, it takes half as much damage only.

Until the spell ends, you can take a Magic action to create a new Line of radiance.

For the duration, a mote of brilliant radiance shines above you. It sheds Bright Light in a 30-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional 30 feet. This light is sunlight.

Blinded.name: Blinded
Blinded.description: The target has the &Reference[Blinded apply=false] condition until the start of your next turn.

Guidance.name: 神导术
Guidance.description: You touch a willing creature and choose a skill. Until the spell ends, the creature adds 1d4 to any ability check using the chosen skill.

Light.name: Light
Light.description:
You touch one Large or smaller object that isn't being worn or carried by someone else. Until the spell ends, the object sheds Bright Light in a 20-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional 20 feet. The light can be colored as you like.

Covering the object with something opaque blocks the light. The spell ends if you cast it again.

Thaumaturgy.name: Thaumaturgy
Thaumaturgy.description:
You manifest a minor wonder within range. You create one of the effects below within range. If you cast this spell multiple times, you can have up to three of its 1-minute effects active at a time.

Altered Eyes. You alter the appearance of your eyes for 1 minute.

Booming Voice. Your voice booms up to three times as loud as normal for 1 minute. For the duration, you have Advantage on [[/check ability=cha skill=itm]] checks.

Fire Play. You cause flames to flicker, brighten, dim, or change color for 1 minute.

Invisible Hand. You instantaneously cause an unlocked door or window to fly open or slam shut.

Phantom Sound. You create an instantaneous sound that originates from a point of your choice within range, such as a rumble of thunder, the cry of a raven, or ominous whispers.

Tremors. You cause harmless tremors in the ground for 1 minute.

Spare the Dying.name: 维生术
Spare the Dying.description:
选择一个生命值为 0 但还未死亡的生物，使该生物变为伤势稳定。

戏法强化：到达特定等级后，此法术的施法距离将翻倍：5 级（30 尺），11 级（60 尺），17 级（120 尺）。

Shield.name: Shield
Shield.description: You gain the Armor Class benefit of a Shield only if you have training with it.

Spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
Spellcasting.description:
Ophelia casts one of the following spells, using [[lookup @attributes.spell.abilityLabel]] as the spellcasting ability (spell save dc [[lookup @attributes.spell.dc]], +[[lookup @attributes.spell.attack]] to spell attacks).

At Will: [[/item .dMuaqU1hkF6YxRMP]], [[/item .KhLoKERuwibbu1bo]], [[/item .3yZIN97JeLtyaeMW]], [[/item .elrrLmdRn87tZB5a]]

2/Day Each: Aura of Vitality, [[/item .9hrUXpmQ1RLt7tdT]], [[/item .QxWBoKagdVfbIOFL]], [[/item .4iNR7Cvc4Kvxbvrm]], [[/item .gd56xRPwDU6aRKUm]], [[/item .KQer9aG4jLokpntx]], [[/item .J68zAOEQuY7h6jq0]]

1/Day Each: [[/item .gM7TqYndVzWUsOuj]], [[/item .DdvYTAWu5qCaar3A]], [[/item .S2Wwnbo4HsTKjKf0]]

Regeneration.name: Regeneration
Regeneration.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] regains 10 Hit Points at the start of each of its turns. If the troll takes Fire damage, this trait doesn’t function at the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies only if it starts its turn with 0 Hit Points and doesn’t regenerate.

Freezing Breath.name: Freezing Breath
Freezing Breath.description: Constitution Saving Throw: DC 16, each creature in a 30-foot Cone. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage and has the &reference[Frozen] condition (escape DC 16). Success: Half damage only.

Frozen (DC 16).name: Frozen (DC 16)
Frozen (DC 16).description:
You're partially encased in ice:

  • You are &reference[Immobilized apply=false] & &reference[Defenseless apply=false].

  • You're &reference[Helpless apply=false] against attacks made with a weapon that deals bludgeoning damage.

  • You or another creature can take an action to break the ice away. To do so, you must succeed on a [[/check 16 str ath]] check.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes two [[/item Zw5fLBcRRIpSvppL]] attacks and one [[/item sDmvHQoFMiUNcsX4]] attack. It can replace its Bite attack with [[/item tDPhZ2bQkqri7B4H]], if available.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and target has the &reference[Slowed] condition until the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn. Critical Hit: The target has the &reference[Frozen] condition (escape DC 16).

Slowing Bite.name: Slowing Bite
Slowing Bite.description: You are &reference[slowed apply=false] until the end of the winter troll's next turn.

Frozen (DC 16).name: Frozen (DC 16)
Frozen (DC 16).description:
You're partially encased in ice:

  • You are &reference[Immobilized apply=false] & &reference[Defenseless apply=false].

  • You're &reference[Helpless apply=false] against attacks made with a weapon that deals bludgeoning damage.

  • You or another creature can take an action to break the ice away. To do so, you must succeed on a [[/check 16 str ath]] check.

Unfathomable Presence..name: Unfathomable Presence.
Unfathomable Presence..description:
A creature that starts its turn within 120 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] and can see it is subjected to the following effect. Intelligence Saving Throw: DC 15. Failure: The target has the &reference[Blinded] and &reference[Immobilized] conditions until the start of its next turn. Success: The target is immune to the Unfathomable Presence of all [[lookup @name lowercase]] for 24 hours.

Unless surprised, a creature can avert its eyes to avoid the saving throw at the start of its turn. If the creature does so, it has Disadvantage on attack rolls against the [[lookup @name lowercase]] until the start of its next turn. If the creature looks at the [[lookup @name lowercase]] in the meantime, that creature must immediately make the saving throw.

save.condition: When a creature starts its turn within 120 feet of the far dweller and can see it.

Unfathomable Presence.name: Unfathomable Presence
Unfathomable Presence.description: You are &reference[blinded apply=false] and &reference[immobilized apply=false] until the start of your next turn.

Mind Warp.name: Mind Warp
Mind Warp.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and the target must roll 1d4 and subtract the result from the next saving throw it makes before the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn.

Mind Warp.name: Mind Warp
Mind Warp.description: You must subtract 1d4 from the next saving throw you make before the end of the far dweller's next turn.

Devour Thoughts.name: Devour Thoughts
Devour Thoughts.description:
Intelligence Saving Throw: DC 15, one creature within 30 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target's Intelligence score is reduced by 1d4. If this effect reduces the target's Intelligence to 0, it has the &reference[Paralyzed] condition. The reduction lasts until the target finishes a Short or Long Rest.

Foundry Note

This feature has several different Active Effects to apply to a target when reducing their Intelligence score. Use the "Devour Thoughts" activity to roll the d4 and apply the correct variant of the Active Effect.

Intelligence Drain (-1).name: Intelligence Drain (-1)
Intelligence Drain (-1).description: You Intelligence score has been reduced by 1 until you finish a Short or Long Rest. If this reduces your Intelligence score to 0, you are &reference[paralyzed].

Intelligence Drain (-2).name: Intelligence Drain (-2)
Intelligence Drain (-2).description: You Intelligence score has been reduced by 2 until you finish a Short or Long Rest. If this reduces your Intelligence score to 0, you are &reference[paralyzed].

Intelligence Drain (-3).name: Intelligence Drain (-3)
Intelligence Drain (-3).description: You Intelligence score has been reduced by 3 until you finish a Short or Long Rest. If this reduces your Intelligence score to 0, you are &reference[paralyzed].

Intelligence Drain (-4).name: Intelligence Drain (-4)
Intelligence Drain (-4).description: You Intelligence score has been reduced by 4 until you finish a Short or Long Rest. If this reduces your Intelligence score to 0, you are &reference[paralyzed].

Abduct.name: Abduct
Abduct.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplPlaneShift] without components, targeting itself and each &reference[Incapacitated apply=false] creature within 10 feet of it.

Counterspell.name: Counterspell
Counterspell.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplCounterspe] in response to that spell's trigger, using Intelligence as their spellcasting ability.

G6wUakcCD7KyZxTX.condition: When the far dweller abductor sees a creature within range cast a spell with verbal, somatic, or material components.

Psychic Step.name: Psychic Step
Psychic Step.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] magically teleports to an unoccupied space it can see within 60 feet.

Plane Shift.name: Plane Shift
Plane Shift.description:
You and up to eight willing creatures who link hands in a circle are transported to a different plane of existence. You can specify a target destination in general terms, such as the City of Brass on the Elemental Plane of Fire or the palace of Dispater on the second level of the Nine Hells, and you appear in or near that destination, as determined by the DM.

Alternatively, if you know the sigil sequence of a teleportation circle on another plane of existence, this spell can take you to that circle. If the teleportation circle is too small to hold all the creatures you transported, they appear in the closest unoccupied spaces next to the circle.

Aberrant Traits.name: Aberrant Traits
Aberrant Traits.description:
Given the contamination and delerium present within the Space Between Worlds, all creatures who dwell there are the product of contamination and unaffected by the normal dangers of delerium. As an aberrant, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has the following traits:

  • Fully Contaminated. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is immune to &reference[drakkenheimContamination] and has Advantage on saving throws against contaminated spells. This creature may cast contaminated spells even though it does not gain Contamination levels.

  • Delerium Healing. As an action, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can touch a delerium shard to regain 10 (3d6) Hit Points. Once the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has used a delerium shard in this way, the shard can't be used in this manner again for 24 hours.

  • Alien Intellect. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is immune to any effect that would sense its emotions or read its thoughts, as well as any divination spell that it refuses. Wisdom (Insight) checks made to ascertain the [[lookup @name lowercase]]s intentions or sincerity have Disadvantage.

XuAhBy15Ur7hhACp.name: Counterspell
XuAhBy15Ur7hhACp.description: 你试图打断一名正在施法的生物。该生物进行一次体质豁免。豁免失败则法术消散且毫无效果，并且用于施展法术的动作、附赠动作或反应随之浪费。如果那道法术是使用法术位施展的，则法术位并不会被消耗。

changes.system.activation: {"type":"reaction","condition":"When the far dweller abductor sees a creature within range cast a spell with verbal, somatic, or material components."}

Dominate Person.name: 支配类人
Dominate Person.description:
一名法术范围内你可见的类人必须成功于一次感知豁免，否则在持续时间内陷入 &Reference[Charmed apply=false] 状态。若你或你的盟友正在与其战斗，则目标在此豁免上具有优势。目标受到伤害时，可以重复进行豁免，豁免成功则其身上的此法术终止。

该目标被魅惑期间，只要你与其处于同一位面就可以与之保持心灵感应。在你的回合，你可以通过心灵感应命令该生物（无需动作），比如“攻击那个生物”“跑到那个位置”或是“去拿那个物品”。目标完成一项指令却未收到你的进一步指示时，将会凭自身喜好行动，尽可能的保护自己。

你可以用自己的反应去要求目标执行一项反应

升环施法： 使用更高环阶法术位施展时，你的专注能持续更长时间，六环至多 10 分钟，七环至多 1 小时，八环及以上至多 8 小时。

Dominated.name: Dominated
Dominated.description: Whenever the &Reference[charmed apply=false] target takes damage, it repeats the [[/save ability=wis]] save, ending the spell on itself on a success.

Modify Memory.name: Modify Memory
Modify Memory.description:
You attempt to reshape another creature's memories. One creature that you can see within range makes a Wisdom saving throw. If you are fighting the creature, it has Advantage on the save. On a failed save, the target has the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] condition for the duration. While Charmed in this way, the target also has the &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition and is unaware of its surroundings, though it can hear you. If it takes any damage or is targeted by another spell, this spell ends, and no memories are modified.

While this charm lasts, you can affect the target's memory of an event that it experienced within the last 24 hours and that lasted no more than 10 minutes. You can permanently eliminate all memory of the event, allow the target to recall the event with perfect clarity, change its memory of the event's details, or create a memory of some other event.

You must speak to the target to describe how its memories are affected, and it must be able to understand your language for the modified memories to take root. Its mind fills in any gaps in the details of your description. If the spell ends before you finish describing the modified memories, the creature's memory isn't altered. Otherwise, the modified memories take hold when the spell ends.

A modified memory doesn't necessarily affect how a creature behaves, particularly if the memory contradicts the creature's natural inclinations, alignment, or beliefs. An illogical modified memory, such as a false memory of how much the creature enjoyed swimming in acid, is dismissed as a bad dream. The DM might deem a modified memory too nonsensical to affect a creature.

A @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplRemoveCurs]{Remove Curse} or @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplGreaterRes]{Greater Restoration} spell cast on the target restores the creature's true memory.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You can alter the target's memories of an event that took place up to 7 days ago (level 6 spell slot), 30 days ago (level 7 spell slot), 365 days ago (level 8 spell slot), or any time in the creature's past (level 9 spell slot).

Memory Modification.name: Memory Modification
Memory Modification.description: While &Reference[Charmed apply=false] in this way, the target also has the &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition and is unaware of its surroundings, though it can hear you. If it takes any damage or is targeted by another spell, this spell ends, and no memories are modified.

Scrying.name: 探知术
Scrying.description:
你能看见和听见一个和你处于同一存在位面上的生物。目标生物必须进行一次感知豁免；该豁免的调整值与你对目标的了解程度有关（见下文），也与你和目标之间的物理联系程度有关。目标不知道它进行此豁免在对抗什么，只是会感觉不自在。

你对目标的了解有… 豁免调整值
二手信息（你曾经听说过目标） +5
直接信息（你曾经见过目标） +0
熟悉（你对目标很了解） −5
你持有目标的… 豁免调整值
肖像或其他图像 −2
衣物或其他物品 −4
身体部位如头发或指甲 −10

如果对方豁免成功，则目标不受该法术影响，并且在 24 小时内你不能尝试探知同一个目标。

如果对方豁免失败，则你在目标身边 10 尺内创造出一个隐形的传感器。通过传感器，你可以身临其境地看见和听见周围的环境。传感器会跟随目标移动，并在法术持续时间内始终保持在目标 10 尺之内。在能够看到传感器的生物眼中，你的传感器是一个拳头大小的光球。

除生物之外，你也可以选择一个你以前见过的地点作为该法术的目标。这种情况下，传感器会出现在目标地点且不会移动。

Create Sensor.name: 创造探测器
Create Sensor.target: at target location or within 10 feet of target creature

Sleep.name: Sleep
Sleep.description:
以施法距离内一点为源点，5 尺半径球状区域内每个你选择的生物都必须成功通过一次感知豁免否则直到其下个回合结束陷入&Reference[incapacitated apply=false]状态。在其下个回合结束时，它必须重复此豁免。如果目标第二次豁免失败，目标在持续时间内陷入&Reference[unconscious]如果目标受到伤害，或其 5 尺内有人用一个动作将它摇醒，目标身上的法术结束。

不会睡眠的生物，比如精灵或免疫力竭状态的生物自动成功通过对抗此法术的豁免。

Sleeping.name: Sleeping
Sleeping.description: The target has the &Reference[incapacitated apply=false] condition until the end of its next turn, at which point it must repeat the save. If the target fails the second save, the target has the &Reference[unconscious] condition for the duration. The spell ends on a target if it takes damage or someone within 5 feet of it takes an action to shake it out of the spell’s effect.

Detect Thoughts.name: 侦测思想
Detect Thoughts.description:
你激活下述效应之一。直到法术结束为止，你可以在你随后的回合用一个魔法动作以激活下述任意效应之一。

感知思想。 你感知距你 30 尺内，知晓语言或能够心灵感应的思想的存在。你并不会阅读这些思想，但你知道这里存在一名有理智的生物。

此法术会被 1 尺厚的岩石、泥土或木头，1 寸厚的金属，或薄薄一层铅阻隔。

阅读思想。 选择一名距你 30 尺内的可见生物，或一名距你 30 尺内被感知思想侦测到的生物。你了解到此时目标最关心的事情。如果目标不知晓任何语言也不会心灵感应，则你不能得到任何信息。

在你的下一回合，用一个魔法动作，你可以尝试深入目标的心灵。如果你选择这么做，目标进行一次感知豁免。豁免失败，则你了解到他的逻辑推理、情绪状态以及他头脑中的一些大事（比如忧虑、挚爱和仇恨的事物）。豁免成功，法术终止。无论哪种情况，目标都会知道你正在窥探其心灵，且直到你的注意力从它的心灵上移开为止，目标均可以在其回合内使用动作进行一次 [[/check ability=int skill=arc dc=@attributes.spelldc]] 检定，对抗你的法术豁免DC，目标胜出对抗时，法术终止。

Dispel Magic.name: 解除魔法
Dispel Magic.description:
在施法距离内指定一名生物、一个物件或一处魔法效应。所有影响该目标的三环或更低环阶法术即告终止。每个影响目标的四环或更高环阶法术都需要以你的施法属性进行一次属性检定（DC 10 + 目标法术环阶），检定成功时目标法术终止。

升环施法： 你直接终止影响目标的小于等于该施法环阶的法术效应。

Telekinesis.name: 心灵遥控
Telekinesis.description:
你获得以思想移动或操纵生物或物件的能力。你施展法术时或在法术终止前的其后回合中用一个魔法动作，你可以向施法距离内可见的一名生物或一个物件伸展你的意志，造成对应的下述效应。你可以一轮接一轮地影响同一个目标，也可以在任何时候选择一个新的目标。如果你改变了目标，则之前的目标将不再受该法术影响。

生物。 你可以尝试移动一名巨型或更小的生物。目标必须成功于一次力量豁免，否则你可以将其往任意方向移动 30 尺，但不能让它离开施法距离。在你的下个回合结束前，该生物陷入 &Reference[Restrained] 状态，而被你举到空中的生物会在半空中悬停。除非你再次使用此选项且目标失败于豁免，否则被举到空中的生物会在你的下个回合结束坠落。

物件。 你可以尝试移动一个巨型或更小的物件。如果该物品没有被着装或携带，则你可以自动使它朝任何方向移动 30 尺，但不能让它离开施法距离。

如果该物件已被一名生物着装或携带，则那名生物必须成功于一次力量豁免，否则你可以把目标物件从该生物身上拿走，并且使该物体朝任意方向移动 30 尺，但不能让它离开施法距离。

你可以使用心灵遥控对物体进行精密操作，例如操纵一件简单的工具，打开一扇门或一个容器，把东西放进或拿出一个打开的容器中，或是把一个小瓶子里的东西倒出来。

Eye Laser.name: Eye Laser
Eye Laser.description: Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 14, each creature in a 60-foot-long, 5-foot-wide Line. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage. Success: Half damage. Failure or Success: If the target is a creature and this damage reduces it to 0 Hit Points, it disintegrates into a pile of fine delerium dust.

Wink (Recharge 4-6).name: Wink (Recharge 4-6)
Wink (Recharge 4-6).description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] vanishes from the Material Plane and is transported to the Space Between Worlds. At the start of its next turn, it returns to an unoccupied space of its choice within 10 feet of the space it vanished from. If no unoccupied space is available within that range, it appears in the nearest unoccupied space (chosen at random if more than one space is equally near).

Winked.name: Winked
Winked.description: You have transported yourself to the Space Between Worlds. At the start of your next turn, you reappear in an unoccupied space of your choice within 10 feet of the space you vanished from. If no unoccupied space is available within that range, you appear in the nearest unoccupied space (chosen at random if more than one space is equally near).

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes two [[/item ZtydBymdI56DLwVT]] attacks. It can replace one of the attacks with its [[/item gFY2IO88LhmcOdjO]].

Regeneration.name: Regeneration
Regeneration.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] regains 10 Hit Points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 Hit Point and isn't in sunlight or running water. If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes Radiant damage or damage from holy water, this trait doesn't function at the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn.

Vampire Weaknesses.name: Vampire Weaknesses
Vampire Weaknesses.description:
As a vampire, this creature has the following weaknesses:

  • Forbiddance. The vampire can't enter a residence without an invitation from one of the occupants.

  • Harmed by Running Water. The vampire takes [[/damage activity=TXfKdpwrbcIMoY3l]] damage when it ends its turn in running water.

  • Stake to the Heart. If a Piercing weapon made of wood is driven into the vampire's heart while the vampire is Incapacitated in its resting place, the vampire is Paralyzed until the stake is removed.

  • Sunlight Hypersensitivity. The vampire takes [[/damage activity=agngcqt5cICRvCaw]] damage when it starts its turn in sunlight. While in sunlight, it has Disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

Running Water.name: Running Water
Running Water.condition: If the vampire ends their turn in running water.

Staked.name: Staked
Staked.description: The vampire is &reference[paralyzed apply=false] until the stake is removed.

Crimson Axe.name: Crimson Axe
Crimson Axe.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and the target suffers one of the following effects of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s choice. Hit or Miss: After being thrown, the axe returns to the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s hand.

  • Crackling Smite. Strength Saving Throw: DC 16. Failure: [[/damage average activity=7nAvYSP4bJVXmKds]] damage, and the target has the &reference[Shocked] condition until the end of its next turn. Success: Half damage only.

  • Unholy Smite. Constitution Saving Throw: DC 16. Failure: [[/damage average activity=Nyfj5vW0vHGmaZuk]] damage, and the target can't regain Hit Points until the end of the vampire's next turn. Success: Half damage only.

  • Wrathful Smite. Wisdom saving Throw: DC 16. Failure: [[/damage average activity=4FzfBHbSRL88wVHx]] damage, and the target has the &reference[Frightened] condition (save ends). Success: Half damage only.

Shocked.name: Shocked
Shocked.description: You are &reference[shocked apply=false] until the end of the your next turn.

Unholy Smite.name: Unholy Smite
Unholy Smite.description: You cannot regain Hit Points until the end of the crimson knight's next turn.

Wrathful Smite.name: Wrathful Smite
Wrathful Smite.description: 你陷入&reference[frightened apply=false]状态。你可以在自己每一回合结束时重复进行针对此效应的豁免检定，成功则终止该效应。

Unbridled Fury.name: Unbridled Fury
Unbridled Fury.description: Trigger: A creature hits the [[lookup @name lowercase]] with an attack. Response: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes a [[/item 5g1S8aYXJO5YzYOM]] attack against the attacker.

utility.condition: When a creature hits the vampire with an attack.

Charge.name: Charge
Charge.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves up to its Speed toward a Hostile creature it can see. If it ends this movement within 5 feet of the creature, it has Advantage on the next attack roll it makes against that creature before the end of its turn.

Spider Climb.name: Spider Climb
Spider Climb.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and if the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the &reference[Grappled] condition (escape DC 15).

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: Constitution Saving Throw: DC 15, one creature within 5 feet that is willing or has the &reference[Grappled apply=false], &reference[Incapacitated apply=false], or &reference[Restrained apply=false] condition. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] regains Hit Points equal to the Necrotic damage dealt.

save.target: A creature that is willing or has the Grappled, Incapacitated, or Restrained condition.

Shield.name: Shield
Shield.description: You gain the Armor Class benefit of a Shield only if you have training with it.

Shadow Step.name: Shadow Step
Shadow Step.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] teleports to an unoccupied space it can see within 60 feet.

Vampire Weaknesses.name: Vampire Weaknesses
Vampire Weaknesses.description:
As a vampire, this creature has the following weaknesses:

  • Forbiddance. The vampire can't enter a residence without an invitation from one of the occupants.

  • Harmed by Running Water. The vampire takes [[/damage activity=TXfKdpwrbcIMoY3l]] damage when it ends its turn in running water.

  • Stake to the Heart. If a Piercing weapon made of wood is driven into the vampire's heart while the vampire is Incapacitated in its resting place, the vampire is Paralyzed until the stake is removed.

  • Sunlight Hypersensitivity. The vampire takes [[/damage activity=agngcqt5cICRvCaw]] damage when it starts its turn in sunlight. While in sunlight, it has Disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

Running Water.name: Running Water
Running Water.condition: If the vampire ends their turn in running water.

Spider Climb.name: Spider Climb
Spider Climb.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: Constitution Saving Throw: DC 15, one creature within 5 feet that is willing or has the &reference[Grappled apply=false], &reference[Incapacitated apply=false], or &reference[Restrained apply=false] condition. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] regains Hit Points equal to the Necrotic damage dealt.

save.target: A creature that is willing or has the Grappled, Incapacitated, or Restrained condition.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes two attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of [[/item 74p7ZZtsNuUH8lOg]] or Spellcasting.

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and if the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the &reference[Grappled] condition (escape DC 15).

Charm Person.name: 魅惑类人
Charm Person.description:
One Humanoid you can see within range makes a Wisdom saving throw. It does so with Advantage if you or your allies are fighting it. On a failed save, the target has the &Reference[charmed apply=false] condition until the spell ends or until you or your allies damage it. The Charmed creature is Friendly to you. When the spell ends, the target knows it was Charmed by you.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You can target one additional creature for each spell slot level above 1.

Charmed.name: Charmed
Charmed.description: the target has the &Reference[charmed apply=false] condition until the spell ends or until you or your allies damage it. The Charmed creature is Friendly to you. When the spell ends, the target knows it was Charmed by you.

Disguise Self.name: Disguise Self
Disguise Self.description:
You make yourself—including your clothing, armor, weapons, and other belongings on your person—look different until the spell ends. You can seem 1 foot shorter or taller and can appear heavier or lighter. You must adopt a form that has the same basic arrangement of limbs as you have. Otherwise, the extent of the illusion is up to you.

The changes wrought by this spell fail to hold up to physical inspection. For example, if you use this spell to add a hat to your outfit, objects pass through the hat, and anyone who touches it would feel nothing.

To discern that you are disguised, a creature must take the Study action to inspect your appearance and succeed on an [[/check ability=int skill=inv dc=@attributes.spell.dc]] check against your spell save DC.

Disguised.name: Disguised
Disguised.description: To discern that you are disguised, a creature must take the Study action to inspect your appearance and succeed on an [[/check ability=int skill=inv]] check against your spell save DC.

Mage Hand.name: 法师之手
Mage Hand.description:
一只漂浮的幽灵手出现在施法距离内你指定的一点。幽灵手持续存在至法术终止。如果幽灵手距你的距离超过 30 尺，或者当你再次施展了该法术时，则现存的幽灵手消失不见。

你可以在施展该法术时使用幽灵手实施一个行为：你可以操控一个物件，或者打开一扇未上锁的门或容器，或者将一件物品放入或取出一个打开的容器，或者将小瓶中的内容物倾倒出来。

在后续的回合中，以一个魔法动作，你可以控制幽灵手再次实施一个行为。作为那个动作的一部分，你可以令幽灵手移动至多 30 尺。

该幽灵手不能攻击，也不能激活魔法物品或承载超过 10 磅重的物质。

Minor Illusion.name: Minor Illusion
Minor Illusion.description:
你在施法距离内创造一段声响或一个物件的影像，并使之维持至法术持续时间结束，详见以下对应效应的描述。你可以再次施展该法术来终止幻象。

生物用研究动作调查该声响或影像时，其必须进行一次对抗该法术豁免 DC 的[[/check ability=int skill=inv dc=@attributes.spelldc]]检定，检定成功则判断出是幻象。对于识破幻象的生物而言，幻象会变得模糊不清。

声响。 如果你创造一段声响，其音量可以是低声耳语也可以是高声尖叫。它可以是你或其他任何人的嗓音，或者是一头狮子的咆哮、一段鼓声以及任何你指定的其他声响。声响在持续时间内不会减弱，或者你也可以于法术终止前在不同的时间段创造几段分散的声响。

影像。 如果你创造一个物件的影像，比如一把椅子、泥泞的脚印、一个小箱子等，则该物件各方向上大小不得大于 5 尺立方区域。该影像不具有声音、光亮、味道或任何其他的感官效应。由于影像可以被任何物体穿透，因此与之进行物理互动时都会揭露其幻象的本质。

Animate Dead.name: Animate Dead
Animate Dead.description:
在施法距离内指定一具中型或小型类人生物遗骨或遗体。目标将变为一名亡灵生物：遗骨变为@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.actors24.Actor.phbmobSkeleton00]{骷髅}，遗体则变为@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.actors24.Actor.phbmobZombie0000]{丧尸}。

在你的每个回合内，你可以使用一个附赠动作并以精神命令操纵距离你 60 尺内，任何你用此法术制造的生物（如果你操纵多个生物，则你的命令可以同时传达给它们全部或是其中的某几个，不过每次只能为它们下达同一命令）。你决定被操纵生物下回合执行的动作和如何移动。或者，你也可以选择下达一条宽泛的命令（比如守护某个房间或走廊）。如果你没有下达命令，该生物将执行回避动作且只会为躲避危险而移动。一旦被下达命令，该生物会持续执行命令直到任务完成。

这些受操纵生物只会在 24 小时内服从你的命令，在之后，它们会停止遵守你下达的命令。若你想将对这些生物的控制时间再延长 24 小时，则你必须在当前 24 小时的时间段终止前再次对这些生物施展该法术。法术的此种用法只能延长你对至多四个你使用此法术所创造生物的控制时间，而不会创造新的生物。

升环施法：使用的法术位每比三环高一环，你就能多唤起两只亡灵生物，或是多延长对两只亡灵生物的控制。你无法用同一具骸骨或遗体唤起多个亡灵生物。

Arcane Eye.name: Arcane Eye
Arcane Eye.description:
你在施法距离内创造出一个漂浮在空中，不受伤害的隐形魔法眼。你通过精神连接接收秘法眼传来的视觉信息。秘法眼拥有 30 尺黑暗视觉且可以观察任何方向。

以一个附赠动作，你可以让秘法眼向任意方向移动 30 尺。固体障碍物会阻挡秘法眼的移动，但它可以穿过任何直径大于 1 寸的缝隙。

Mislead.name: Mislead
Mislead.description:
You gain the &Reference[Invisible apply=false] condition at the same time that an illusory double of you appears where you are standing. The double lasts for the duration, but the invisibility ends immediately after you make an attack roll, deal damage, or cast a spell.

As a Magic action, you can move the illusory double up to twice your Speed and make it gesture, speak, and behave in whatever way you choose. It is intangible and invulnerable.

You can see through its eyes and hear through its ears as if you were located where it is.

Invisible.name: Invisible
Invisible.description: 如果你发动攻击、造成伤害或施展法术，则终止该&Reference[invisible apply=false]效应。

Seeming.name: 伪装术
Seeming.description:
你选择施法距离内你能看见的任意数量生物，为他们提供一个虚假外观。不愿意受该法术影响的目标可以进行一次魅力豁免，豁免成功则不受该法术影响。

你可以为不同目标提供同样或不同的外观。法术能改变生物的身体和装备外观。你可以让目标看起来身高有 1 尺的增减，看上去更轻或更重。目标的新形貌的肢体结构必须与目标原形相符，但你可以随意改变其他的外观特征。法术会持续至时间结束。

此法术产生的变化无法应对物理检查。比如，你用此法术为一个生物添了一顶帽子，那么现实物件会穿过帽子。

一个使用&Reference[Study]{研究}动作来检查目标的生物可以进行一次智力（[[/check ability=int skill=inv dc=@attributes.spelldc]]{调查}）检定来对抗你的法术豁免 DC。如果它成功了，它会意识到目标进行了伪装。

Changed Appearance.name: Changed Appearance
Changed Appearance.description: A creature that takes the Study action to examine a target can make an [[/check ability=int skill=inv]] check against your spell save DC. If it succeeds, it becomes aware that the target is disguised.

Detect Thoughts.name: 侦测思想
Detect Thoughts.description:
你激活下述效应之一。直到法术结束为止，你可以在你随后的回合用一个魔法动作以激活下述任意效应之一。

感知思想。 你感知距你 30 尺内，知晓语言或能够心灵感应的思想的存在。你并不会阅读这些思想，但你知道这里存在一名有理智的生物。

此法术会被 1 尺厚的岩石、泥土或木头，1 寸厚的金属，或薄薄一层铅阻隔。

阅读思想。 选择一名距你 30 尺内的可见生物，或一名距你 30 尺内被感知思想侦测到的生物。你了解到此时目标最关心的事情。如果目标不知晓任何语言也不会心灵感应，则你不能得到任何信息。

在你的下一回合，用一个魔法动作，你可以尝试深入目标的心灵。如果你选择这么做，目标进行一次感知豁免。豁免失败，则你了解到他的逻辑推理、情绪状态以及他头脑中的一些大事（比如忧虑、挚爱和仇恨的事物）。豁免成功，法术终止。无论哪种情况，目标都会知道你正在窥探其心灵，且直到你的注意力从它的心灵上移开为止，目标均可以在其回合内使用动作进行一次 [[/check ability=int skill=arc dc=@attributes.spelldc]] 检定，对抗你的法术豁免DC，目标胜出对抗时，法术终止。

Invisibility.name: Invisibility
Invisibility.description:
A creature you touch has the &Reference[invisible apply=false] condition until the spell ends. The spell ends early immediately after the target makes an attack roll, deals damage, or casts a spell.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You can target one additional creature for each spell slot level above 2.

Invisible.name: 隐形
Invisible.description: 如果你进行攻击检定、造成伤害或施展法术，则该法术提前终止。

Arcanist's Magic Aura.name: Arcanist's Magic Aura
Arcanist's Magic Aura.description:
通过一次触及，你可以在一个自愿的生物或一个未被穿着或携带的物件上施加幻术。生物获得下述的面具效果，而物件获得下述的虚假灵光效果。该效果持续至法术的持续时间结束。如果你连续30天每天对同一目标施展此法术，该幻术将持续至被解除。

面具（生物）。选择一个不同于目标实际类型的生物类型。法术和其他魔法效应会将目标视为所选类型的生物。

虚假灵光（物件）。你改变目标在用于侦测魔法灵光的法术和魔法效应（例如侦测魔法）中的显现方式。你可以使一个非魔法物件看起来具有魔法，使一个魔法物品看起来非魔法，或者改变物件的灵光，使其看起来属于你选择的一个魔法学派。

Masked.name: Masked
Masked.description: Choose a creature type other than the target’s actual type. Spells and other magical effects treat the target as if it were a creature of the chosen type.

Major Image.name: Major Image
Major Image.description:
你创造一个影像，其形象来自一个大小不超过边长 20 尺立方体的物件或生物，或是其他的可视现象。影像出现在施法距离内你能看见的一处位置并在法术持续时间内维持存在。它看起来完全是真实的，并且还具有相应的声音、气味和温度。但它无法造成伤害或让人陷入任何状态。

在该幻象施法距离内时，你可以用一个魔法动作将影像移动到施法距离内的另一个位置。影像改变位置时，你可以改变影像的外表来使它移动得更自然。例如，如果你创造了一个生物的影像并移动它，则你可以改变影像，使它看起来就像是在走路。或者你也可以让影像在不同的时间发出不同的声音，甚至可以让它参与一场对话。

由于影像可以被穿过，任何与该影像进行的物理互动都会暴露其幻象的本质。一个生物用研究动作调查影像时，它可以进行一次对抗你的法术豁免 DC 的 [[/check ability=int skill=inv dc=@attributes.spelldc]] 检定，以判定是否看穿幻象。辨出幻象的生物可以看破该影像，而影像的其他感官效应在该生物看来会变得微弱而模糊。

升环施法： 使用高于三环的法术位时，法术时间持续至被解除且无需专注。

Nondetection.name: Nondetection
Nondetection.description: 法术持续时间内，你使你触及的目标不会被预言法术发现。目标可以是一名自愿生物，或者是在任何方向上都不超过 10 尺的一处地点或一个物件。目标不能被任何预言法术选为目标，也不能被魔法探知传感器感测到。

Suggestion.name: Suggestion
Suggestion.description:
你以魔法影响施法距离内一个你能看见的生物，并对其施以某种行动暗示（不超过 25 个词）。由你指定的受术目标必须能听到并理解你的话语。暗示必须听起来可行，也不涉及明显会对目标及其盟友造成伤害的内容。比如说，你可以说“把邪教的宝库钥匙找来，然后给我。”或者：“别打了，让图书馆保持安静，然后出去别回来。”

目标必须成功通过一次感知豁免，否则在法术持续时间内陷入&Reference[charmed]{魅惑}，若你或你的盟友对其造成伤害此法术将提前结束。被魅惑的生物会尽其所能地执行你所描述的行为。你所暗示的行为可能会在法术持续时间内始终一直进行，而如果你所暗示的活动可以用更短的时间完成，则此法术会在目标完成了你的要求后随即终止。

Pursuing Suggestion.name: Pursuing Suggestion
Pursuing Suggestion.description: The Charmed target pursues the suggestion to the best of its ability. The suggested activity can continue for the entire duration, but if the suggested activity can be completed in a shorter time, the spell ends for the target upon completing it.

Regeneration.name: Regeneration
Regeneration.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] regains 10 Hit Points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 Hit Point and isn't in sunlight or running water. If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes Radiant damage or damage from holy water, this trait doesn't function at the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn.

Death Toll.name: Death Toll
Death Toll.description: Wisdom Saving Throw: DC 16, one creature the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within 120 feet. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &reference[Weakened] condition (save ends). Success: Half damage only.

Squeak of Doom.name: Squeak of Doom
Squeak of Doom.description: Charisma Saving Throw: DC 16, each Hostile creature in a 60-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]] that can hear it. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage. Success: Half damage.

Tail Barbs.name: Tail Barbs
Tail Barbs.description: Trigger: A creature the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within 60 feet succeeds on a D20 Test. Response: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] forces the triggering creature to reroll the D20 Test and use the lower roll.

utility.condition: When a creature the ratling can see within 60 feet succeeds on a D20 Test.

Dispel Magic.name: 解除魔法
Dispel Magic.description:
在施法距离内指定一名生物、一个物件或一处魔法效应。所有影响该目标的三环或更低环阶法术即告终止。每个影响目标的四环或更高环阶法术都需要以你的施法属性进行一次属性检定（DC 10 + 目标法术环阶），检定成功时目标法术终止。

升环施法： 你直接终止影响目标的小于等于该施法环阶的法术效应。

Divination.name: Divination
Divination.description:
此法术让你得以与一名神祇或其仆人取得联络。你可以就某个未来 7 日内将要发生的特定目标、事件或活动提出一个问题。DM 将给予你真实的答复，这个答复可能是一段短语或一节神秘的短诗。此法术的回答并不会顾及所有可能影响结果的情况。例如其他法术的影响。

若你在完成一次长休前施展多于一次该法术，则法术有概率不给出任何结果。此概率从第二次施展起每次累计 25％。

Eyebite.name: Eyebite
Eyebite.description:
在法术持续时间内，你的眼睛变成漆黑虚空。一名你选择的，距离你 60 尺内且你可见的生物必须成功于进行一次感知豁免，否则将承受由你选择的下列效应之一直到法术结束。

在法术终止前你的每个回合内，你都可以使用一个魔法动作来指定另一个目标。不过你不能指定那些已经通过本次施展的该法术豁免的生物。

沉睡。目标陷入&Reference[unconscious]{昏迷}状态。其在受到任何伤害，或另一个生物使用一个动作摇晃它时，即可再次醒来。

惊慌。目标陷入&Reference[frightened]{恐慌}状态，它必须在其每个自己的回合内执行&Reference[dash]{疾走}动作并移动，且以最短、最安全的路径尽可能的逃离你，直至其无路可逃为止。如果目标移至一处距你至少 60 尺远且看不见你的空间，则此效应终止。

患病。目标陷入&Reference[poisoned]{中毒}状态。

Asleep.name: Asleep
Asleep.description: The target has the &Reference[Unconscious apply=false] condition. It wakes up if it takes any damage or if another creature takes an action to shake it awake.

Panicked.name: Panicked
Panicked.description: The target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition. On each of its turns, the Frightened target must take the &Reference[Dash] action and move away from you by the safest and shortest route available. If the target moves to a space at least 60 feet away from you where it can’t see you, this effect ends.

Scrying.name: 探知术
Scrying.description:
你能看见和听见一个和你处于同一存在位面上的生物。目标生物必须进行一次感知豁免；该豁免的调整值与你对目标的了解程度有关（见下文），也与你和目标之间的物理联系程度有关。目标不知道它进行此豁免在对抗什么，只是会感觉不自在。

你对目标的了解有… 豁免调整值
二手信息（你曾经听说过目标） +5
直接信息（你曾经见过目标） +0
熟悉（你对目标很了解） −5
你持有目标的… 豁免调整值
肖像或其他图像 −2
衣物或其他物品 −4
身体部位如头发或指甲 −10

如果对方豁免成功，则目标不受该法术影响，并且在 24 小时内你不能尝试探知同一个目标。

如果对方豁免失败，则你在目标身边 10 尺内创造出一个隐形的传感器。通过传感器，你可以身临其境地看见和听见周围的环境。传感器会跟随目标移动，并在法术持续时间内始终保持在目标 10 尺之内。在能够看到传感器的生物眼中，你的传感器是一个拳头大小的光球。

除生物之外，你也可以选择一个你以前见过的地点作为该法术的目标。这种情况下，传感器会出现在目标地点且不会移动。

Create Sensor.name: 创造探测器
Create Sensor.target: at target location or within 10 feet of target creature

Spirit Guardians.name: Spirit Guardians
Spirit Guardians.description:
在法术持续时间内，保护性的灵体环绕在你的周围 15 尺灵光范围内飞舞。如果你属于善良或中立阵营，则它们飘渺的身形看起来像是天使或妖精（由你选择）。如果你属于邪恶阵营，则它们将形如邪魔。

施展此法术时，你可以指定特定生物让其不受该法术影响。除此之外的生物在灵光区域内将受法术影响致速度被减半。当灵光进入一个生物的空间、一个生物进入灵光或在灵光内结束回合时，其必须进行一次感知豁免。豁免失败将受到 3d8 点光耀伤害（如果你属于善良或中立）或 3d8 点暗蚀伤害（如果你属于邪恶），豁免成功则只受到一半伤害。一名生物一回合仅需进行一次该豁免。

升环施法： 使用的法术位每比三环高一环，此法术的伤害就增加 1d8。

Half Speed.name: Half Speed
Half Speed.description: The creature's speed is halved while within the Emanation.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: [[/attack extended]]。[[/damage extended]]。

Ratling Cunning.name: Ratling Cunning
Ratling Cunning.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

Keen Smell.name: Keen Smell
Keen Smell.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

Electronic Data Network.name: Electronic Data Network
Electronic Data Network.description: A creature that starts its turn within 60 feet of [[lookup @name]] takes [[/damage average]] damage.

Immutable Form.name: Immutable Form
Immutable Form.description: [[lookup @name]] is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

Predictive Analytics.name: Predictive Analytics
Predictive Analytics.description:
At the end of each of [[lookup @name]]'s turns, it rolls 1d20 for each player character fighting it. The Algorithm can replace any D20 Test made by it or a creature it can see with one of these predictive rolls. It must choose to do so before the roll, and it can replace a roll in this way only once per turn.

Each predictive roll can be used only once. Any unused predictive rolls are lost at the start of [[lookup @name]]'s next turn.

Wire.name: Wire
Wire.description: Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 26, one creature [[lookup @name]] can see within 60 feet. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and if the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it has the &reference[Grappled] condition (escape DC 20). [[lookup @name]] can grapple up to six creatures at a time.

Algorithmic Manipulation.name: Algorithmic Manipulation
Algorithmic Manipulation.description: Strength Saving Throw: DC 26, one Huge or smaller creature or object [[lookup @name]] can see within 120 feet. Failure: [[lookup @nmae]] moves the target up to 30 feet in any direction, and the target has the &reference[Restrained] condition. If [[lookup @name]] lifts the target into the air, it is suspended there. The target remains held until [[lookup @name]] releases it (no action required), uses this Epic Action again, or has the &reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition.

Algorithmic Manipulation.name: Algorithmic Manipulation
Algorithmic Manipulation.description:
You are &reference[restrained apply=false]. If The Algorithm lifted you into the air with this Epic Action, you are suspended in place.

This effect ends if The Algorithm releases you (no action required), uses this Epic Action again, or has the &reference[incapacitated apply=false] condition.

Deatomization.name: Deatomization
Deatomization.description: Constitution Saving Throw: DC 26, one creature or object [[lookup @name]] can see within 300 feet. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage. If this damage reduces the target to 0 Hit Points, it dies and its body is reduced to atoms. Failure: Half damage.

Reprogram.name: Reprogram
Reprogram.description: Intelligence Saving Throw: DC 26, one creature &reference[Grappled apply=false] by [[lookup @name]]. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage. If this damage reduces the target to 0 Hit Points, it dies and its brain is replaced with mechanical components. The target reanimates at the start of its next turn as a Construct under [[lookup @name]]'s control. It resembles the original creature, but its eyes glow with synthetic green light, and its body is covered in protruding wires, metal scraps, and glowing tubes.

save.target: A creature grappled by The Algorithm

Reprogrammed.name: Reprogrammed
Reprogrammed.description: You have died and have had your brain replaced with mechanical components. You are a Construct under The Algorithm's control.

Assuming Direct Control.name: Assuming Direct Control
Assuming Direct Control.description: [[lookup @name]] targets a Construct within 120 feet and immediately enters and takes control of it. [[lookup @name]] can still use its Epic Actions as normal and replaces the Construct's game statistics with its own, except the Construct's Hit Points. When the Construct is reduced to 0 Hit Points, [[lookup @name]] reemerges in an unoccupied space within 15 feet of it.

Assumed Control.name: Assumed Control
Assumed Control.description:
The Algorithm has assumed direct control of this Construct.

The Algorithm can still use its Epic Actions as normal and replaces the Construct’s game statistics with its own, except the Construct’s Hit Points. When the Construct is reduced to 0 Hit Points, the Algorithm reemerges in an unoccupied space within 15 feet of it.

Epic Boss.name: 史诗 Boss
Epic Boss.description:
This creature is an Epic Boss, a unique foe designed to pose a solo threat to an entire adventuring party. As such, it has additional game rules that sets it apart from normal creatures:

[[lookup @name]] always takes their turn on Initiative count 20. On their turn, they can use their movement and interaction as normal. However, they do not take an action or Bonus Action on their turn unless forced to do so by a spell or other effect. Instead, [[lookup @name]] takes one of the following Epic Actions at the end of each player character's turn.

All this creature's actions are Epic Actions.

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.N2liLyxqY1fWwfHe.Item.j4YJw18EmsvPUbtN]{Wire}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.N2liLyxqY1fWwfHe.Item.VLNbD2FxSNYc5nR8]{Algorithmic Manipulation}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.N2liLyxqY1fWwfHe.Item.MR1XMwd7Q265BJwd]{Deatomization}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.N2liLyxqY1fWwfHe.Item.OxhmkRF8XdKmBuQP]{Reprogram}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.N2liLyxqY1fWwfHe.Item.XnilFTNPcyGCeTGk]{Assuming Direct Control}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.N2liLyxqY1fWwfHe.Item.B8NNNhrQVgKE5P4c]{Spellcasting}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.N2liLyxqY1fWwfHe.Item.ngtN58RFHJWhIh6I]{Epic Resistance}

Epic Boss.name: 史诗 Boss
Epic Boss.description:
This creature is an Epic Boss, a unique foe designed to pose a solo threat to an entire adventuring party. As such, it has additional game rules that sets it apart from normal creatures.

The creature always takes their turn on Initiative count 20. On their turn, they can use their movement and interaction as normal. However, they do not take an action or Bonus Action on their turn unless forced to do so by a spell or other effect. Instead, the creature takes one of the Epic Actions they have available.

Epic Resistance.name: Epic Resistance
Epic Resistance.description: [[lookup @name]]选选择一个正影响其的状态、法术或其他效应，并投掷[[/r 1d20]]。若结果为 11 或更高，其身上的该效应终止。即使[[lookup @name]]无法执行动作、被其他生物控制动作或被法术或效应改变其游戏数据卡，其也可以执行该动作。

Wish.name: 祈愿术
Wish.description:
祈愿术是凡间生物所能施展的最强大法术。你只需要大声说出自己的愿望就能改变现实世界本身。

法术最基础的用法是用来模仿任意一个八环或更低环阶的法术。如果你以此种方式使用该法术，你不需要满足目标法术所需的任何前提条件（包括有价值的材料成分）就可以让该法术生效。

作为另一种方式，你也可以选择让法术创造下列效应之一：

创造物件。你创造出一个价值不超过 25000GP 的物件，令其出现在地面上你能看见的一处未占据空间中。该物件不能是魔法物品，其在任意方向上的长度都不能超过 300 尺。

即刻治疗。你让你自己和至多二十个你可见的生物恢复全部生命值，并且终止它们身上一切在@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplGreaterRes]{高等复原术}中列举过的所有效应。

伤害抗性。你让至多十个你能看见的生物获得你所指定的一种伤害类型的抗性。此抗性是永久存在的。

免疫法术。你让最多十个你能看见的生物免疫于某道法术或某种其他魔法效应，持续 8 小时。

突来学识。你将你的一个专长替换为符合条件的另一个专长。你失去旧专长带来的全部好处，并获得新专长的好处。你无法取代作为你其他专长或特性先决条件的专长。

重新掷骰。你改变一件刚刚发生的事件。重掷前一轮（包括你的上一个回合）到现在期间的任意一次掷骰，并让现实随着你的新掷骰结果改变。例如，祈愿术以撤销队友的失败豁免或敌人的重击。你可以迫使重新进行的掷骰具有优势或劣势 ，并且可以选择是使用重投后的结果还是使用原来的结果。

重塑现实。你可能会许愿一些没有包含在上述效应中的东西。为了做到这样的效果，请尽可能准确地向地下城主描述你的愿望。在这种情况下，地下城主有极高的自由来裁决究竟会发生什么。不过愿望越大，出错的概率就越大。法术可能会直接失败，也可能部分的达成你想要的结果，还有可能因表述愿望时措辞不当而遭到意想不到的结果。例如，许愿让一个坏人死去可能会让你穿越到多年后该人已死的一个时间段，使你相当于离开了游戏一样。此外，许愿获取一件传说中的魔法物品或神器可能会立即将你传送到该物品当前的持有者身边。如果你许的愿望太过庞大，其效应影响到了社群、区域或是世界，你可能会引来强大的敌人。如果你的愿望会影响神，这名神的神仆会立刻干涉，阻止它或是鼓励你以一种特殊的方式许愿。如果你的愿望将会撤销多元宇宙本身，或是威胁到了印记城，或是以某种方式影响到了痛苦女士，你的心灵中就会浮现出一段她的影像：她摇了摇自己的脑袋，然后你的愿望失效了。

除了模仿其他法术外，施展该法术以达成的任何其他目的都会使你的身躯承受极大的负担，令你变得无比虚弱。承受负担后，直到你完成长休之前，你每次施展法术时都将受到一定伤害（伤害数值取决于你施展的法术的环阶，每环阶 1d10 点的暗蚀伤害），此伤害无法被任何方式减免。此外，你的力量属性值将变为 3，持续 2d4 日。这段时间内，你每花一整日休息（不从事轻度活动以外的行为），恢复需要的日数就减少 2 日。最后，承受负担时，你将有 [[/r 1d3cs1]]{33%} 的概率永远也无法再次施放祈愿术。

Wish Stress.name: Wish Stress
Wish Stress.description: Each time you cast a spell until you finish a Long Rest, you take [[/damage 1d10 type=necrotic]] damage per level of that spell. This damage can’t be reduced or prevented in any way. In addition, your Strength score becomes 3 for [[/r 2d4]] days.

Sending.name: 短讯术
Sending.description:
你向你所遇到过的或某人遇到过且向你描述的一个生物发送一小段二十五个词以内的信息。该生物将在心中听到你的信息，它可以认出你是发讯人（如果他认识你），还可以用同样的方式立即回复一条讯息。法术会让目标能够理解你短讯的信息。

你的传讯可以跨越任意长的距离，甚至能跨越位面。但如果目标和你不在同一个存在位面，则短讯术有 5% 的概率无法到达。如果法术没有到达，你会知晓。

在收到你的信息后，一个生物能够阻塞你在 8 小时内以这个法术对他发信的能力。如果你在这段时间内试图送出另一条信息，你会得知你的短讯被阻塞，并且法术失败。

Scrying.name: 探知术
Scrying.description:
你能看见和听见一个和你处于同一存在位面上的生物。目标生物必须进行一次感知豁免；该豁免的调整值与你对目标的了解程度有关（见下文），也与你和目标之间的物理联系程度有关。目标不知道它进行此豁免在对抗什么，只是会感觉不自在。

你对目标的了解有… 豁免调整值
二手信息（你曾经听说过目标） +5
直接信息（你曾经见过目标） +0
熟悉（你对目标很了解） −5
你持有目标的… 豁免调整值
肖像或其他图像 −2
衣物或其他物品 −4
身体部位如头发或指甲 −10

如果对方豁免成功，则目标不受该法术影响，并且在 24 小时内你不能尝试探知同一个目标。

如果对方豁免失败，则你在目标身边 10 尺内创造出一个隐形的传感器。通过传感器，你可以身临其境地看见和听见周围的环境。传感器会跟随目标移动，并在法术持续时间内始终保持在目标 10 尺之内。在能够看到传感器的生物眼中，你的传感器是一个拳头大小的光球。

除生物之外，你也可以选择一个你以前见过的地点作为该法术的目标。这种情况下，传感器会出现在目标地点且不会移动。

Create Sensor.name: 创造探测器
Create Sensor.target: at target location or within 10 feet of target creature

Fabricate.name: Fabricate
Fabricate.description:
你将一种原材料转化成该材料制作的成品。例如，你可以将一丛树木转化为一座木桥，一把麻草化为绳子，或是将亚麻和羊毛化作衣物。

指定施法距离内你能看见的原材料。只要有足够的材料，你就可以将他们转化为一件体型不超过大型的物件（至多占据 10 尺立方区域或八个相邻的 5 尺立方区域）。如果你的目标材料是金属、石料或者其他矿石材料，那么被制造的物件不能大于中型（至多占据 5 尺立方区域），制成品的质量和原材料质量相同。

该法术不能创造生物或魔法物品。你只有对制作某物品的工匠工具拥有熟练时，才能使用此法术去制作相应需要高工艺水平制作的物品，如武器、护甲等。

Dispel Magic.name: 解除魔法
Dispel Magic.description:
在施法距离内指定一名生物、一个物件或一处魔法效应。所有影响该目标的三环或更低环阶法术即告终止。每个影响目标的四环或更高环阶法术都需要以你的施法属性进行一次属性检定（DC 10 + 目标法术环阶），检定成功时目标法术终止。

升环施法： 你直接终止影响目标的小于等于该施法环阶的法术效应。

Antimagic Field.name: Antimagic Field
Antimagic Field.description:
An aura of antimagic surrounds you in 10-foot Emanation. No one can cast spells, take Magic actions, or create other magical effects inside the aura, and those things can't target or otherwise affect anything inside it. Magical properties of magic items don't work inside the aura or on anything inside it.

Areas of effect created by spells or other magic can't extend into the aura, and no one can teleport into or out of it or use planar travel there. Portals close temporarily while in the aura.

Ongoing spells, except those cast by an Artifact or a deity, are suppressed in the area. While an effect is suppressed, it doesn't function, but the time it spends suppressed counts against its duration.

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplDispelMagi]{Dispel Magic} has no effect on the aura, and the auras created by different Antimagic Field spells don't nullify each other.

Prismatic Wall.name: Prismatic Wall
Prismatic Wall.description:
一片闪烁的多彩光面构成一道垂直不透明的墙壁——至多 90 尺长、30 尺高、1 寸厚——以施法距离内一点为中心。或者，你可以将墙壁塑造成以施法距离内一点为中心、直径至多 30 尺的球体。墙壁持续至法术持续时间结束。如果你将墙壁置于被生物占据的空间，法术立即结束且不产生效果。

墙壁散发 100 尺的明亮光照和额外 100 尺的微光光照。你和你在施法时指定的生物可以无害地穿过墙壁并靠近它。如果其他能看见墙壁的生物移动到其 20 尺内或在那里开始其回合，该生物必须成功通过一次体质豁免，否则陷入目盲状态 1 分钟。

墙壁由七层组成，每层颜色不同。当生物伸手进入或穿过墙壁时，它会逐层穿过所有层。每层都迫使该生物进行一次敏捷豁免，否则受到该层属性的影响，如下表所述。

墙壁的 AC 为 10，可以按从红到紫的顺序逐层摧毁，每层有特定的摧毁方式。如果一层被摧毁，它在法术持续时间内消失。@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplAntimagicF]{反魔法场}对墙壁无效，@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplDispelMagi]{解除魔法}只能影响紫层。

虹光层
顺序效果
1红。 豁免失败：[[/damage 12d6 fire average]]伤害。豁免成功：伤害减半。额外效果：非魔法远程攻击无法穿过此层，此层若受到至少 25 点寒冷伤害则被摧毁。
2橙。 豁免失败：[[/damage 12d6 acid average]]伤害。豁免成功：伤害减半。额外效果：魔法远程攻击无法穿过此层，此层被强风（例如@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplGustofWind]{造风术}所造之风）摧毁。
3黄。 豁免失败：[[/damage 12d6 lightning average]]伤害。豁免成功：伤害减半。额外效果：此层若受到至少 60 点力场伤害则被摧毁。
4绿。 豁免失败：[[/damage 12d6 poison average]]伤害。豁免成功：伤害减半。额外效果：@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplPasswall00]{穿墙术}，或其他能在固体表面开启通道的同等或更高环阶法术会摧毁此层。
5蓝。 豁免失败：[[/damage 12d6 cold average]]伤害。豁免成功：伤害减半。额外效果：此层若受到至少 25 点火焰伤害则被摧毁。
6靛。 豁免失败：目标陷入束缚状态，并在其每个回合结束时进行一次[[/save ability=con dc=@attributes.spell.dc format=long]]。若其成功三次，该状态结束。若其失败三次，它将陷入石化状态，直至被如@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplGreaterRes]{高等复原术}之类的效果解救。成功与失败无需连续；分别记录直至目标集齐三次同类结果。额外效果：法术无法穿过此层，此层被@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplDaylight00]{昼明术}散发的明亮光照摧毁。
7紫。 豁免失败：目标陷入目盲状态，并在你下一回合开始时进行一次[[/save ability=wis dc=@attributes.spell.dc format=long]]。豁免成功则状态结束。豁免失败则状态结束，且该生物被传送至另一个存在位面（由 DM 选择）。额外效果：此层被@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplDispelMagi]{解除魔法}摧毁。

Blinding Save.name: Blinding Save
Blinding Save.range: measured from nearest point on wall or globe

Prismatic Blinding.name: Prismatic Blinding
Prismatic Blinding.description: The target has the &Reference[Blinded apply=false] condition for 1 minute.

Restrained (Indigo).name: Restrained (Indigo)
Restrained (Indigo).description: 你陷入&Reference[Restrained apply=false]状态，且每一回合结束进行一次[[/save ability=con dc=@attributes.spelldc format=long]]{体质豁免}。在累计三次豁免成功后，状态终止。在累计三次豁免失败后，你被转化为石头陷入 &Reference[Petrified] 状态，直至此状态被@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplGreaterRes]{高等复原术}或类似效应解除为止。成功或失败的检定不需要连续；只要记录各情况的次数直至其中一方累计三次为止。

Blinded (Violet).name: Blinded (Violet)
Blinded (Violet).description: The target has the &Reference[Blinded apply=false] condition and makes a [[/save ability=wis dc=@attributes.spell.dc format=long]] at the start of your next turn. On a successful save, the condition ends. On a failed save, the condition ends, and the creature teleports to another plane of existence (DM’s choice).

Reverse Gravity.name: Reverse Gravity
Reverse Gravity.description:
该法术以施法距离内一点为中心，创造一个半径 50 尺、高 100 尺的重力反转柱状区域。区域内所有未被固定在地面上的生物和物件都会向上落去，直到碰到该区域顶端为止。一名生物可以进行一次敏捷豁免以抓住一件他能触及的固定物件，从而避免向上坠落。

如果目标在坠落过程中撞上任何固体（比如天花板或被固定的物件），则坠落的物件和生物会受到同样情况下正常坠落时所会受到的冲击。如果一个物件或生物到达该区域的顶部并且没有撞到任何东西，则它将在持续时间内悬浮在该处。法术终止时，所有受术物件和受术生物向下坠落。

Wall of Force.name: Wall of Force
Wall of Force.description:
由力场构成的隐形力场墙出现在施法距离内你指定的一点上。这面力场墙的朝向由你决定：你可以使力场墙成为水平或垂直的结界，亦可以使它形成一定倾角。它可以浮在空中，也可以立于某个坚固表面其上。你可以将它塑成半球状或球状（半径最长 10 尺），也可以塑成一个由十个 10 尺×10 尺的方板块构成的平面，而每块板块都必须要和至少一块其他板块相连。不管形状如何，力场墙的厚度总是 1/4 寸。力场墙将持续存在至法术终止。如果力场墙形成时穿过了某个生物所占据的空间，则该生物会被推到力场墙的一侧（由你来决定是哪一侧）。

没有任何事物可以通过物理方式穿过力场墙。力场墙免疫所有伤害，也不能被@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplDispelMagi]{解除魔法}所解除，但法术 @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplDisintegra]{解离术}可以使其立即摧毁。力场墙能够延伸进以太位面，因此可以阻断进入以太位面穿过墙壁旅行。

Spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
Spellcasting.description: [[lookup @name]] casts one of the spells it knows, requiring no Material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 27).

Plague Symptoms.name: Plague Symptoms
Plague Symptoms.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is host to a disease created by a pathogenist, chosen from the options below. A creature infected by this disease is subjected to the chosen effect at the start of each of its turns. Constitution Saving Throw: DC 13. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target suffers the disease's effect. Third Success: The disease ends.

Coughing Fits. The target is unable to speak until the start of its next turn.

Fatigue. The target's Speed is reduced by 5 feet until the start of its next turn.

Shivers. The target shakes uncontrollably. Each time it fails it saving throw, it drops whatever it is holding.

Bile Spreader.name: Bile Spreader
Bile Spreader.description: Constitution Saving Throw: DC 13, each creature in a 15-foot Cone. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target is infected with the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s Plague Symptoms. Success: Half damage only.

Plague Symptom: Coughing Fits.name: Plague Symptom: Coughing Fits
Plague Symptom: Coughing Fits.description:
You have been infected with a disease. While diseased, you must succeed on a [[/save 13 con]] saving throw at the start of each of your turns or take [[/damage 4d8 average necrotic]] damage and be unable to speak until the start of your next turn.

If you succeed against your saving throw against this disease three times, the disease ends.

Plague Symptom: Fatigue.name: Plague Symptom: Fatigue
Plague Symptom: Fatigue.description:
You have been infected with a disease. While diseased, you must succeed on a [[/save 13 con]] saving throw at the start of each of your turns or take [[/damage 4d8 average necrotic]] damage on a failed save and your movement speed is reduced by 5 feet until the start of your next turn.

If you succeed against your saving throw against this disease three times, the disease ends.

Plague Symptom: Shivers.name: Plague Symptom: Shivers
Plague Symptom: Shivers.description:
You have been infected with a disease. While diseased, you must succeed on a [[/save 13 con]] saving throw at the start of each of your turns or take [[/damage 4d8 average necrotic]] damage on a failed save and drop whatever you are holding as you shake uncontrollably.

If you succeed against your saving throw against this disease three times, the disease ends.

Festering Bite.name: Festering Bite
Festering Bite.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]]. Constitution Saving Throw: DC 13. Failure: The target is infected with the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.NL61CL1wkTF2lovv.Item.c6feCPrLBtw69ivS]{Plague Symptoms}.

Plague Symptom: Coughing Fits.name: Plague Symptom: Coughing Fits
Plague Symptom: Coughing Fits.description:
You have been infected with a disease. While diseased, you must succeed on a [[/save 13 con]] saving throw at the start of each of your turns or take [[/damage 4d8 average necrotic]] damage and be unable to speak until the start of your next turn.

If you succeed against your saving throw against this disease three times, the disease ends.

Plague Symptom: Fatigue.name: Plague Symptom: Fatigue
Plague Symptom: Fatigue.description:
You have been infected with a disease. While diseased, you must succeed on a [[/save 13 con]] saving throw at the start of each of your turns or take [[/damage 4d8 average necrotic]] damage on a failed save and your movement speed is reduced by 5 feet until the start of your next turn.

If you succeed against your saving throw against this disease three times, the disease ends.

Plague Symptom: Shivers.name: Plague Symptom: Shivers
Plague Symptom: Shivers.description:
You have been infected with a disease. While diseased, you must succeed on a [[/save 13 con]] saving throw at the start of each of your turns or take [[/damage 4d8 average necrotic]] damage on a failed save and drop whatever you are holding as you shake uncontrollably.

If you succeed against your saving throw against this disease three times, the disease ends.

Incorporeal Movement.name: Incorporeal Movement
Incorporeal Movement.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can move through other creatures and objects as if they were &reference[DifficultTerrain]. It takes [[/damage average]] damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

Nightmare Pattern.name: Nightmare Pattern
Nightmare Pattern.description: Intelligence Saving Throw: DC 14, each creature in a 30-foot Cube centered on a point the arcane wraith can see. Failure: The target has the &reference[Blinded] condition (save ends). While Blinded, the target has the &reference[Immobilized] condition. The effect ends for the target if it takes damage or another creature takes an action to shake it out of its nightmare. When the effect ends, the target takes [[/damage average]] damage.

Nightmare Pattern.name: Nightmare Pattern
Nightmare Pattern.description:
你陷入&reference[blinded apply=false]状态。以此方式陷入目盲时，你同时陷入&reference[immobilized apply=false]状态。你可以在自己每一回合结束时重复进行针对此效应的豁免检定，成功则终止该效应。

若目标受到伤害或者有其他生物使用动作将其从噩梦中唤醒，则该效应终止。当效应终止时，你受到[[/damage average 4d6 psychic]]伤害。

Comet Shard.name: Comet Shard
Comet Shard.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and the target is pushed 10 feet away from the [[lookup @name lowercase]]

Invisible Mage Hand.name: Invisible Mage Hand
Invisible Mage Hand.description:
一只漂浮的幽灵手出现在施法距离内你指定的一点。幽灵手持续存在至法术终止。如果幽灵手距你的距离超过 30 尺，或者当你再次施展了该法术时，则现存的幽灵手消失不见。

你可以在施展该法术时使用幽灵手实施一个行为：你可以操控一个物件，或者打开一扇未上锁的门或容器，或者将一件物品放入或取出一个打开的容器，或者将小瓶中的内容物倾倒出来。

在后续的回合中，以一个魔法动作，你可以控制幽灵手再次实施一个行为。作为那个动作的一部分，你可以令幽灵手移动至多 30 尺。

该幽灵手不能攻击，也不能激活魔法物品或承载超过 10 磅重的物质。

Minor Illusion.name: Minor Illusion
Minor Illusion.description:
你在施法距离内创造一段声响或一个物件的影像，并使之维持至法术持续时间结束，详见以下对应效应的描述。你可以再次施展该法术来终止幻象。

生物用研究动作调查该声响或影像时，其必须进行一次对抗该法术豁免 DC 的[[/check ability=int skill=inv dc=@attributes.spelldc]]检定，检定成功则判断出是幻象。对于识破幻象的生物而言，幻象会变得模糊不清。

声响。 如果你创造一段声响，其音量可以是低声耳语也可以是高声尖叫。它可以是你或其他任何人的嗓音，或者是一头狮子的咆哮、一段鼓声以及任何你指定的其他声响。声响在持续时间内不会减弱，或者你也可以于法术终止前在不同的时间段创造几段分散的声响。

影像。 如果你创造一个物件的影像，比如一把椅子、泥泞的脚印、一个小箱子等，则该物件各方向上大小不得大于 5 尺立方区域。该影像不具有声音、光亮、味道或任何其他的感官效应。由于影像可以被任何物体穿透，因此与之进行物理互动时都会揭露其幻象的本质。

Booster Dose.name: Booster Dose
Booster Dose.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] administers a tincture to a Friendly creature it can see within 5 feet that isn't a Construct, choosing from the effects below. Once a creature benefits from a tincture, it can't gain that benefit again until it finishes a Short or Long Rest.

  • Adrenaline Rush. The target can use its Reaction to move up to its Speed without provoking Opportunity Attacks or make one weapon attack with Advantage.

  • Inoculation. The injector chooses Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, Necrotic, or Poison damage. The target gains Resistance to the chosen damage type for 1 minute.

  • Restorative Fluid. The target regains 35 (10d6) Hit Points. If the target is already at its Hit Point Maximum, it gains these as Temporary Hit Points instead.

  • Focus. The target has the &reference[Valor] condition (1d4) for 1 minute.

Valor (1d4).name: Valor (1d4)
Valor (1d4).description: You add 1d4 to your attack rolls and saving throws.

Unstable Tank.name: Unstable Tank
Unstable Tank.description: Trigger: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] would take damage. Response: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] reduces that damage to 0, and one of its tanks violently explodes. The injector chooses one of the effects of its Syringe or Booster Dose. Each creature within 20 feet of it is affected as if the Injector hit it with its Syringe or used Booster Dose on it. The injector can't use that effect until it finishes a Long Rest.

utility.condition: When the injector takes damage.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes four [[/item 6H7Q3Re3obNK8nzF]] attacks. It can replace any number of attacks with uses of [[/item pKAfzkRftSgP2QyY]] instead.

Syringe.name: Syringe
Syringe.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and the target is subjected to one of the following effects (roll 1d4; reroll if the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has already used that effect during this turn):

  1. Lethal Injection. The target takes [[/damage average activity=tUPNDunGptq1n28d]] damage.

  2. Numbing Solution. The target takes [[/damage average activity=sOop6rJeVBamT9xJ]] damage and is subjected to the following effect: Constitution Saving Throw: DC 16. Failure: The target has the &reference[Frozen] condition (DC 16).

  3. Mind Dampener. The target takes [[/damage average activity=FLeuTkzkFqf1er5V]] damage and is subjected to the following effect: Intelligence Saving Throw: DC 16. Failure: The target has the &reference[Bewildered] condition (save ends).

  4. Induced Necrosis. The target takes [[/damage average activity=FME0KuzEV2ZKLDHu]] damage and is subjected to the following effect: Strength Saving Throw: DC 16. Failure: The target has the &reference[Weakened] condition (save ends).

Frozen (DC 16).name: Frozen (DC 16)
Frozen (DC 16).description:
You're partially encased in ice:

  • You are &reference[Immobilized apply=false] & &reference[Defenseless apply=false].

  • You're &reference[Helpless apply=false] against attacks made with a weapon that deals bludgeoning damage.

  • You or another creature can take an action to break the ice away. To do so, you must succeed on a [[/check 16 str ath]] check.

Dampened Mind.name: Dampened Mind
Dampened Mind.description: 你陷入&reference[bewildered apply=false]状态。你可以在自己每一回合结束时重复进行针对此效应的豁免检定，成功则终止该效应。

Induced Necrosis.name: Induced Necrosis
Induced Necrosis.description: 你陷入&reference[weakened apply=false]状态。你可以在自己每一回合结束时重复进行针对此效应的豁免检定，成功则终止该效应。

Head Count.name: Head Count
Head Count.description: The [[lookup @name]] can't make more Bite or Spit Acid attacks each round than it has heads, and each head can only be used to make one Bite or Spit Acid attack each round.

Multiple Heads.name: Multiple Heads
Multiple Heads.description:
Total Living Heads: [[lookup @flags.world.kingkillerhydrahead]]

The [[lookup @name]] has five heads. Whenever the [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes 25 damage or more in a single turn, one of its heads dies. The []lookup @name lowercase]] dies if all of its heads are dead.

Reactive Heads.name: Reactive Heads
Reactive Heads.description: For each head the [[lookup @name]] has beyond one, it gets an extra Reaction that can be used only for Opportunity Attacks.

Wakeful.name: Wakeful
Wakeful.description: While the [[lookup @name]] sleeps, at least one of its heads is awake.

Grow Heads.name: Grow Heads
Grow Heads.description: The [[lookup @name]] can only perform this Epic Action if one or more of its heads died this round, unless the head was killed by Fire damage. The [[lookup @name]] grows two heads, and regains 20 Hit Points.

Hydra Head.name: Hydra Head
Hydra Head.description: The hydra has a living head. This head dies if the hydra takes 25 or more damage in a single turn.

Hydra Fury.name: Hydra Fury
Hydra Fury.description: The [[lookup @name]] makes one Bite attack or one Spit Acid attack for each head that hasn't yet made an attack this round.

Trample.name: Trample
Trample.description: The [[lookup @name]] moves up to its Speed without provoking Opportunity Attacks. During this movement, it can move through the spaces of Huge or smaller creatures. Each creature the [[lookup @name]] moves over is subjected to the following effect. Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 22. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &reference[Prone] condition.

Epic Boss.name: 史诗 Boss
Epic Boss.description:
This creature is an Epic Boss, a unique foe designed to pose a solo threat to an entire adventuring party. As such, it has additional game rules that sets it apart from normal creatures:

The [[lookup @name]] always takes their turn on Initiative count 20. On their turn, they can use their movement and interaction as normal. However, they do not take an action or Bonus Action on their turn unless forced to do so by a spell or other effect. Instead, the [[lookup @name]] takes one of the following Epic Actions at the end of each player character's turn.

All this creature's actions are Epic Actions.

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.O1QZSIKKbkR2z9IC.Item.HjTN7vwenNQNGSR2]{Bite}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.O1QZSIKKbkR2z9IC.Item.mWO7cQWd9Rubti0H]{Spit Acid}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.O1QZSIKKbkR2z9IC.Item.mMQ9cwrmMOVNt4Tc]{Grow Heads}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.O1QZSIKKbkR2z9IC.Item.GFotYm0zjXreVP5w]{Hydra Fury}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.O1QZSIKKbkR2z9IC.Item.NrZQQVITU82YORJF]{Trample}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.O1QZSIKKbkR2z9IC.Item.kfgPRrciqwxgD5pR]{Tail}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.O1QZSIKKbkR2z9IC.Item.NFgUjbflrneAK0wF]{Epic Resistance}

Epic Resistance.name: Epic Resistance
Epic Resistance.description: [[lookup @name]]选选择一个正影响其的状态、法术或其他效应，并投掷[[/r 1d20]]。若结果为 11 或更高，其身上的该效应终止。即使[[lookup @name]]无法执行动作、被其他生物控制动作或被法术或效应改变其游戏数据卡，其也可以执行该动作。

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]].

Spit Acid.name: Spit Acid
Spit Acid.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and the target has the &reference[Burning] condition (8d4 Acid). While Burning, the target has the &reference[Blinded] condition.

Burning (8d4 Acid).name: Burning (8d4 Acid)
Burning (8d4 Acid).description:
You are &reference[burning apply=false] from being covered in acid.

  • At the end of each of your turns, you take [[/damage average acid 8d4]] damage.

  • The condition ends if you or another creature within 5 feet of you spends an action to scrape off the acid or if some other effect removes it.

While Burning in this way, you are also &reference[blinded apply=false]

Corrosive Aura.name: Corrosive Aura
Corrosive Aura.description: The area within 30 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is filled with corrosive fumes and is &reference[LightlyObscured]. A creature that starts its turn in the fumes takes [[/damage average]] damage.

Tail.name: Tail
Tail.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and the target is pushed up to 20 feet away from the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Hydra Head.name: Hydra Head
Hydra Head.description: The hydra has a living head. This head dies if the hydra takes 25 or more damage in a single turn.

Crone Songs.name: Crone Songs
Crone Songs.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] sings a magical melody in a 60-foot Emanation, choosing one of the following effects. Allies of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] are unaffected.

  • Breakneck Hymn. Each creature in the Emanation that can hear the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Vulnerability to Bludgeoning damage from falling until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn.

  • Disarming Tune. Charisma Saving Throw: DC 15, each creature in the Emanation that can hear the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. Failure: The target has the &reference[Weakened] condition until the start of the harpy’s next turn.

  • Mesmerizing Melody. Wisdom Saving Throw: DC 15, each creature in the Emanation that can hear the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &reference[Slowed] condition until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn.

  • Piercing Notes. Constitution Saving Throw: DC 15, each creature in the Emanation that can hear the harpy. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage. Success: Half damage.

Disarming Tune.name: Disarming Tune
Disarming Tune.description: You are &reference[weakened apply=false] until the start of the harpy's next turn.

Mesmerizing Melody.name: Mesmerizing Melody
Mesmerizing Melody.description: You are &reference[slowed apply=false ] until the start of the harpy's next turn.

Breakneck Hymn.name: Breakneck Hymn
Breakneck Hymn.description: You have Vulnerability to Bludgeoning damage from falling until the start of the harpy's next turn.

Shield Shove.name: Shield Shove
Shield Shove.description: Strength Saving Throw: DC 13, one creature within reach of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. Failure: The target is pushed 5 feet away from the [[lookup @name lowercase]] and has the &reference[Prone] condition.

Keen Smell.name: Keen Smell
Keen Smell.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

Pack Tactics.name: Pack Tactics
Pack Tactics.description: 若[[lookup @name lowercase]]的攻击目标生物周围 5 尺范围内存在有至少一个未失能的盟友，则[[lookup @name lowercase]]对该生物进行的攻击检定具有优势。

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]].
