Bloodthirsty.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Advantage on attack rolls against a target with the &reference[Bloodied] or &reference[Bleeding apply=false] condition.

Spectral Weapon.name: Spectral Weapon
Spectral Weapon.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and the target suffers one of the following effects of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s choice (the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can't select the same option more than once per turn):

  • Poison. The target takes an extra [[/damage average activity=LCcpQ1DiDm9Kh9a7]] damage and has the &reference[Poisoned] condition (save ends, Constitution Saving Throw: DC 16).

  • Open Wounds. The target has the &reference[Bleeding] condition (3d6).

  • Mindmuddler. The target has the Bewildered condition (save ends, Intelligence Saving Throw: DC 16).

Poison.name: Poison
Poison.description: You are &reference[poisoned apply=false]. You can make a [[/save 16 con]] saving throw against this effect at the end of each of your turns, ending the effect on a success.

Mindmuddler.name: Mindmuddler
Mindmuddler.description: You are &reference[bewildered apply=false]. You can make a [[/save 16 int]] saving throw against this effect at the end of each of your turns, ending the effect on a success.

Bleeding (3d6).name: Bleeding (3d6)
Bleeding (3d6).description:
You're losing blood to an open wound.

  • Ongoing Damage: At the end of each of your turns, you lose [[/r 3d6]] Hit Points.

  • Regaining Hit Points: This condition ends if you regain any Hit Points.

  • Medical Treatment: You or another creature within 5 feet of you can spend an action and use a Healer's Kit to staunch the bleeding (no check required), ending the condition.

Spectral Dodge.name: Spectral Dodge
Spectral Dodge.description: Trigger: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes damage. Response: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] gains Resistance to that damage, then moves up to its Speed without provoking Opportunity Attacks.

utility.condition: When the night blade takes damage.

Meld Into Shadow.name: Meld Into Shadow
Meld Into Shadow.description: In &reference[DimLight] or &reference[Darkness], the [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplInvisibili] on itself, requiring no components and using Charisma as its spellcasting ability.

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and if the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the &reference[Grappled] condition (escape DC 16).

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes two attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of [[/item z00JSdhG6x1cL4Px]].

Spider Climb.name: Spider Climb
Spider Climb.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

Vampire Weaknesses.name: Vampire Weaknesses
Vampire Weaknesses.description:
As a vampire, this creature has the following weaknesses:

  • Forbiddance. The vampire can't enter a residence without an invitation from one of the occupants.

  • Harmed by Running Water. The vampire takes [[/damage activity=TXfKdpwrbcIMoY3l]] damage when it ends its turn in running water.

  • Stake to the Heart. If a Piercing weapon made of wood is driven into the vampire's heart while the vampire is Incapacitated in its resting place, the vampire is Paralyzed until the stake is removed.

  • Sunlight Hypersensitivity. The vampire takes [[/damage activity=agngcqt5cICRvCaw]] damage when it starts its turn in sunlight. While in sunlight, it has Disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

Running Water.name: Running Water
Running Water.condition: If the vampire ends their turn in running water.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: Constitution Saving Throw: DC 15, one creature within 5 feet that is willing or has the &reference[Grappled apply=false], &reference[Incapacitated apply=false], or &reference[Restrained apply=false] condition. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] regains Hit Points equal to the Necrotic damage dealt.

save.target: A creature that is willing or has the Grappled, Incapacitated, or Restrained condition.

Invisibility.name: Invisibility
Invisibility.description:
A creature you touch has the &Reference[invisible apply=false] condition until the spell ends. The spell ends early immediately after the target makes an attack roll, deals damage, or casts a spell.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You can target one additional creature for each spell slot level above 2.

Invisible.name: 隐形
Invisible.description: 如果你进行攻击检定、造成伤害或施展法术，则该法术提前终止。

Regeneration.name: Regeneration
Regeneration.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] regains 10 Hit Points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 Hit Point and isn't in sunlight or running water. If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes Radiant damage or damage from holy water, this trait doesn't function at the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes two [[/item .Z9LDz6cz2zA9uKiA]] attacks and one [[/item .kgTrM2wpHDv8hCi5]] attack.

Infectious Bite.name: Infectious Bite
Infectious Bite.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and if the target is a creature, it is subjected to the following effect. Constitution Saving Throw: DC 14. Failure: The target is infected with a disease called Dark Decay. Instead of acting normally on its turn, the target must move toward the closest creature that isn't infected with Dark Decay and make one melee attack against it. If the attack hits, the target of that attack must also make a saving throw against Dark Decay. At the end of each of its turns, the target repeats the save. Subsequent Failures: The target gains one &reference[drakkenheimContamination] level. Third Success: The disease ends.

An infected creature that dies or undergoes a Monstrous Transformation becomes a @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.OAuzVKeBBG5dnNMY]. A @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplLesserRest] spell or similar magic that removes diseases ends Dark Decay, as does any magic that removes Contamination levels.

Dark Decay.name: Dark Decay
Dark Decay.description:
You are infected with a disease called Dark Decay. Instead of acting normally on your turn, you must move toward the closest creature that isn't infected with Dark Decay and make one melee attack against it. If the attack hits, the target of the attack must also make a saving throw against Dark Decay.

At the end of each of your turns, you repeat your saving throw, gaining a Contamination level on subsequent failed saves. After you succeed on three saving throws against this effect, the disease ends.

If you die or undergo a Monstrous Transformation, you become a Dark Growth Shambler. A @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplLesserRest]{Lesser Restoration} spell or similar magic that removes disease ends Dark Decay, as does any magic that removes Contamination levels.

Abrupt Decay.name: Abrupt Decay
Abrupt Decay.description: Trigger: The dark growth shambler drops to 0 Hit Points and it hasn’t taken Fire damage this round. Response: The dark growth shambler creates a @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.OW8gIxvValK75uI4] in its space.

summon.condition: When the dark growth shambler drops to 0 Hit Points and it hasn't taken Fire damage this round.

Normal Semblance.name: Normal Semblance
Normal Semblance.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Advantage on Charisma (Deception) checks to disguise itself as, or impersonate, a humanoid creature.

Cunning Action.name: Cunning Action
Cunning Action.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

Mimicry.name: Mimicry
Mimicry.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can mimic any sounds it has heard, including voices. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful [[/check insight wis 14]] check.

Regeneration.name: Regeneration
Regeneration.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] regains 10 Hit Points at the start of its turn. If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes Fire or Radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies only if it starts its turn with 0 Hit Points and doesn't regenerate.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes three attacks: two with its [[/item oZ6tI3KhtcpYq4vl]] and one with its [[/item 5P8qLAqflG5xwlxm]].

Entangling Vines.name: Entangling Vines
Entangling Vines.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and the target has the &reference[Grappled] condition (escape DC 15) and the target has the &reference[Restrained] condition until the grapple ends.

Entangling Vines.name: Entangling Vines
Entangling Vines.description: You are &reference[grappled apply=false] (escape DC 15). While grappled in this way, you are also &reference[restrained apply=false].

Contaminated Rend.name: Contaminated Rend
Contaminated Rend.description: Constitution Saving Throw: DC 15, one creature within 5 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target gains one &reference[drakkenheimContamination] level.

Octarine Breath.name: Octarine Breath
Octarine Breath.description: Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 15, each creature in a 30-foot Cone. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage. Success: Half damage.

Dimension Hop.name: Dimension Hop
Dimension Hop.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] teleports to an unoccupied space it can see within 30 feet.

Aberrant Traits.name: Aberrant Traits
Aberrant Traits.description:
Given the contamination and delerium present within the Space Between Worlds, all creatures who dwell there are the product of contamination and unaffected by the normal dangers of delerium. As an aberrant, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has the following traits:

  • Fully Contaminated. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is immune to &reference[drakkenheimContamination] and has Advantage on saving throws against contaminated spells. This creature may cast contaminated spells even though it does not gain Contamination levels.

  • Delerium Healing. As an action, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can touch a delerium shard to regain 10 (3d6) Hit Points. Once the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has used a delerium shard in this way, the shard can't be used in this manner again for 24 hours.

  • Alien Intellect. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is immune to any effect that would sense its emotions or read its thoughts, as well as any divination spell that it refuses. Wisdom (Insight) checks made to ascertain the [[lookup @name lowercase]]s intentions or sincerity have Disadvantage.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]].

Mindfire.name: Mindfire
Mindfire.description: Wisdom Saving Throw: DC 20, one creature the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within 120 feet. Failure: The target takes [[/damage average]] damage and has the &reference[Burning] condition (2d8 Psychic). Success: Half damage only.

Burning (2d8 Psychic).name: Burning (2d8 Psychic)
Burning (2d8 Psychic).description:
You are &reference[burning apply=false] from being covered in psychic fire.

  • At the end of each of your turns, you take [[/damage average psychic 2d8]] damage.

  • The condition ends if you or another creature within 5 feet of you spends an action to douse the psychic flames or if some other effect removes it.

Terrifying Roar.name: Terrifying Roar
Terrifying Roar.description: Wisdom Saving Throw: DC 21, each creature in a 120-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]] that can hear it. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &reference[Frightened] condition (save ends).

Terrifying Roar.name: Terrifying Roar
Terrifying Roar.description: 你陷入&reference[frightened apply=false]状态。你可以在自己每一回合结束时重复进行针对此效应的豁免检定，成功则终止该效应。

Breathe Deep.name: Breathe Deep
Breathe Deep.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s Breath Weapon recharges. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can only use this Epic Action if it's the first Epic Action it has taken this round.

Spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
Spellcasting.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts one of the spells it knows, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 20).

Draconic Rebuke.name: Draconic Rebuke
Draconic Rebuke.description: Trigger: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] becomes &reference[Bloodied]. It can use this Reaction even if it has the &reference[Incapacitated] condition or is otherwise unable to take Reactions. Response: All conditions and spells on the dragon immediately end unless it chooses to be affected by them, and it can move up to its Fly Speed without provoking Opportunity Attacks and ignoring &reference[DifficultTerrain]. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] recharges and immediately uses its [[/item L6inYQA9ab9oGhpf]].

utility.condition: When the dragon becomes bloodied.

Aberrant Traits.description:
Given the contamination and delerium present within the Space Between Worlds, all creatures who dwell there are the product of contamination and unaffected by the normal dangers of delerium. As an aberrant, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has the following traits:

  • Alien Intellect. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is immune to any effect that would sense its emotions or read its thoughts, as well as any divination spell that it refuses. Wisdom (Insight) checks made to ascertain the [[lookup @name lowercase]]s intentions or sincerity have Disadvantage.

Haze Aura.name: Haze Aura
Haze Aura.description: A creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes [[/damage average]] damage.

Epic Boss.name: 史诗 Boss
Epic Boss.description:
This creature is an Epic Boss, a unique foe designed to pose a solo threat to an entire adventuring party. As such, it has additional game rules that sets it apart from normal creatures:

The [[lookup @name lowercase]] always takes their turn on Initiative count 20. On their turn, they can use their movement and interaction as normal. However, they do not take an action or Bonus Action on their turn unless forced to do so by a spell or other effect. Instead, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes one of the following Epic Actions at the end of each player character's turn.

All this creature's actions are Epic Actions.

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.P0URDRWFMJQR7s5q.Item.H1DH61jxii82nbHN]{Claw}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.P0URDRWFMJQR7s5q.Item.auybhIqh8RK59xzW]{Bite}

Epic Boss.name: 史诗 Boss
Epic Boss.description:
This creature is an Epic Boss, a unique foe designed to pose a solo threat to an entire adventuring party. As such, it has additional game rules that sets it apart from normal creatures.

The creature always takes their turn on Initiative count 20. On their turn, they can use their movement and interaction as normal. However, they do not take an action or Bonus Action on their turn unless forced to do so by a spell or other effect. Instead, the creature takes one of the Epic Actions they have available.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and if the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the &reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC 22). While Grappled, the target has the &reference[Restrained] condition.

Grappled by Bite.name: Grappled by Bite
Grappled by Bite.description: You are &reference[grappled apply=false] (escape DC 22). While grappled in this way, you are also &reference[restrained apply=false].

Tail.name: Tail
Tail.description: Strength Saving Throw: DC 22, one creature within 20 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and if the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the &reference[Prone] condition.

Epic Resistance.name: Epic Resistance
Epic Resistance.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] chooses one condition, spell, or other effect currently affecting them and rolls [[/r 1d20]]. On an 11 or higher, the effect ends on them. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can use this Epic Action even if they would otherwise be unable to take actions, their actions are being controlled by another creature, or if a spell or effect alters their game statistics.

Breath Weapon.name: Breath Weapon
Breath Weapon.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can only use this Epic Action if it’s the last Epic Action it takes this round. It chooses one of the following effects:

  • Mutation Breath. Constitution Saving Throw: DC 21, each creature in a 120-foot Cone. Failure: [[/damage average activity=SwA8rsAJ8l7kUJtv]] damage, and the target gains one &reference[drakkenheimContamination] level. Instead of rolling to determine if it gains a mutation, the target automatically gains a mutation. Success: Half damage only.

  • Madness Breath. Intelligence Saving Throw: DC 21, each creature in a 120-foot Cone. Failure: [[/damage average activity=XP1bjOnPtpgalyG6]] damage, and the target has the &reference[Dazed] condition (save ends). Failure by 5 or More: [[/damage average 24d10 psychic]] damage, and the target instead has the &reference[Incapacitated] condition (save ends). Success: Half damage only.

  • Wild Magic Breath. Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 21, each creature in a 120-foot long, 5-foot wide Line. Failure: [[/damage average activity=e6BCIDaJZTBLpmP5]] damage, and the target triggers an Arcane Anomaly centered on itself. Success: Half damage only.

Madness Breath: Dazed.name: Madness Breath: Dazed
Madness Breath: Dazed.description: 你陷入&reference[dazed apply=false]状态。你可以在自己每一回合结束时重复进行针对此效应的豁免检定，成功则终止该效应。

Madness Breath: Incapacitated.name: Madness Breath: Incapacitated
Madness Breath: Incapacitated.description: 你陷入&reference[incapacitated apply=false]状态。你可以在自己每一回合结束时重复进行针对此效应的豁免检定，成功则终止该效应。

Dimension Door.name: Dimension Door
Dimension Door.description:
You teleport to a location within range. You arrive at exactly the spot desired. It can be a place you can see, one you can visualize, or one you can describe by stating distance and direction, such as "200 feet straight downward" or "300 feet upward to the northwest at a 45-degree angle."

You can also teleport one willing creature. The creature must be within 5 feet of you when you teleport, and it teleports to a space within 5 feet of your destination space.

If you, the other creature, or both would arrive in a space occupied by a creature or completely filled by one or more objects, you and any creature traveling with you each take 4d6 Force damage, and the teleportation fails.

Telekinesis.name: 心灵遥控
Telekinesis.description:
你获得以思想移动或操纵生物或物件的能力。你施展法术时或在法术终止前的其后回合中用一个魔法动作，你可以向施法距离内可见的一名生物或一个物件伸展你的意志，造成对应的下述效应。你可以一轮接一轮地影响同一个目标，也可以在任何时候选择一个新的目标。如果你改变了目标，则之前的目标将不再受该法术影响。

生物。 你可以尝试移动一名巨型或更小的生物。目标必须成功于一次力量豁免，否则你可以将其往任意方向移动 30 尺，但不能让它离开施法距离。在你的下个回合结束前，该生物陷入 &Reference[Restrained] 状态，而被你举到空中的生物会在半空中悬停。除非你再次使用此选项且目标失败于豁免，否则被举到空中的生物会在你的下个回合结束坠落。

物件。 你可以尝试移动一个巨型或更小的物件。如果该物品没有被着装或携带，则你可以自动使它朝任何方向移动 30 尺，但不能让它离开施法距离。

如果该物件已被一名生物着装或携带，则那名生物必须成功于一次力量豁免，否则你可以把目标物件从该生物身上拿走，并且使该物体朝任意方向移动 30 尺，但不能让它离开施法距离。

你可以使用心灵遥控对物体进行精密操作，例如操纵一件简单的工具，打开一扇门或一个容器，把东西放进或拿出一个打开的容器中，或是把一个小瓶子里的东西倒出来。

Dispel Magic.name: 解除魔法
Dispel Magic.description:
在施法距离内指定一名生物、一个物件或一处魔法效应。所有影响该目标的三环或更低环阶法术即告终止。每个影响目标的四环或更高环阶法术都需要以你的施法属性进行一次属性检定（DC 10 + 目标法术环阶），检定成功时目标法术终止。

升环施法： 你直接终止影响目标的小于等于该施法环阶的法术效应。

Contact Other Plane.name: Contact Other Plane
Contact Other Plane.description:
你与一名半神、一名古老贤者的亡魂或是其他位面的博学实体建立了精神的连接。与超越人智存在的连接可能会破坏你的心智。当你施展该法术时，进行一次[[/save int dc=15]]豁免。豁免成功时，你可以询问该实体最多五个问题。你必须在法术结束前提出你的问题。DM 将以一个单词回答你的每个问题，例如“是”、“不是”、“可能”、“不可能”、“无关”或“不清楚”（意味着该实体不知道该问题的答案）。如果一个单词的答案会造成误解，DM 可能会用一句短语作为答案。

豁免失败时，你将受到[[/damage 6d6 type=psychic]]伤害并且直到你完成一次长休为止，你陷入&Reference[Incapacitated]{失能}状态。对你施展法术@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplGreaterRes]{高等复原术}将结束该效应。

Self Plane Shift.name: Self Plane Shift
Self Plane Shift.description:
You and up to eight willing creatures who link hands in a circle are transported to a different plane of existence. You can specify a target destination in general terms, such as the City of Brass on the Elemental Plane of Fire or the palace of Dispater on the second level of the Nine Hells, and you appear in or near that destination, as determined by the DM.

Alternatively, if you know the sigil sequence of a teleportation circle on another plane of existence, this spell can take you to that circle. If the teleportation circle is too small to hold all the creatures you transported, they appear in the closest unoccupied spaces next to the circle.

Scrying.name: 探知术
Scrying.description:
你能看见和听见一个和你处于同一存在位面上的生物。目标生物必须进行一次感知豁免；该豁免的调整值与你对目标的了解程度有关（见下文），也与你和目标之间的物理联系程度有关。目标不知道它进行此豁免在对抗什么，只是会感觉不自在。

你对目标的了解有… 豁免调整值
二手信息（你曾经听说过目标） +5
直接信息（你曾经见过目标） +0
熟悉（你对目标很了解） −5
你持有目标的… 豁免调整值
肖像或其他图像 −2
衣物或其他物品 −4
身体部位如头发或指甲 −10

如果对方豁免成功，则目标不受该法术影响，并且在 24 小时内你不能尝试探知同一个目标。

如果对方豁免失败，则你在目标身边 10 尺内创造出一个隐形的传感器。通过传感器，你可以身临其境地看见和听见周围的环境。传感器会跟随目标移动，并在法术持续时间内始终保持在目标 10 尺之内。在能够看到传感器的生物眼中，你的传感器是一个拳头大小的光球。

除生物之外，你也可以选择一个你以前见过的地点作为该法术的目标。这种情况下，传感器会出现在目标地点且不会移动。

Create Sensor.name: 创造探测器
Create Sensor.target: at target location or within 10 feet of target creature

Verminous Aura.name: Verminous Aura
Verminous Aura.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] emits a 30-foot Emanation of verminous contamination. A creature that starts its turn in the Emanation takes [[/damage average]] damage.

Meld into Shadow.name: Meld into Shadow
Meld into Shadow.description: The [[lookup @name]] has the &reference[Invisible] condition until he makes an attack.

Call Ratlings.name: Call Ratlings
Call Ratlings.description: 2d4 @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.kJiRPjOEfAOB9wXz]{Ratling Warriors} appear, burrowing up from below unoccupied spaces within 60 feet of the [[lookup @name]]. The warriors have 1 Hit Point each and remain until killed.

Delerium-Infused Blades.name: Delerium-Infused Blades
Delerium-Infused Blades.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and the target suffers one of the following effects of the Rat Crown-Prince's choice (he can't select the same option more than once per round):

Poison. Constitution Saving Throw: DC 16. Failure: [[/damage average activity=5XHBY3JR6B7ggwtF]], and the target has the &reference[Poisoned] condition for 1 minute (save ends). Success: Half damage only.

Acid Burn. Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 16. Failure: [[/damage average activity=O8R4GVzOHFrGp1OD]] damage, and the target has the &reference[Burning] condition (3d6 Acid). Success: Half damage only.

Mindkiller. If the target is maintaining Concentration on a spell, it takes an extra [[/damage average activity=k6kcA2MNpcJFvCqh]] damage unless it chooses to end its Concentration

Delerium Poison.name: Delerium Poison
Delerium Poison.description: 你陷入&reference[poisoned apply=false]状态 1 分钟。你可以在自己每一回合结束时重复进行针对此效应的豁免检定，成功则终止该效应。

Burning (3d6 Acid).name: Burning (3d6 Acid)
Burning (3d6 Acid).description:
You are &reference[burning apply=false] from being covered in acid.

  • At the end of each of your turns, you take [[/damage average acid 3d6]] damage.

  • The condition ends if you or another creature within 5 feet of you spends an action to scrape off the acid or if some other effect removes it.

Epic Boss.name: 史诗 Boss
Epic Boss.description:
This creature is an Epic Boss, a unique foe designed to pose a solo threat to an entire adventuring party. As such, it has additional game rules that sets it apart from normal creatures:

The [[lookup @name]] always takes their turn on Initiative count 20. On their turn, they can use their movement and interaction as normal. However, they do not take an action or Bonus Action on their turn unless forced to do so by a spell or other effect. Instead, the [[lookup @name]] takes one of the following Epic Actions at the end of each player character's turn.

All this creature's actions are Epic Actions.

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.P3zVbU8MP80E64mL.Item.pXYxvdS2z8Zfrh2u]{Contaminated Bite}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.P3zVbU8MP80E64mL.Item.lBL6OaKhxqEJrCS7]{Delerium-Infused Blades}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.P3zVbU8MP80E64mL.Item.aGand1TnpiJNNlsu]{Call Ratlings}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.P3zVbU8MP80E64mL.Item.zZoIlUywaRMnNl40]{Meld into Shadow}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.P3zVbU8MP80E64mL.Item.GaFiOVEdao4ViB4z]{Swift Stride.}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.P3zVbU8MP80E64mL.Item.2F1TXmVrBmPoeLL1]{Epic Resistance}

Epic Resistance.name: Epic Resistance
Epic Resistance.description: [[lookup @name]]选选择一个正影响其的状态、法术或其他效应，并投掷[[/r 1d20]]。若结果为 11 或更高，其身上的该效应终止。即使[[lookup @name]]无法执行动作、被其他生物控制动作或被法术或效应改变其游戏数据卡，其也可以执行该动作。

Keen Smell.name: Keen Smell
Keen Smell.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

Eldritch Aura.name: Eldritch Aura
Eldritch Aura.description: A creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes [[/damage average]] damage.

Magic Deflection.name: Magic Deflection
Magic Deflection.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects. If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is targeted by a spell of level 4 or lower, the caster must succeed on a [[/save]] saving throw or the spell fails and the caster takes [[/damage average]] damage.

Pluck the Puppet Strings.name: Pluck the Puppet Strings
Pluck the Puppet Strings.description: Wisdom Saving Throw: DC 19, one creature within 120 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target must immediately use its Reaction to move up to its Speed toward a creature of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s choice. If it ends this movement within reach of the creature, it must make a melee weapon attack against the creature with Advantage. Success: Half damage only.

Phase Out.name: Phase Out
Phase Out.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] teleports to an unoccupied space within 120 feet of it. Each creature within 10 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] when it arrives is subjected to the following effect. Intelligence Saving Throw: DC 19. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &reference[Defenseless] condition until the end of its next turn. Success: Half damage only.

Phase Out: Defenseless.name: Phase Out: Defenseless
Phase Out: Defenseless.description: You are &reference[defenseless apply=false] until the end of your next turn.

Spellcasting (Psionics).name: Spellcasting (Psionics)
Spellcasting (Psionics).description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts one of the spells they know, requiring no components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 19, +11 to spell attacks):

Step Through Time and Space.name: Step Through Time and Space
Step Through Time and Space.description: Trigger: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes damage. Response: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes no damage and teleports to an unoccupied space within 60 feet. The next attack roll made against the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Disadvantage.

Phasing through Time and Space.name: Phasing through Time and Space
Phasing through Time and Space.description: The next attack roll made against you has Disadvantage.

Aberrant Traits.name: Aberrant Traits
Aberrant Traits.description:
Given the contamination and delerium present within the Space Between Worlds, all creatures who dwell there are the product of contamination and unaffected by the normal dangers of delerium. As an aberrant, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has the following traits:

  • Fully Contaminated. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is immune to &reference[drakkenheimContamination] and has Advantage on saving throws against contaminated spells. This creature may cast contaminated spells even though it does not gain Contamination levels.

  • Delerium Healing. As an action, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can touch a delerium shard to regain 10 (3d6) Hit Points. Once the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has used a delerium shard in this way, the shard can't be used in this manner again for 24 hours.

  • Alien Intellect. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is immune to any effect that would sense its emotions or read its thoughts, as well as any divination spell that it refuses. Wisdom (Insight) checks made to ascertain the [[lookup @name lowercase]]s intentions or sincerity have Disadvantage.

Contaminate.name: Contaminate
Contaminate.description: Constitution Saving Throw: DC 19, one creature within 120 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target gains one &reference[drakkenheimContamination] level. Success: Half damage only.

Tentacle.name: Tentacle
Tentacle.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and the target has the &reference[Dazed] condition until the end of its next turn.

Tentacle Daze.name: Tentacle Daze
Tentacle Daze.description: You are &reference[dazed apply=false] until the end of your next turn.

Mind Scramble.name: Mind Scramble
Mind Scramble.description: Intelligence Saving Throw: DC 19, each creature in a 60-foot Cone (creatures maintaining Concentration have Disadvantage). Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, or [[/damage 72 psychic]] damage if the target was maintaining Concentration. Success: Half damage.

Epic Boss.description:
