Thaumaturgy.name: Thaumaturgy
Thaumaturgy.description:
You manifest a minor wonder within range. You create one of the effects below within range. If you cast this spell multiple times, you can have up to three of its 1-minute effects active at a time.

Altered Eyes. You alter the appearance of your eyes for 1 minute.

Booming Voice. Your voice booms up to three times as loud as normal for 1 minute. For the duration, you have Advantage on [[/check ability=cha skill=itm]] checks.

Fire Play. You cause flames to flicker, brighten, dim, or change color for 1 minute.

Invisible Hand. You instantaneously cause an unlocked door or window to fly open or slam shut.

Phantom Sound. You create an instantaneous sound that originates from a point of your choice within range, such as a rumble of thunder, the cry of a raven, or ominous whispers.

Tremors. You cause harmless tremors in the ground for 1 minute.

Invisibility.name: Invisibility
Invisibility.description:
A creature you touch has the &Reference[invisible apply=false] condition until the spell ends. The spell ends early immediately after the target makes an attack roll, deals damage, or casts a spell.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You can target one additional creature for each spell slot level above 2.

Invisible.name: 隐形
Invisible.description: 如果你进行攻击检定、造成伤害或施展法术，则该法术提前终止。

Augury.name: Augury
Augury.description:
你从异界存在处获得一个预示，关乎你计划在未来 30 分钟内采取的一系列行动的结果。DM 从预示表中选择一个预示。

预示对应结果将是…
吉好的
凶坏的
吉凶并存既好又坏
无既不好也不坏

该法术不会考虑可能改变结果的情况，例如其他法术。

如果你在完成一次长休前多次施展此法术，则第一次施法后每次施法都有累计 25% 的几率得不到答案。

Dispel Magic.name: 解除魔法
Dispel Magic.description:
在施法距离内指定一名生物、一个物件或一处魔法效应。所有影响该目标的三环或更低环阶法术即告终止。每个影响目标的四环或更高环阶法术都需要以你的施法属性进行一次属性检定（DC 10 + 目标法术环阶），检定成功时目标法术终止。

升环施法： 你直接终止影响目标的小于等于该施法环阶的法术效应。

Major Image.name: Major Image
Major Image.description:
你创造一个影像，其形象来自一个大小不超过边长 20 尺立方体的物件或生物，或是其他的可视现象。影像出现在施法距离内你能看见的一处位置并在法术持续时间内维持存在。它看起来完全是真实的，并且还具有相应的声音、气味和温度。但它无法造成伤害或让人陷入任何状态。

在该幻象施法距离内时，你可以用一个魔法动作将影像移动到施法距离内的另一个位置。影像改变位置时，你可以改变影像的外表来使它移动得更自然。例如，如果你创造了一个生物的影像并移动它，则你可以改变影像，使它看起来就像是在走路。或者你也可以让影像在不同的时间发出不同的声音，甚至可以让它参与一场对话。

由于影像可以被穿过，任何与该影像进行的物理互动都会暴露其幻象的本质。一个生物用研究动作调查影像时，它可以进行一次对抗你的法术豁免 DC 的 [[/check ability=int skill=inv dc=@attributes.spelldc]] 检定，以判定是否看穿幻象。辨出幻象的生物可以看破该影像，而影像的其他感官效应在该生物看来会变得微弱而模糊。

升环施法： 使用高于三环的法术位时，法术时间持续至被解除且无需专注。

Mage Armor.name: Mage Armor
Mage Armor.description: 你的基础 AC 变为 13 + 你的敏捷调整值。着装护甲则该法术提前终止。

Combustion.name: Combustion
Combustion.description:
While the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has the &reference[Burning apply=false] condition, its Speed becomes 50 feet and its melee weapon attacks deal an extra [[/damage average]] damage.

Foundry Note

While &reference[burning apply=false], the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s weapons will automatically deal the additional 3d6 fire damage. The upgrade to movement speed is currently not possible to automatically apply in the same way.

Burning (2d6 Fire).name: Burning (2d6 Fire)
Burning (2d6 Fire).description:
You are &reference[burning apply=false] from being covered in fire.

  • At the end of each of your turns, you take [[/damage average fire 2d6]] damage.

  • The condition ends if you or another creature within 5 feet of you spends an action to douse the fire or if some other effect removes it such as submerging yourself in water.

Burning (2d6 Fire).name: Burning (2d6 Fire)
Burning (2d6 Fire).description:
You are &reference[burning apply=false] from being covered in fire.

  • At the end of each of your turns, you take [[/damage average fire 2d6]] damage.

  • The condition ends if you or another creature within 5 feet of you spends an action to douse the fire or if some other effect removes it such as submerging yourself in water.

Aquatic Camouflage.name: Aquatic Camouflage
Aquatic Camouflage.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in aquatic terrain.

Memory Bank.name: Memory Bank
Memory Bank.description: The leech has three memory banks in its body. When encountered, roll 1d3 to determine how many memory banks are filled with grey matter. The rest are empty.

Attach.name: Attach
Attach.description:
[[/attack extended]]. Hit: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] attaches to the target. While attached, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] doesn't attack, and moves with the target, using none of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s movement. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can detach itself using 5 feet of movement, and detaches immediately if its blood bags are filled or if the target dies.

A creature within 5 feet can take an action to detach the [[lookup @name lowercase]] with a successful [[/check]] check. Failure: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is still detached, but the target has the &reference[Bleeding] condition (2d4). Failure by 5 or More: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] isn't detached and the target takes [[/damage average]] damage.

Bleeding (2d4).name: Bleeding (2d4)
Bleeding (2d4).description:
You're losing blood to an open wound.

  • Ongoing Damage: At the end of each of your turns, you lose [[/r 2d4]] Hit Points.

  • Regaining Hit Points: This condition ends if you regain any Hit Points.

  • Medical Treatment: You or another creature within 5 feet of you can spend an action and use a Healer's Kit to staunch the bleeding (no check required), ending the condition.

Brain Drain.name: Brain Drain
Brain Drain.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can use this Bonus Action only when it is attached to a creature. That creature is subjected to the following effect. Intelligence Saving Throw: DC 11. Failure: The target’s Intelligence score is reduced by 1d4, and one of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s memory banks is filled. If this effect reduces the target’s Intelligence score to 0, it has the &reference[Unconscious] condition until it regains at least 1 point of Intelligence. Otherwise, the reduction lasts until the creature finishes a Short or Long Rest.

Thought Transfusion.name: Thought Transfusion
Thought Transfusion.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can use this Bonus Action only when it is attached to a creature and has at least one filled memory bank. The attached creature gains Advantage on Intelligence-based D20 Tests for 1 minute, and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] empties one of its filled memory banks.

Illusory Assault.name: Illusory Assault
Illusory Assault.description: Intelligence Saving Throw: DC 16, each creature in a 30-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &reference[Frightened] condition until the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn. Success: Half damage only.

Illusory Assault.name: Illusory Assault
Illusory Assault.description: You are &reference[frightened apply=false] until the end of the faerie host's next turn.

Fey Escape.name: Fey Escape
Fey Escape.description: Trigger: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes damage. Response: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has the &reference[Invisible] condition and teleports to an unoccupied space it can see within 60 feet. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] remains Invisible until the start of its next turn or until it makes an attack roll, deals damage, or casts a spell.

Faerie Step.name: Faerie Step
Faerie Step.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] teleports to an unoccupied space it can see within 30 feet.

Disguise Self.name: Disguise Self
Disguise Self.description:
You make yourself—including your clothing, armor, weapons, and other belongings on your person—look different until the spell ends. You can seem 1 foot shorter or taller and can appear heavier or lighter. You must adopt a form that has the same basic arrangement of limbs as you have. Otherwise, the extent of the illusion is up to you.

The changes wrought by this spell fail to hold up to physical inspection. For example, if you use this spell to add a hat to your outfit, objects pass through the hat, and anyone who touches it would feel nothing.

To discern that you are disguised, a creature must take the Study action to inspect your appearance and succeed on an [[/check ability=int skill=inv dc=@attributes.spell.dc]] check against your spell save DC.

Disguised.name: Disguised
Disguised.description: To discern that you are disguised, a creature must take the Study action to inspect your appearance and succeed on an [[/check ability=int skill=inv]] check against your spell save DC.

Mage Hand.name: 法师之手
Mage Hand.description:
一只漂浮的幽灵手出现在施法距离内你指定的一点。幽灵手持续存在至法术终止。如果幽灵手距你的距离超过 30 尺，或者当你再次施展了该法术时，则现存的幽灵手消失不见。

你可以在施展该法术时使用幽灵手实施一个行为：你可以操控一个物件，或者打开一扇未上锁的门或容器，或者将一件物品放入或取出一个打开的容器，或者将小瓶中的内容物倾倒出来。

在后续的回合中，以一个魔法动作，你可以控制幽灵手再次实施一个行为。作为那个动作的一部分，你可以令幽灵手移动至多 30 尺。

该幽灵手不能攻击，也不能激活魔法物品或承载超过 10 磅重的物质。

Minor Illusion.name: Minor Illusion
Minor Illusion.description:
你在施法距离内创造一段声响或一个物件的影像，并使之维持至法术持续时间结束，详见以下对应效应的描述。你可以再次施展该法术来终止幻象。

生物用研究动作调查该声响或影像时，其必须进行一次对抗该法术豁免 DC 的[[/check ability=int skill=inv dc=@attributes.spelldc]]检定，检定成功则判断出是幻象。对于识破幻象的生物而言，幻象会变得模糊不清。

声响。 如果你创造一段声响，其音量可以是低声耳语也可以是高声尖叫。它可以是你或其他任何人的嗓音，或者是一头狮子的咆哮、一段鼓声以及任何你指定的其他声响。声响在持续时间内不会减弱，或者你也可以于法术终止前在不同的时间段创造几段分散的声响。

影像。 如果你创造一个物件的影像，比如一把椅子、泥泞的脚印、一个小箱子等，则该物件各方向上大小不得大于 5 尺立方区域。该影像不具有声音、光亮、味道或任何其他的感官效应。由于影像可以被任何物体穿透，因此与之进行物理互动时都会揭露其幻象的本质。

Prestidigitation.name: 魔法伎俩
Prestidigitation.description:
你在施法距离内创造一个魔法效应。从下述效应中选择一项。如果你多次施展该法术，则可以同时维持至多三个不同的非即时效应。

感官效应。 你创造一个立即生效的，无害的感官效应，比如一束火花，一阵风，微弱音乐或古怪的臭味。

玩火。你立即点亮或熄灭一根蜡烛、一根火把或一处小篝火。

清洁或弄脏。 你立即清洁或弄脏一个不大于 1 立方尺的物件。

次级感官。 你使一个不大于 1 立方尺的无生命物质变冷、变暖或对其调味，持续 1 小时。

魔法印记。 你在一个物件或一个表面上创造一块色斑，一个小印记，或者一个徽记，持续 1 小时。

次级造物。 你创造出一个非魔法小饰品或一张虚幻图像，其大小不能超过你的手掌大小，它会持续存在至下个你的回合结束为止。一个小饰品不能造成伤害，也不值钱。

Invisibility.name: Invisibility
Invisibility.description:
A creature you touch has the &Reference[invisible apply=false] condition until the spell ends. The spell ends early immediately after the target makes an attack roll, deals damage, or casts a spell.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You can target one additional creature for each spell slot level above 2.

Invisible.name: 隐形
Invisible.description: 如果你进行攻击检定、造成伤害或施展法术，则该法术提前终止。

Major Image.description:

Immutable Form.name: Immutable Form
Immutable Form.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form

Unhinged Reality.name: Unhinged Reality
Unhinged Reality.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] emits a 120-foot Emanation of unhinged reality. A creature that starts its turn in the Emanation is subjected to the following effect. Wisdom Saving Throw: DC 15. Failure: The target has the &reference[Immobilized] condition until it leaves the Emanation. While Immobilized, the target believes itself to be in an altered and confused environment of shifting forms, and can't see or hear anything else. The target does not perceive itself to be stationary, and instead believes it is walking through a bizarre landscape. It can take an action on its turn to repeat the save, ending the effect on itself on a success. If the creature succeeds on its save or the effect ends for it, it is immune to the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s Unhinged Reality for 24 hours

Unusual Nature.name: Unusual Nature
Unusual Nature.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep

Psychic Whip.name: Psychic Whip
Psychic Whip.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and the target has the &reference[Dazed] condition until the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can target a creature &reference[Immobilized apply=false] by its @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.Xq366JSfG4cyMfO5.Item.osPJaTnItRW9u7Zm] with this attack even if the creature has &reference[TotalCover].

Psychic Whip.name: Psychic Whip
Psychic Whip.description: You are &reference[dazed apply=false] until the end of the reality cyst's next turn.

Fracture.name: Fracture
Fracture.description: Trigger: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes damage. Response: Intelligence Saving Throw: DC 15, each creature in a 60 foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. Failure: The target has the &reference[Addled] condition (save ends).

save.condition: When the reality cyst takes damage.

Feed.name: Feed
Feed.description: Each creature &reference[Immobilized apply=false] by Unhinged Reality takes [[/damage average]] damage. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] regains Hit Points equal to the total damage dealt, and its Hit Point Maximum increases by the same amount.

damage.target: Each creature immobilized by the reality cyst's Unhinged Reality.

Carapace Parry.name: Carapace Parry
Carapace Parry.description: Trigger: A creature the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see hits it with an attack. Response: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] adds 2 to its AC against that attack, possibly causing it to miss.

utility.condition: When a creature the beetle knight can see hits it with an attack.

Fling.name: Fling
Fling.description: Strength Saving Throw: DC 14, one creature &reference[Grappled apply=false] by the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. Failure: The target is thrown up to [[/r 1d6*10]]{1d6 × 10} feet, landing with the &reference[Prone] condition. If the target strikes a solid surface, it takes [[/damage average]] damage for every 10 feet it was thrown. If the target is thrown at another creature, that creature must succeed on a [[/save activity=34jeeOUsirCCVhoP]] saving throw or take the same damage and have the Prone condition.

Pincer Horn.name: Pincer Horn
Pincer Horn.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], or [[/damage activity=JT92Q8zaa2qVezkx average]] damage if the [[lookup @name lowercase]] moved 20+ feet straight toward the target immediately before the hit. If the target is Medium or smaller, it has the &reference[Grappled] condition (escape DC 14). While Grappled, the target has the &reference[Restrained] condition and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can’t use its Pincer Horn against another target.

Grappled by Pincer Horn.name: Grappled by Pincer Horn
Grappled by Pincer Horn.description: You are &reference[grappled apply=false] (escape DC 14). While grappled in this way, you are also &reference[restrained apply=false].

Intimidating Aura.name: Intimidating Aura
Intimidating Aura.description:
[[lookup @name]] projects a 30-foot Emanation of imposing command. An ally that starts its turn in the Emanation has Advantage on the first attack roll it makes before the start of its next turn.

A Hostile creature that starts its turn in the Emanation takes [[/damage average]] damage and is subjected to the following effect. Wisdom Saving Throw: DC 16. Failure: The target has the &reference[Frightened] condition until the start of its next turn. Success: The target is immune to [[lookup @name]]'s Intimidating Aura for 24 hours.

Intimidating Aura: Frightened.name: Intimidating Aura: Frightened
Intimidating Aura: Frightened.description: You are &reference[frightened apply=false] until the start of your next turn.

Command.name: Command
Command.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] chooses one ally he can see. If the ally can see and hear him, it can use its Reaction to make one weapon attack with Advantage. On a hit, the attack deals an extra [[/damage average]] damage.

Command Ally.name: Command Ally
Command Ally.target: An ally that can see and hear Elias.

Flare.name: Flare
Flare.description: [[lookup @name]] chooses a point he can see within 60 feet and fires at flare at it, signaling the Hooded Lantern's bombardment. [[lookup @name]] recharges his @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.Y8YrNgJuWiyliOwk.Item.aivCJEa0LAAMSrpZ]. He can only use this Epic Action if it's the first Epic Action he has taken this round.

Artillery Strike.name: Artillery Strike
Artillery Strike.description: [[lookup @name]] can only use this Epic Action if it's the last Epic Action he takes this round. Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 17, each creature in a 20-foot radius Sphere centered on the point [[lookup @name]] chose with his Flare Epic Action. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &reference[Prone] condition. Success: Half damage only.

Epic Boss.name: 史诗 Boss
Epic Boss.description:
This creature is an Epic Boss, a unique foe designed to pose a solo threat to an entire adventuring party. As such, it has additional game rules that sets it apart from normal creatures:

[[lookup @name]] always takes their turn on Initiative count 20. On their turn, they can use their movement and interaction as normal. However, they do not take an action or Bonus Action on their turn unless forced to do so by a spell or other effect. Instead, [[lookup @name]] takes one of the following Epic Actions at the end of each player character's turn.

All this creature's actions are Epic Actions.

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.Y8YrNgJuWiyliOwk.Item.0AFVBca5Hcb8z1Hc]{Lord Commander's Blade}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.Y8YrNgJuWiyliOwk.Item.MjUwM9E4xcLwixrK]{Longbow}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.Y8YrNgJuWiyliOwk.Item.hf5ENO0Lh1VrKFU7]{Command}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.Y8YrNgJuWiyliOwk.Item.fkf1i9XJiN4D3anT]{Flare}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.Y8YrNgJuWiyliOwk.Item.aivCJEa0LAAMSrpZ]{Artillery Strike}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.Y8YrNgJuWiyliOwk.Item.dDWmBIienhpjBHTs]{Epic Resistance}

Epic Boss.name: 史诗 Boss
Epic Boss.description:
This creature is an Epic Boss, a unique foe designed to pose a solo threat to an entire adventuring party. As such, it has additional game rules that sets it apart from normal creatures.

The creature always takes their turn on Initiative count 20. On their turn, they can use their movement and interaction as normal. However, they do not take an action or Bonus Action on their turn unless forced to do so by a spell or other effect. Instead, the creature takes one of the Epic Actions they have available.

Epic Resistance.name: Epic Resistance
Epic Resistance.description: [[lookup @name]]选选择一个正影响其的状态、法术或其他效应，并投掷[[/r 1d20]]。若结果为 11 或更高，其身上的该效应终止。即使[[lookup @name]]无法执行动作、被其他生物控制动作或被法术或效应改变其游戏数据卡，其也可以执行该动作。

Longbow.name: Longbow
Longbow.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and [[lookup @name]] can apply one of the following martial masteries to the target:

  • Push. If the target is Large or smaller, it is pushed up to 10 feet away from [[lookup @name]].

  • Slow. The target has the &reference[Slowed] condition (DC 15 Constitution save ends).

Martial Mastery: Slow.name: Martial Mastery: Slow
Martial Mastery: Slow.description: You are &reference[slowed apply=false]. At the end of each of your turns, you can make a [[/save con 15]] saving throw, ending this effect on yourself on a success.

Lord Commander's Blade.name: Lord Commander's Blade
Lord Commander's Blade.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and [[lookup @name]] can apply one of the following martial masteries to the target:

  • Wound. The target has the &reference[Bleeding] condition (4d4).

  • Topple. The target has the &reference[Prone] condition.

  • Sap. The target has Disadvantage on the next attack roll it makes before the start of start of [[lookup @name]]'s next turn.

Bleeding (4d4).name: Bleeding (4d4)
Bleeding (4d4).description:
You're losing blood to an open wound.

  • Ongoing Damage: At the end of each of your turns, you lose [[/r 4d4]] Hit Points.

  • Regaining Hit Points: This condition ends if you regain any Hit Points.

  • Medical Treatment: You or another creature within 5 feet of you can spend an action and use a Healer's Kit to staunch the bleeding (no check required), ending the condition.

Martial Mastery: Sap.name: Martial Mastery: Sap
Martial Mastery: Sap.description: You have Disadvantage on the next attack roll you make before the start of Lord Commander Elias Drexel's next turn.

Incorporeal Movement.name: Incorporeal Movement
Incorporeal Movement.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can move through other creatures and objects as if they were &reference[DifficultTerrain]. It takes [[/damage average]] damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

Spectral Grasp.name: Spectral Grasp
Spectral Grasp.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] causes one creature it can see within 5 feet to have the &reference[Grappled] condition. A target that takes an action to escape automatically ends the grapple.

Death Row.name: Death Row
Death Row.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves up to its Speed, pulling a creature it has &reference[Grappled] with it.

Standing Leap.name: 立定起跳
Standing Leap.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s long jump is up to 30 feet and its high jump is up to 20 feet, with or without a running start

Poison Skin.name: Poison Skin
Poison Skin.description: When a creature within 5 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] hits it with a melee attack, that creature takes [[/damage average]] damage.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and the target has the &reference[Distracted apply=false] condition.

Distracting Bite.name: Distracting Bite
Distracting Bite.description: You are &reference[distracted apply=false] until the end of your next turn.

Throw Frogspawn.name: Throw Frogspawn
Throw Frogspawn.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]]. If the target is a creature, the egg sticks to the target's body, melding with its flesh. A creature within 5 feet of the egg can take an action to remove the egg, dealing [[/damage average activity=PFnqtTje6WQBJrLr]] damage to the target in the process. If the egg is still attached to the target at the end of its next turn, the target is infected with a disease and has the &reference[Sickened] condition until the disease ends. The disease can't be cured except by magic.

Every hour, the target is subjected to the following effect. Constitution Saving Throw: DC 12. Failure: The target gains one &reference[drakkenheimContamination] level. Contamination levels gained in this way can't be removed until the disease is cured. If the target suffers a Monstrous Transformation, it dies and its flesh falls away, birthing a Lob Frog.

Attached Frogspawn.name: Attached Frogspawn
Attached Frogspawn.description:
A frogspawn egg is fused to your skin. You or another creature within 5 feet of the egg can take an action to remove it, dealing [[/damage 3d6 acid average]] damage to you in the proccess.

If the egg is still attached to you at the end of your next turn, you become &reference[sickened] and infected with a disease. The disease can’t be cured except by magic.

Every hour afterwards, you must make a [[/save 12 con]] saving throw or gain a &reference[drakkenheimContamination] level on a failed save. Contamination levels gained in this way can’t be removed until the disease is cured. If you suffers a Monstrous Transformation, you die and your flesh falls away, birthing a Lob Frog

Cosmic Aura.name: Cosmic Aura
Cosmic Aura.description: A creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is subjected to the following effect. Charisma Saving Throw: DC 17. Failure: The target is hurled through time and space, witnessing every moment of existence in a single second. It takes [[/damage average]] damage and is teleported to an unoccupied space it can see within 30 feet.

save.condition: When a creature starts their turn within 30 feet of the Star Warden.

Lords of Time and Space.name: Lords of Time and Space
Lords of Time and Space.description:
When the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is reduced to 0 Hit Points, roll a [[/r 1d20cs1cs20]]{d20}. On a 1 or 20, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] regains all of its Hit Points and another creature of its choice within 30 feet is reduced to 0 Hit Points instead.

Foundry Note

The activity on this feature and the d20 roll that is enriched above will display a 0 for an unsuccessful use of this feature, and a 1 on a result of a 1 or 20.

utility.condition: When the Star Warden is reduced to 0 hit points.

Nebulae Grasp.name: Nebulae Grasp
Nebulae Grasp.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can teleport the target to an unoccupied space the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within 120 feet.

Stardust.name: Stardust
Stardust.description: Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 17, each creature in a 30-foot Cone. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage and the target has the &reference[Burning] condition (4d6 Radiant).

Burning (4d6 Radiant).name: Burning (4d6 Radiant)
Burning (4d6 Radiant).description:
You are &reference[burning apply=false] from being covered in stardust.

  • At the end of each of your turns, you take [[/damage average radiant 4d6]] damage.

  • The condition ends if you or another creature within 5 feet of you spends an action to remove the stardust or if some other effect removes it such as submerging yourself in water.

Outside Time and Space.name: Outside Time and Space
Outside Time and Space.description: Trigger: A creature hits the [[lookup @name lowercase]] with an attack. Response: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] switches places with another creature within 30 feet, and the attack hits that creature instead.

utility.condition: When the Star Warden is hit with an attack.

The Cold Void of Space.name: The Cold Void of Space
The Cold Void of Space.description: Constitution Saving Throw: DC 17, one creature within 120 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] that teleported this turn. Failure: The target has the &reference[Frozen] condition (DC 17). Success: [[/damage average]] damage.

Frozen (DC 17).name: Frozen (DC 17)
Frozen (DC 17).description:
You're partially encased in ice:

  • You are &reference[Immobilized apply=false] & &reference[Defenseless apply=false].

  • You're &reference[Helpless apply=false] against attacks made with a weapon that deals bludgeoning damage.

  • You or another creature can take an action to break the ice away. To do so, you must succeed on a [[/check 17 str ath]] check.

Aberrant Traits.name: Aberrant Traits
Aberrant Traits.description:
Given the contamination and delerium present within the Space Between Worlds, all creatures who dwell there are the product of contamination and unaffected by the normal dangers of delerium. As an aberrant, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has the following traits:

  • Fully Contaminated. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is immune to &reference[drakkenheimContamination] and has Advantage on saving throws against contaminated spells. This creature may cast contaminated spells even though it does not gain Contamination levels.

  • Delerium Healing. As an action, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can touch a delerium shard to regain 10 (3d6) Hit Points. Once the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has used a delerium shard in this way, the shard can't be used in this manner again for 24 hours.

  • Alien Intellect. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is immune to any effect that would sense its emotions or read its thoughts, as well as any divination spell that it refuses. Wisdom (Insight) checks made to ascertain the [[lookup @name lowercase]]s intentions or sincerity have Disadvantage.

Expel Waste.name: Expel Waste
Expel Waste.description: Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 13, each creature in a 10-foot radius Sphere directly beneath the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &reference[Burning] condition (4d4 Acid). Each time the target takes damage from this condition, it must succeed on a [[/save]] saving throw or gain one Contamination level. Success: Half damage only.

Burning (4d4 Acid).name: Burning (4d4 Acid)
Burning (4d4 Acid).description:
You are &reference[burning apply=false] from being covered in acid.

  • At the end of each of your turns, you take [[/damage average acid 4d4]] damage.

  • The condition ends if you or another creature within 5 feet of you spends an action to scrape off the acid or if some other effect removes it.

Each time you take damage from this effect, you must succeed on a [[/save 13 con]] saving throw or gain a Contamination level.

Spittle.name: Spittle
Spittle.description: Ranged Attack Roll: +5, range 120/300 ft., one target directly underneath the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. [[/damage extended]].

Aquatic Camouflage.name: Aquatic Camouflage
Aquatic Camouflage.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in aquatic terrain.

Blood Bags.name: Blood Bags
Blood Bags.description: The leech has three blood bags in its body. When encountered, roll 1d3 to determine how many blood bags are filled with blood. The rest are empty.

Attach.name: Attach
Attach.description:
[[/attack extended]]. Hit: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] attaches to the target. While attached, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] doesn't attack, and moves with the target, using none of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s movement. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can detach itself using 5 feet of movement, and detaches immediately if its blood bags are filled or if the target dies.

A creature within 5 feet can take an action to detach the [[lookup @name lowercase]] with a successful [[/check]] check. Failure: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is still detached, but the target has the &reference[Bleeding] condition (2d4). Failure by 5 or More: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] isn't detached and the target takes [[/damage average]] damage.

Bleeding (2d4).name: Bleeding (2d4)
Bleeding (2d4).description:
You're losing blood to an open wound.

  • Ongoing Damage: At the end of each of your turns, you lose [[/r 2d4]] Hit Points.

  • Regaining Hit Points: This condition ends if you regain any Hit Points.

  • Medical Treatment: You or another creature within 5 feet of you can spend an action and use a Healer's Kit to staunch the bleeding (no check required), ending the condition.

Blood Drain.name: Blood Drain
Blood Drain.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can use this Bonus Action only when it is attached to a creature. The attached creature loses [[/damage average 3d6]] Hit Points due to blood loss, and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] fills one of its empty blood bags with some of the target’s blood.

Blood Transfusion.name: Blood Transfusion
Blood Transfusion.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can use this Bonus Action only when it is attached to a creature and has at least one filled blood bag. The attached creature regains 10 (3d6) Hit Points, and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] empties one of its filled blood bags.

Deathly Teeth.name: Deathly Teeth
Deathly Teeth.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and the target can't regain Hit Points until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn.

Deathly Teeth.name: Deathly Teeth
Deathly Teeth.description: You cannot regain Hit Points until the start of the ghoul priest's next turn.

Reanimate.name: Reanimate
Reanimate.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] chooses the corpse of a ghoul it can see within 60 feet. The ghoul returns to life with 5 Hit Points and stands up.

Contaminated Touch.name: Contaminated Touch
Contaminated Touch.description: Constitution Saving Throw: DC 13, one target within 5 ft. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage and the target gains one &reference[drakkenheimContamination] level. Success: Half damage only.

Mind Scramble.name: Mind Scramble
Mind Scramble.description: Intelligence Saving Throw: DC 13, each creature in a 30-foot Cone (creatures maintaining Concentration have Disadvantage). Failure: [[/damage average activity=0P5fhTGRWfHMl7K0]] damage, or [[/damage average activity=Jwil3TM2aD1R8ys6]] damage if the target is maintaining Concentration.

Damage vs Concentrating Creature.name: Damage vs Concentrating Creature
Damage vs Concentrating Creature.target: A creature affected by Mind Scramble while they are maintaining concentration.

Warp Call.name: Warp Call
Warp Call.description: Charisma Saving Throw: DC 13, one creature the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within 90 feet. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target is teleported into an unoccupied space the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within 60 feet. The chosen space must be on a surface or in a liquid that can support the target without the target having to squeeze.

Reflect Pain.name: Reflect Pain
Reflect Pain.description: Trigger: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes damage from an attack or spell that only targets it. Response: The attacker or spellcaster takes Psychic damage equal to the damage dealt by the triggering attack or spell.

utility.condition: When the Liminal Herald takes damage from an attack or spell that only targets it.

Dimension Hop.name: Dimension Hop
Dimension Hop.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] teleports to an unoccupied space it can see within 30 feet.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes two [[/item .rA2jbKnv9lCI3uDR]] or [[/item .rMBtxMOseSw5vlwk]] attacks. It can also use [[/item .VTxJdPsDWNP9lc6n]] or [[/item .OJv01dIIGZgPDfQt]].

Aberrant Traits.name: Aberrant Traits
Aberrant Traits.description:
Given the contamination and delerium present within the Space Between Worlds, all creatures who dwell there are the product of contamination and unaffected by the normal dangers of delerium. As an aberrant, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has the following traits:

  • Fully Contaminated. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is immune to &reference[drakkenheimContamination] and has Advantage on saving throws against contaminated spells. This creature may cast contaminated spells even though it does not gain Contamination levels.

  • Delerium Healing. As an action, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can touch a delerium shard to regain 10 (3d6) Hit Points. Once the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has used a delerium shard in this way, the shard can't be used in this manner again for 24 hours.

  • Alien Intellect. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is immune to any effect that would sense its emotions or read its thoughts, as well as any divination spell that it refuses. Wisdom (Insight) checks made to ascertain the [[lookup @name lowercase]]s intentions or sincerity have Disadvantage.

Discordant Song.name: Discordant Song
Discordant Song.description: Intelligence Saving Throw: DC 15, each creature of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s choice in a 30-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target must roll 1d6 and subtract the result from each D20 Test it makes. At the end of each of its turns, the target repeats the save, ending the effect on itself on a success. It automatically succeeds after 1 minute.

Discordant Song.name: Discordant Song
Discordant Song.description: You must roll 1d6 and subtract the result from each D20 Test you make. At the end of each of your turns, you repeat the save, ending the effect on yourself on a success. You automatically succeed after 1 minute.

Illusory Appearance.name: Illusory Appearance
Illusory Appearance.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] covers herself and anything she is wearing or carrying with a magical illusion that makes her look like another creature of her general size and shape. The illusion ends if the siren takes a Bonus Action to end it or if she dies.

The changes wrought by this effect fail to hold up to physical inspection. For example, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] could appear to have smooth skin, but someone touching them would feel their fishy flesh. Otherwise, a creature must take an action to visually inspect the illusion and succeed on a [[/check 15 Intelligence Investigation]] check to discern that the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is disguised.

Misty Step.name: Misty Step
Misty Step.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] magically teleports to an unoccupied space it can see within 30 feet.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]]可以在空气和水中呼吸。

Storm Lash.name: Storm Lash
Storm Lash.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and the target is pushed up to 10 feet away from the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Fog Cloud.name: Fog Cloud
Fog Cloud.description:
你以施法距离内一点为中心创造一片半径 20 尺的球状浓雾。球状区域被&Reference[heavilyobscured]{重度遮蔽}浓雾持续至法术持续时间结束，但仍可被强风（比如@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplGustofWind]{造风术}创造的风）吹散。

升环施法： 使用的法术位每比一环高一环，浓雾的半径就增加 20 尺。

Lightning Bolt.name: Lightning Bolt
Lightning Bolt.description:
A stroke of lightning forming a 100-foot-long, 5-foot-wide Line blasts out from you in a direction you choose. Each creature in the Line makes a Dexterity saving throw, taking 8d6 Lightning damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The damage increases by 1d6 for each spell slot level above 3.

Conjure Water Elemental.name: Conjure Water Elemental
Conjure Water Elemental.description:
你将来自元素位面的大型虚幻精魂咒唤在施法距离内一处未占据空间中。选择精魄的元素类别，这将决定它造成的伤害类型：@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.actors24.Actor.mmAirElemental00]{气元素(闪电)}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.actors24.Actor.mmEarthElemental]{土元素（雷鸣）}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.actors24.Actor.mmFireElemental0]{火元素（火焰）}, 或 @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.actors24.Actor.mmWaterElemental]{水元素（寒冷）}。精魂在持续时间内一直存在。

每当一名你可见的生物进入精魂所在的空间或是在精魂 5 尺内开始其回合时，若没有生物被精魂束缚，你可以迫使其进行一次敏捷豁免检定。失败则目标受到 8d8 对应精魂类型的伤害并且直到法术结束为止，目标陷入&Reference[Restrained apply=false]{束缚}状态。陷入束缚状态的目标回合开始时，其重新豁免，失败则目标受到 4d8 对应精魂类型的伤害，豁免成功则目标不再被精魂束缚。

升环施法： 使用的法术位每比五环高一环，法术的伤害就增加 1d8。

Control Water.name: Control Water
Control Water.description:
直到法术结束为止，你控制你指定的一处边长 100 尺的立方区域中的任意一处独立水体，从以下效应中选择其一生效。在你之后的每个自己回合中，你可以用一个魔法动作重复同一效应，或是选择另一效应。

上涨。你使控制区域内水位上涨至多20尺。如果你指定的区域是一片大水体中的一部分，则你改为制造一片 20 尺高的波浪，并从区域的一边扑向另一边再拍下水面。波浪中任何巨型Huge或更小的载具都会被带到水浪行进的另一边。且所有巨型或更小的载具都有 [[/r 1d100cs<26#Vehicle is capsized]]{25%} 的几率倾覆。

直至法术终止或你选择另一个效应前，水位的上涨情况将保持不变。如果该效应用以产生波浪，则波浪在你下一回合开始时再次进行翻打。

分水。你使区域内的水体分开并形成一条水体的沟壑。沟壑从法术区域的一头延伸到另一头，而被分开的水体则在两边形成两道水墙。沟壑持续存在至法术终止或直至你选择另一个效应。该效应终止时，水流会逐渐在下一轮中将沟壑填满，直至其恢复成通常的水位。

转向。你使区域内的水体向一个你自选的方向流动，即使水流需要绕过障碍，或沿着墙壁向上流，甚至流向一些不太可能的方向，区域内的水体都将遵照你指使的方向流动，但一旦其流出法术区域，则会重新基于其所在地形选择流向。水体持续向你所选方向流动，直至法术终止或直至你选择另一效应。

漩涡。该效应需要水体至少为 50 尺的方形区域并且至少有 25 尺深。你在区域中央形成一个漩涡。其形态为底部宽 5 尺，顶部宽 50 尺，高 25 尺。水中任何距漩涡 25 尺内的生物或物件均被漩涡向自身拉动 10 尺。当一名生物在一个回合内第一次进入漩涡或在漩涡内结束其回合时，受影响的生物进行一次力量豁免。豁免失败则受到 2d8 点钝击伤害。豁免成功则只受一半伤害。一名生物若想以游泳方式离开漩涡，则必须先用一个动作远离漩涡并成功于一次对抗你法术豁免DC的 [[/check ability=str skill=ath dc=@attributes.spelldc]] 检定。

Extraplanar Gullet.name: Extraplanar Gullet
Extraplanar Gullet.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s back opens into a large mouth that leads to an extradimensional gullet. Anything it swallows is transported into this extraplanar space, which manifests as a rhizomatic network of slurping tunnels and fleshy passages. This space can hold any number of creatures of any size, and nothing inside the space can harm the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

A creature within the gullet can take an action to attempt to escape, making a [[/save]] saving throw. On a success, it reappears in the nearest unoccupied space within 5 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. On a failure, it takes [[/damage average]] damage. If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies, everything inside the extraplanar gullet appears in the nearest unoccupied spaces to its corpse.

Grasping Tentacles.name: Grasping Tentacles
Grasping Tentacles.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can have up to four tentacles at a time. Each tentacle has AC 20, 10 Hit Points, and Immunity to Poison and Psychic damage. Destroying a tentacle deals no damage to the [[lookup @name lowercase]], which can extrude a replacement tentacle on its next turn. A creature within 5 feet can take an action to break a tentacle with a successful [[/check]] check.

Break Tentacle Check.name: Break Tentacle Check
Break Tentacle Check.target: A creature Grappled by the Warp Marauder.

Swirling Color Field.name: Swirling Color Field
Swirling Color Field.description:
A field of shimmering color reverberates around the [[lookup @name lowercase]], distorting reality. A creature that hits the [[lookup @name lowercase]] with an attack suffers one of the following effects, determined randomly (roll [[/r 1d6]]). A creature &reference[Grappled apply=false] and adjacent to the [[lookup @name lowercase]] isn’t affected by the [[lookup @item.name]].

  • 1-2: Blue. The attacker is teleported to an unoccupied space the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within 20 feet. The chosen space must be on a surface or in a liquid that can support the target. The attacker is then subjected to the following effect. Charisma Saving Throw: DC 15. Failure: The target has the &reference[Immobilized apply=false] condition (save ends).

  • 3-4: Yellow. Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 15. Failure: [[/damage average activity=EGBtS0iSRE6Imd9R]] damage. Success: Half damage.

  • 5-6: Red. Wisdom Saving Throw: DC 15. Failure: The target has the &reference[Staggered] condition (save ends).

Roll for Color.name: Roll for Color
Roll for Color.condition: When a creature hits the Warp Marauder with an attack.

Swirling Color Field: Blue.name: Swirling Color Field: Blue
Swirling Color Field: Blue.description: 你陷入&reference[immobilized apply=false]状态。你可以在自己每一回合结束时重复进行针对此效应的豁免检定，成功则终止该效应。

Swirling Color Field: Red.name: Swirling Color Field: Red
Swirling Color Field: Red.description: 你陷入&reference[staggered apply=false]状态。你可以在自己每一回合结束时重复进行针对此效应的豁免检定，成功则终止该效应。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes four [[/item .q9szLnJZdaJU0xDP]] attacks, uses [[/item .qoTqfgwB0ZrR6b0e]], and makes one [[/item .TCdXVae1jujtDkDc]] attack.

Tentacle.name: Tentacle
Tentacle.description: [[/attack extended]]. Hit: The target has the &reference[Grappled] condition (escape DC 15). While Grappled, the target has the &reference[Restrained] condition and has Disadvantage on Strength checks and saving throws, and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can’t use this tentacle against another target.

Grappled by Tentacle.name: Grappled by Tentacle
Grappled by Tentacle.description: You are &reference[grappled apply=false] (escape DC 15). While grappled in this way, you are also &reference[restrained apply=false] and have Disadvantage on Strength checks and saving throws.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: Melee Attack Roll: +7, reach 5 ft, one creature &reference[Grappled apply=false] by the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. [[/damage extended]], and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] swallows the target. The target, along with everything it is wearing and carrying, appears in the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.aCH4GShKGpPXmH1P.Item.9nzfjWhuTcdEcOAj].

Swallowed: Extraplanar Gullet.name: Swallowed: Extraplanar Gullet
Swallowed: Extraplanar Gullet.description:
You have been swallowed by the warp marauder and have been transported into an extraplanar space, which manifests as a rhizomatic network of slurping tunnels and fleshy passages. This space can hold any number of creatures of any size, and nothing inside the space can harm the warp marauder.

While within the gullet, you can take an action to attempt to escape, making a [[/save 15 int]] saving throw. On a success, you reappear in the nearest unoccupied space within 5 feet of the warp marauder. On a failure, you take [[/damage average 3d6 psychic]] damage. If the warp marauder dies, everything inside the extraplanar gullet appears in the nearest unoccupied spaces to its corpse.

Reel.name: Reel
Reel.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] pulls each creature &reference[Grappled apply=false] by it up to 30 feet straight toward it.

Reality Hunter.name: Reality Hunter
Reality Hunter.description: Trigger: A creature &reference[Grappled apply=false] by the [[lookup @name lowercase]] attempts to teleport. Response: Intelligence Saving Throw: DC 15. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the teleport fails. Success: The teleport fails, but no resources are wasted.

save.condition: When a creature Grappled by the Warp Marauder attempts to teleport.

Dimensional Jump.name: Dimensional Jump
Dimensional Jump.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] teleports to an unoccupied space within 120 feet. Alternatively, it travels from the Material Plane to the Space Between Worlds or vice versa.

Aberrant Traits.name: Aberrant Traits
Aberrant Traits.description:
Given the contamination and delerium present within the Space Between Worlds, all creatures who dwell there are the product of contamination and unaffected by the normal dangers of delerium. As an aberrant, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has the following traits:

  • Fully Contaminated. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is immune to &reference[drakkenheimContamination] and has Advantage on saving throws against contaminated spells. This creature may cast contaminated spells even though it does not gain Contamination levels.

  • Delerium Healing. As an action, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can touch a delerium shard to regain 10 (3d6) Hit Points. Once the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has used a delerium shard in this way, the shard can't be used in this manner again for 24 hours.

  • Alien Intellect. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is immune to any effect that would sense its emotions or read its thoughts, as well as any divination spell that it refuses. Wisdom (Insight) checks made to ascertain the [[lookup @name lowercase]]s intentions or sincerity have Disadvantage.

Dimensional Anchor.name: Dimensional Anchor
Dimensional Anchor.description: The [[lookup @name]] can't be teleported or sent to another plane of existence unless it chooses to be.

Immutable Form.name: Immutable Form
Immutable Form.description: The [[lookup @name]] is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

Rejuvenation.name: Rejuvenation
Rejuvenation.description: If the [[lookup @name]] is destroyed, it reforms with all of its Hit Points 1 minute later unless a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplWish000000]{Wish} spell is used to stop it. A Wish spell used in this manner is always stressful, and the caster must roll to determine whether or not they can cast the Wish spell ever again.

Necrotic Vents.name: Necrotic Vents
Necrotic Vents.description: A creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of the [[lookup @name]takes [[/damage average]] damage.

Bound to Slaughter.name: Bound to Slaughter
Bound to Slaughter.description: If the [[lookup @name]] begins its turn more than 100 feet away from Slaughterstone Square, it disappears into the Haze and reappears 1 minute later at the center of Slaughterstone Square.

Lumber Forward.name: Lumber Forward
Lumber Forward.description: The Executioner moves up to its Speed.

Death Grip.name: Death Grip
Death Grip.description: Spectral chains appear around one creature within 300 feet of the [[lookup @name]]. The target has the &reference[Grappled] condition (escape DC 15), and it has the &reference[Restrained] condition until the grapple ends. The condition ends if the [[lookup @name]] uses Death Grip against a different target.

Death Grip.name: Death Grip
Death Grip.description: You are &reference[grappled apply=false] (escape DC 15). While grappled in this way, you are also &reference[restrained apply=false]. This effect ends early if the Executioner uses Death Grip against a different target.

Destroyer.name: Destroyer
Destroyer.description: The [[lookup @name]] chooses a Huge or smaller object or structure within 5 feet of it. Alternatively, it can choose a spell or magical effect within 30 feet of it. The object or structure is destroyed, or the spell or effect ends.

Summon Grasping Shadows.name: Summon Grasping Shadows
Summon Grasping Shadows.description: The [[lookup @name]] targets 1d4 corpses within 300 feet of it. Each target's spirit rises as a @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.YHTqsPLimwH3ft6j]{Grasping Shadows} in the nearest unoccupied space. The spirits act each round on Initiative count 20, and disappear if the [[lookup @name]] is destroyed.

Epic Boss.name: 史诗 Boss
Epic Boss.description:
This creature is an Epic Boss, a unique foe designed to pose a solo threat to an entire adventuring party. As such, it has additional game rules that sets it apart from normal creatures:

[[lookup @name]] always takes their turn on Initiative count 20. On their turn, they can use their movement and interaction as normal. However, they do not take an action or Bonus Action on their turn unless forced to do so by a spell or other effect. Instead, [[lookup @name]] takes one of the following Epic Actions at the end of each player character's turn.

All this creature's actions are Epic Actions.

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.aIt4k1FpvN44Ea2r.Item.n1qWQOweP9nWg1W2]{Lumber Forward}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.aIt4k1FpvN44Ea2r.Item.LunSIKLUXY7f9sRC]{Death Grip}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.aIt4k1FpvN44Ea2r.Item.uA6V126HniiEFMtz]{Guillotine Blade}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.aIt4k1FpvN44Ea2r.Item.xCwkMAQrBO9mriKZ]{Destroyer}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.aIt4k1FpvN44Ea2r.Item.E0FfxaC12QDsgP8x]{Summon Grasping Shadows}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.aIt4k1FpvN44Ea2r.Item.9WVVIKiaBQAZ7rr2]{Epic Resistance}

Epic Resistance.name: Epic Resistance
Epic Resistance.description: [[lookup @name]]选选择一个正影响其的状态、法术或其他效应，并投掷[[/r 1d20]]。若结果为 11 或更高，其身上的该效应终止。即使[[lookup @name]]无法执行动作、被其他生物控制动作或被法术或效应改变其游戏数据卡，其也可以执行该动作。

Guillotine Blade.name: Guillotine Blade
Guillotine Blade.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]] which ignores any Resistance or Immunity to Slashing damage. Immediately after making a ranged attack, this weapon flies back to the [[lookup @name]]'s hands. Critical Hit: The target dies unless it has the Epic Resistance action or Legendary Resistance trait.

Regeneration.name: Regeneration
Regeneration.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] regains 10 Hit Points at the start of each of its turns. If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes Acid or Fire damage, this trait doesn’t function at the start of the hag’s next turn. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies only if it starts its turn with 0 Hit Points and doesn’t regenerate.

Fungal Staff.name: Fungal Staff
Fungal Staff.description: Intelligence Saving Throw: DC 14, one creature within 5 ft. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage and the target has the &reference[Addled] condition (save ends).

Fungal Staff.name: Fungal Staff
Fungal Staff.description: 你陷入&reference[Addled]状态。你可以在自己每一回合结束时重复进行针对此效应的豁免检定，成功则终止该效应。

Slimeball.name: Slimeball
Slimeball.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and the target has the &reference[Burning] condition (3d10 Acid).

Burning (3d10 Acid).name: Burning (3d10 Acid)
Burning (3d10 Acid).description:
You are &reference[burning apply=false] from being covered in acid.

  • At the end of each of your turns, you take [[/damage average acid 3d10]] damage.

  • The condition ends if you or another creature within 5 feet of you spends an action to scrape off the acid or if some other effect removes it.

Spawn Troll.name: Spawn Troll
Spawn Troll.description: Trigger: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes damage. Response: Create one @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.kMue3OQFZtzXtzni] in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. The fungal trolling acts immediately after the triggering creature’s turn, then after the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s turn on subsequent rounds.

summon.condition: When the troll hag takes damage.

Spore Step.name: Spore Step
Spore Step.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] magically teleports to an unoccupied space it can see within 60 feet of it.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes one [[/item 4PLjXWqatkjV3rCh]] attack and one [[/item lMYb2PxRZ35TpaMi]] attack. It can replace either attack with a use of Spellcasting.

Contact Other Plane.name: Contact Other Plane
Contact Other Plane.description:
你与一名半神、一名古老贤者的亡魂或是其他位面的博学实体建立了精神的连接。与超越人智存在的连接可能会破坏你的心智。当你施展该法术时，进行一次[[/save int dc=15]]豁免。豁免成功时，你可以询问该实体最多五个问题。你必须在法术结束前提出你的问题。DM 将以一个单词回答你的每个问题，例如“是”、“不是”、“可能”、“不可能”、“无关”或“不清楚”（意味着该实体不知道该问题的答案）。如果一个单词的答案会造成误解，DM 可能会用一句短语作为答案。

豁免失败时，你将受到[[/damage 6d6 type=psychic]]伤害并且直到你完成一次长休为止，你陷入&Reference[Incapacitated]{失能}状态。对你施展法术@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplGreaterRes]{高等复原术}将结束该效应。

Scrying.name: 探知术
Scrying.description:
你能看见和听见一个和你处于同一存在位面上的生物。目标生物必须进行一次感知豁免；该豁免的调整值与你对目标的了解程度有关（见下文），也与你和目标之间的物理联系程度有关。目标不知道它进行此豁免在对抗什么，只是会感觉不自在。

你对目标的了解有… 豁免调整值
二手信息（你曾经听说过目标） +5
直接信息（你曾经见过目标） +0
熟悉（你对目标很了解） −5
你持有目标的… 豁免调整值
肖像或其他图像 −2
衣物或其他物品 −4
身体部位如头发或指甲 −10

如果对方豁免成功，则目标不受该法术影响，并且在 24 小时内你不能尝试探知同一个目标。

如果对方豁免失败，则你在目标身边 10 尺内创造出一个隐形的传感器。通过传感器，你可以身临其境地看见和听见周围的环境。传感器会跟随目标移动，并在法术持续时间内始终保持在目标 10 尺之内。在能够看到传感器的生物眼中，你的传感器是一个拳头大小的光球。

除生物之外，你也可以选择一个你以前见过的地点作为该法术的目标。这种情况下，传感器会出现在目标地点且不会移动。

Create Sensor.name: 创造探测器
Create Sensor.target: at target location or within 10 feet of target creature

Bestow Curse.name: Bestow Curse
Bestow Curse.description:
你触碰一名生物。该生物必须进行一次感知豁免并成功通过，否则将在法术持续时间内被诅咒。直到诅咒终止前，目标会遭受以下一项效应，由你选择：

  • 选择一项属性。目标使用该属性所进行的属性检定和豁免检定具有劣势。 （诅咒属性效应）
  • 目标对你发动的攻击检定具有劣势。 （诅咒攻击效应）
  • 在战斗中，目标在其每回合开始时必须进行一次感知豁免，豁免失败则在该回合中被迫执行 &Reference[Dodge]{回避}动作。 （诅咒行动效应）
  • 若你的攻击检定或法术对目标造成了伤害，则目标还会额外受到 1d8 暗蚀伤害。 （诅咒韧性效应）。

升环施法：使用四环法术位施展此法术时，你可以维持此法术的专注至多 10 分钟。使用五环及更高环阶的法术位施展此法术时，此法术无需专注，并且持续时间变为 8 小时（5～6 环法术位）或 24 小时（7～8 环法术位）。若你使用 9 环法术位施展此法术，则此法术会一直持续到被解除为止。

Cursed Charisma.name: Cursed Charisma
Cursed Charisma.description: The target has Disadvantage on ability checks and saving throws made with the chosen ability.

Cursed Constitution.name: Cursed Constitution
Cursed Constitution.description: The target has Disadvantage on ability checks and saving throws made with the chosen ability.

Cursed Dexterity.name: Cursed Dexterity
Cursed Dexterity.description: The target has Disadvantage on ability checks and saving throws made with the chosen ability.

Cursed Intelligence.name: Cursed Intelligence
Cursed Intelligence.description: The target has Disadvantage on ability checks and saving throws made with the chosen ability.

Cursed Strength.name: Cursed Strength
Cursed Strength.description: The target has Disadvantage on ability checks and saving throws made with the chosen ability.

Cursed Wisdom.name: Cursed Wisdom
Cursed Wisdom.description: The target has Disadvantage on ability checks and saving throws made with the chosen ability.

Cursed Attacks.name: Cursed Attacks
Cursed Attacks.description: The target has Disadvantage on attack rolls against you.

Cursed Actions.name: Cursed Actions
Cursed Actions.description: In combat, the target must succeed on a [[/save ability=wis dc=@attributes.spell.dc format=long]] at the start of each of its turns or be forced to take the &Reference[Dodge] action on that turn.

Cursed Resilience.name: Cursed Resilience
Cursed Resilience.description: If you deal damage to the target with an attack roll or a spell, the target takes an extra [[/damage 1d8 type=necrotic]] damage.

Plant Growth.name: Plant Growth
Plant Growth.description:
施法时间：动作 (繁茂) 或 8 小时(丰产)

该法术将活力引导给特定区域中的植物。本法术的施法时间取决于你选择下述效应之一：繁茂或丰产。

繁茂。 你指定施法距离内一点，以该点为中心 100 尺半径的球状范围内的普通植物将变的粗壮繁茂。一名穿过该区域的生物每移动 1 尺必须花费 4 尺移动力。你可以在该法术范围内空出一块或多块任意大小的区域，将其排除在法术效应影响之外。

丰产。 你指定施法距离内一点，距该点半里内的植物的产量将在 365 日内被强化。这些植物收获时将产出两倍于正常产量的作物。这些植物每年仅能从一道植物滋长中获益。

Druidcraft.name: Druidcraft
Druidcraft.description:
Whispering to the spirits of nature, you create one of the following effects within range.

Weather Sensor. You create a Tiny, harmless sensory effect that predicts what the weather will be at your location for the next 24 hours. The effect might manifest as a golden orb for clear skies, a cloud for rain, falling snowflakes for snow, and so on. This effect persists for 1 round.

Bloom. You instantly make a flower blossom, a seed pod open, or a leaf bud bloom.

Sensory Effect. You create a harmless sensory effect, such as falling leaves, spectral dancing fairies, a gentle breeze, the sound of an animal, or the faint odor of skunk. The effect must fit in a 5-foot Cube.

Fire Play. You light or snuff out a candle, a torch, or a campfire.

Mage Hand.name: 法师之手
Mage Hand.description:
一只漂浮的幽灵手出现在施法距离内你指定的一点。幽灵手持续存在至法术终止。如果幽灵手距你的距离超过 30 尺，或者当你再次施展了该法术时，则现存的幽灵手消失不见。

你可以在施展该法术时使用幽灵手实施一个行为：你可以操控一个物件，或者打开一扇未上锁的门或容器，或者将一件物品放入或取出一个打开的容器，或者将小瓶中的内容物倾倒出来。

在后续的回合中，以一个魔法动作，你可以控制幽灵手再次实施一个行为。作为那个动作的一部分，你可以令幽灵手移动至多 30 尺。

该幽灵手不能攻击，也不能激活魔法物品或承载超过 10 磅重的物质。

Minor Illusion.name: Minor Illusion
Minor Illusion.description:
你在施法距离内创造一段声响或一个物件的影像，并使之维持至法术持续时间结束，详见以下对应效应的描述。你可以再次施展该法术来终止幻象。

生物用研究动作调查该声响或影像时，其必须进行一次对抗该法术豁免 DC 的[[/check ability=int skill=inv dc=@attributes.spelldc]]检定，检定成功则判断出是幻象。对于识破幻象的生物而言，幻象会变得模糊不清。

声响。 如果你创造一段声响，其音量可以是低声耳语也可以是高声尖叫。它可以是你或其他任何人的嗓音，或者是一头狮子的咆哮、一段鼓声以及任何你指定的其他声响。声响在持续时间内不会减弱，或者你也可以于法术终止前在不同的时间段创造几段分散的声响。

影像。 如果你创造一个物件的影像，比如一把椅子、泥泞的脚印、一个小箱子等，则该物件各方向上大小不得大于 5 尺立方区域。该影像不具有声音、光亮、味道或任何其他的感官效应。由于影像可以被任何物体穿透，因此与之进行物理互动时都会揭露其幻象的本质。

Insect Swarm.name: Insect Swarm
Insect Swarm.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] emits a 10-foot Emanation of buzzing insects. A creature that starts its turn in the Emanation takes [[/damage average]] damage.

damage.target: A creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the bloated hive.

Disrupt the Hive.name: Disrupt the Hive
Disrupt the Hive.description: When the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies, it immediately spawns a @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.vV9jVbMm9oNpzDfo]{Swarm of Contaminated} Insects in its space.

Spawn Swarm.name: Spawn Swarm
Spawn Swarm.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] creates a @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.vV9jVbMm9oNpzDfo]{Swarm of Contaminated Insects}, which appears in an unoccupied space within 5 feet. The swarm takes its turn immediately after the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Distracting Swarm.name: Distracting Swarm
Distracting Swarm.description: The bloated hive causes its Insect Swarm to fly in the face of a creature within 5 feet of it. The target can't take Reactions until the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s turn.

Antimagic Susceptibility.name: 反魔法易感
Antimagic Susceptibility.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is incapacitated while in the area of antimagic. If targeted by @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplDispelMagi]{Dispel Magic}, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against the caster's spell save DC or become &reference[Unconscious] for 1 minute.

Disrupted Magic.name: Disrupted Magic
Disrupted Magic.description: The graffiti is &reference[unconscious apply=false] for the next minute.

Regeneration.name: Regeneration
Regeneration.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] regains 10 Hit Points at the start of each of its turns. If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is splashed with water, targeted by @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplPrestidigi]{Prestidigitation}, or takes Cold damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of its next turn. Its body is destroyed only if it starts its turn with 0 Hit Points and doesn't regenerate.

Solvent Susceptibility.name: Solvent Susceptibility
Solvent Susceptibility.description: The graffiti is instantly destroyed by @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.dmgUniversalSolv]{Universal Solvent}.

Spider Climb.name: Spider Climb
Spider Climb.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

Surface Bound.name: Surface Bound
Surface Bound.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can only move along contiguous flat surfaces, such as walls or floors.

Satire.name: Satire
Satire.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] shapes itself into a satirical representation of a foe. Wisdom Saving Throw: DC 15, one creature within 60 feet that can see the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage and the target has Disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn. Success: Half damage only.

Satire.name: Satire
Satire.description: You have disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks until the start of the graffiti's next turn.

Transposition.name: Transposition
Transposition.description: The air quivers around creatures near the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. Charisma Saving Throw: DC 15, up to five creatures the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within 120 feet. Failure: The creature teleports to an unoccupied space capable of supporting the creature within 120 feet.

Summon Public Opinion.name: Summon Public Opinion
Summon Public Opinion.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] conjures a swarm of Drakkenheim citizen spirits within 120 feet of itself. The swarm uses the @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.GVdbbOX0T7Yl8lHK]{Chorus} stat block. The chorus acts immediately after the [[lookup @name lowercase]] on the same Initiative count, and it obeys the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. The chorus disappears after 1 minute or the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies.

Hallucinatory Terrain.name: Hallucinatory Terrain
Hallucinatory Terrain.description:
你使施法距离内一处 150 尺立方区域内的自然地形在视觉、听觉、嗅觉上都像是另一种自然地形。因此，开阔的平原或者道路可能会变得像是一片沼泽，或是丘陵、裂谷以及其他难以通过，甚至是无法通过的地形。一个池塘可能变得看起来像一片草地，一个悬崖像是一个缓坡，或者使一条乱石沟像是一条宽阔平坦的道路。区域内经过加工的建筑、装备或生物的外表不会改变。

地形的触觉特征不会改变，所以进入这片区域的生物可能会看穿幻象。如果触觉区别不明显，一个仔细调查幻象的生物可以采取研究动作，尝试进行一次对抗法术豁免DC 的智力（[[/check ability=int skill=inv dc=@attributes.spelldc]]{调查}）检定以识破之。对于一个识破了幻象本体的生物，幻象看起来就像是一层模糊的图像叠加在真实地形上。

Major Image.name: Major Image
Major Image.description:
你创造一个影像，其形象来自一个大小不超过边长 20 尺立方体的物件或生物，或是其他的可视现象。影像出现在施法距离内你能看见的一处位置并在法术持续时间内维持存在。它看起来完全是真实的，并且还具有相应的声音、气味和温度。但它无法造成伤害或让人陷入任何状态。

在该幻象施法距离内时，你可以用一个魔法动作将影像移动到施法距离内的另一个位置。影像改变位置时，你可以改变影像的外表来使它移动得更自然。例如，如果你创造了一个生物的影像并移动它，则你可以改变影像，使它看起来就像是在走路。或者你也可以让影像在不同的时间发出不同的声音，甚至可以让它参与一场对话。

由于影像可以被穿过，任何与该影像进行的物理互动都会暴露其幻象的本质。一个生物用研究动作调查影像时，它可以进行一次对抗你的法术豁免 DC 的 [[/check ability=int skill=inv dc=@attributes.spelldc]] 检定，以判定是否看穿幻象。辨出幻象的生物可以看破该影像，而影像的其他感官效应在该生物看来会变得微弱而模糊。

升环施法： 使用高于三环的法术位时，法术时间持续至被解除且无需专注。

Mage Hand.name: 法师之手
Mage Hand.description:
一只漂浮的幽灵手出现在施法距离内你指定的一点。幽灵手持续存在至法术终止。如果幽灵手距你的距离超过 30 尺，或者当你再次施展了该法术时，则现存的幽灵手消失不见。

在后续的回合中，以一个魔法动作，你可以控制幽灵手再次实施一个行为。作为那个动作的一部分，你可以令幽灵手移动至多 30 尺。

该幽灵手不能攻击，也不能激活魔法物品或承载超过 10 磅重的物质。

Minor Illusion.name: Minor Illusion
Minor Illusion.description:
你在施法距离内创造一段声响或一个物件的影像，并使之维持至法术持续时间结束，详见以下对应效应的描述。你可以再次施展该法术来终止幻象。
