This creature is an Epic Boss, a unique foe designed to pose a solo threat to an entire adventuring party. As such, it has additional game rules that sets it apart from normal creatures:

[[lookup @name]] always takes their turn on Initiative count 20. On their turn, they can use their movement and interaction as normal. However, they do not take an action or Bonus Action on their turn unless forced to do so by a spell or other effect. Instead, [[lookup @name]] takes one of the following Epic Actions at the end of each player character's turn.

All this creature's actions are Epic Actions.

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.oYTuZQS8bgFAbirh.Item.kTaJNVuglID71MMD]{Tendril}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.oYTuZQS8bgFAbirh.Item.odQiZkb45F1tyqgz]{Whispers}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.oYTuZQS8bgFAbirh.Item.tpwu59FpDl7C4WD4]{Promises}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.oYTuZQS8bgFAbirh.Item.x3VA0NrDUTBt55PY]{Unfettered Glide}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.oYTuZQS8bgFAbirh.Item.gD0GAfkafHncnRl3]{Dominate}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.oYTuZQS8bgFAbirh.Item.c7shMLKEdr3CpoeN]{Spellcasting (Psionics)}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.oYTuZQS8bgFAbirh.Item.yK3idpZWT3c7O9Z1]{Epic Resistance}

Epic Boss.name: 史诗 Boss
Epic Boss.description:
This creature is an Epic Boss, a unique foe designed to pose a solo threat to an entire adventuring party. As such, it has additional game rules that sets it apart from normal creatures.

The creature always takes their turn on Initiative count 20. On their turn, they can use their movement and interaction as normal. However, they do not take an action or Bonus Action on their turn unless forced to do so by a spell or other effect. Instead, the creature takes one of the Epic Actions they have available.

Epic Resistance.name: Epic Resistance
Epic Resistance.description: [[lookup @name]]选选择一个正影响其的状态、法术或其他效应，并投掷[[/r 1d20]]。若结果为 11 或更高，其身上的该效应终止。即使[[lookup @name]]无法执行动作、被其他生物控制动作或被法术或效应改变其游戏数据卡，其也可以执行该动作。

Spellcasting (Psionics).name: Spellcasting (Psionics)
Spellcasting (Psionics).description: [[lookup @name]] casts one of the spells it knows, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 25).

Detect Thoughts.name: 侦测思想
Detect Thoughts.description:
你激活下述效应之一。直到法术结束为止，你可以在你随后的回合用一个魔法动作以激活下述任意效应之一。

感知思想。 你感知距你 30 尺内，知晓语言或能够心灵感应的思想的存在。你并不会阅读这些思想，但你知道这里存在一名有理智的生物。

此法术会被 1 尺厚的岩石、泥土或木头，1 寸厚的金属，或薄薄一层铅阻隔。

阅读思想。 选择一名距你 30 尺内的可见生物，或一名距你 30 尺内被感知思想侦测到的生物。你了解到此时目标最关心的事情。如果目标不知晓任何语言也不会心灵感应，则你不能得到任何信息。

在你的下一回合，用一个魔法动作，你可以尝试深入目标的心灵。如果你选择这么做，目标进行一次感知豁免。豁免失败，则你了解到他的逻辑推理、情绪状态以及他头脑中的一些大事（比如忧虑、挚爱和仇恨的事物）。豁免成功，法术终止。无论哪种情况，目标都会知道你正在窥探其心灵，且直到你的注意力从它的心灵上移开为止，目标均可以在其回合内使用动作进行一次 [[/check ability=int skill=arc dc=@attributes.spelldc]] 检定，对抗你的法术豁免DC，目标胜出对抗时，法术终止。

Suggestion.name: Suggestion
Suggestion.description:
你以魔法影响施法距离内一个你能看见的生物，并对其施以某种行动暗示（不超过 25 个词）。由你指定的受术目标必须能听到并理解你的话语。暗示必须听起来可行，也不涉及明显会对目标及其盟友造成伤害的内容。比如说，你可以说“把邪教的宝库钥匙找来，然后给我。”或者：“别打了，让图书馆保持安静，然后出去别回来。”

目标必须成功通过一次感知豁免，否则在法术持续时间内陷入&Reference[charmed]{魅惑}，若你或你的盟友对其造成伤害此法术将提前结束。被魅惑的生物会尽其所能地执行你所描述的行为。你所暗示的行为可能会在法术持续时间内始终一直进行，而如果你所暗示的活动可以用更短的时间完成，则此法术会在目标完成了你的要求后随即终止。

Pursuing Suggestion.name: Pursuing Suggestion
Pursuing Suggestion.description: The Charmed target pursues the suggestion to the best of its ability. The suggested activity can continue for the entire duration, but if the suggested activity can be completed in a shorter time, the spell ends for the target upon completing it.

Dimension Door.name: Dimension Door
Dimension Door.description:
You teleport to a location within range. You arrive at exactly the spot desired. It can be a place you can see, one you can visualize, or one you can describe by stating distance and direction, such as "200 feet straight downward" or "300 feet upward to the northwest at a 45-degree angle."

You can also teleport one willing creature. The creature must be within 5 feet of you when you teleport, and it teleports to a space within 5 feet of your destination space.

If you, the other creature, or both would arrive in a space occupied by a creature or completely filled by one or more objects, you and any creature traveling with you each take 4d6 Force damage, and the teleportation fails.

Dream.name: Dream
Dream.description:
你指定一名你知道且与你同处一个存在位面的生物。你或一名被你触碰的自愿生物将作为信使进入出神状态。该状态下，信使陷入 &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] 状态且速度降为 0。

如果目标正睡着，则信使可以在法术持续时间内出现在其梦中并在其沉睡期间与之交流。信使能够塑造梦中的环境，创造景观，物件和其他影像。信使可以随时结束出神状态，以此终止法术。目标在醒来后能清楚地记得其梦境的内容。

如果你施法时目标醒着，则信使可以了解到这点。此时信使可以终止出神并结束法术，或是等待目标入睡再进入其梦境。

你可以让信使以可怕的形象出现。但此时信使只能提供不超过十个单词的信息，随后目标必须成功通过一次感知豁免。豁免失败时，目标便无法从休息中获益，并在其醒来时受到 3d6 点心灵伤害。

Trance State.name: Trance State
Trance State.description: While in the trance, the messenger is Incapacitated and has a Speed of 0.

Invisibility.name: Invisibility
Invisibility.description:
A creature you touch has the &Reference[invisible apply=false] condition until the spell ends. The spell ends early immediately after the target makes an attack roll, deals damage, or casts a spell.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You can target one additional creature for each spell slot level above 2.

Invisible.name: 隐形
Invisible.description: 如果你进行攻击检定、造成伤害或施展法术，则该法术提前终止。

Major Image.name: Major Image
Major Image.description:
你创造一个影像，其形象来自一个大小不超过边长 20 尺立方体的物件或生物，或是其他的可视现象。影像出现在施法距离内你能看见的一处位置并在法术持续时间内维持存在。它看起来完全是真实的，并且还具有相应的声音、气味和温度。但它无法造成伤害或让人陷入任何状态。

在该幻象施法距离内时，你可以用一个魔法动作将影像移动到施法距离内的另一个位置。影像改变位置时，你可以改变影像的外表来使它移动得更自然。例如，如果你创造了一个生物的影像并移动它，则你可以改变影像，使它看起来就像是在走路。或者你也可以让影像在不同的时间发出不同的声音，甚至可以让它参与一场对话。

由于影像可以被穿过，任何与该影像进行的物理互动都会暴露其幻象的本质。一个生物用研究动作调查影像时，它可以进行一次对抗你的法术豁免 DC 的 [[/check ability=int skill=inv dc=@attributes.spelldc]] 检定，以判定是否看穿幻象。辨出幻象的生物可以看破该影像，而影像的其他感官效应在该生物看来会变得微弱而模糊。

升环施法： 使用高于三环的法术位时，法术时间持续至被解除且无需专注。

Sending.name: 短讯术
Sending.description:
你向你所遇到过的或某人遇到过且向你描述的一个生物发送一小段二十五个词以内的信息。该生物将在心中听到你的信息，它可以认出你是发讯人（如果他认识你），还可以用同样的方式立即回复一条讯息。法术会让目标能够理解你短讯的信息。

你的传讯可以跨越任意长的距离，甚至能跨越位面。但如果目标和你不在同一个存在位面，则短讯术有 5% 的概率无法到达。如果法术没有到达，你会知晓。

在收到你的信息后，一个生物能够阻塞你在 8 小时内以这个法术对他发信的能力。如果你在这段时间内试图送出另一条信息，你会得知你的短讯被阻塞，并且法术失败。

Dominate Monster.name: Dominate Monster
Dominate Monster.description:
一名法术范围内你可见的生物必须成功于一次感知豁免，否则在持续时间内陷入 &Reference[Charmed apply=false] 状态。若你或你的盟友正在与其战斗，则目标在此豁免上具有优势。目标受到伤害时，可以重复进行豁免，豁免成功则其身上的此法术终止。

目标被魅惑期间，只要你与其处于同一位面就可以与之保持心灵感应。在你的回合，你可以通过心灵感应命令该生物（无需动作），比如“攻击那个生物”“跑到那个位置”或是“去拿那个物品”。目标完成一项指令却未收到你的进一步指示时，将会凭自身喜好行动，尽可能的保护自己。

你可以用自己的反应去要求目标执行一项反应。

升环施法： 使用更高环阶法术位施展时，你的专注能持续更长时间，九环至多 8 小时。

Dominated.name: Dominated
Dominated.description: Whenever the target takes damage, it repeats the [[/save ability=wis]] save, ending the spell on itself on a success.

Mass Suggestion.name: Mass Suggestion
Mass Suggestion.description:
You suggest a course of activity—described in no more than 25 words—to twelve or fewer creatures you can see within range that can hear and understand you. The suggestion must sound achievable and not involve anything that would obviously deal damage to any of the targets or their allies. For example, you could say, "Walk to the village down that road, and help the villagers there harvest crops until sunset." Or you could say, "Now is not the time for violence. Drop your weapons, and dance! Stop in an hour."

Each target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or have the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] condition for the duration or until you or your allies deal damage to the target. Each Charmed target pursues the suggestion to the best of its ability. The suggested activity can continue for the entire duration, but if the suggested activity can be completed in a shorter time, the spell ends for a target upon completing it.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The duration is longer with a spell slot of level 7 (10 days), 8 (30 days), or 9 (366 days).

Charmed.name: Charmed
Charmed.description: The target has the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] condition for the duration or until you or your allies deal damage to the target. Each Charmed target pursues the suggestion to the best of its ability.

Project Image.name: 投影术
Project Image.description:
你创造一个自己的幻象分身，并使其在法术持续时间内维持存在。该分身可以出现在施法距离内你曾见过的任何地点，而不论中间是否存在障碍物。该幻象看起来和听起来都与你一样，只是没有现实形体。幻象受到伤害时会立即消失，法术终止。

你可以通过分身的眼睛视物，用分身的耳朵聆听，如同你处于它的位置一样。用一个&Reference[magic]{魔法}动作，你能使分身移动至多 60 尺，而其姿态、言语和行为均按照你的指定作表现。幻象可以完美地模仿你的举止。

由于东西可以穿过幻象，任何与该幻象进行的物理互动都会暴露其幻觉本质。一名生物可以采取&Reference[study]{研究}动作进行一次对抗你法术豁免 DC 的成功智力（[[/check ability=int skill=inv dc=@attributes.spelldc]]{调查}）检定以看穿幻象。辨出幻象的生物可以看穿该影像，其产生的声响对该生物而言显得虚假。

Scrying.name: 探知术
Scrying.description:
你能看见和听见一个和你处于同一存在位面上的生物。目标生物必须进行一次感知豁免；该豁免的调整值与你对目标的了解程度有关（见下文），也与你和目标之间的物理联系程度有关。目标不知道它进行此豁免在对抗什么，只是会感觉不自在。

你对目标的了解有… 豁免调整值
二手信息（你曾经听说过目标） +5
直接信息（你曾经见过目标） +0
熟悉（你对目标很了解） −5
你持有目标的… 豁免调整值
肖像或其他图像 −2
衣物或其他物品 −4
身体部位如头发或指甲 −10

如果对方豁免成功，则目标不受该法术影响，并且在 24 小时内你不能尝试探知同一个目标。

如果对方豁免失败，则你在目标身边 10 尺内创造出一个隐形的传感器。通过传感器，你可以身临其境地看见和听见周围的环境。传感器会跟随目标移动，并在法术持续时间内始终保持在目标 10 尺之内。在能够看到传感器的生物眼中，你的传感器是一个拳头大小的光球。

除生物之外，你也可以选择一个你以前见过的地点作为该法术的目标。这种情况下，传感器会出现在目标地点且不会移动。

Create Sensor.name: 创造探测器
Create Sensor.target: at target location or within 10 feet of target creature

Wish.name: 祈愿术
Wish.description:
祈愿术是凡间生物所能施展的最强大法术。你只需要大声说出自己的愿望就能改变现实世界本身。

法术最基础的用法是用来模仿任意一个八环或更低环阶的法术。如果你以此种方式使用该法术，你不需要满足目标法术所需的任何前提条件（包括有价值的材料成分）就可以让该法术生效。

作为另一种方式，你也可以选择让法术创造下列效应之一：

创造物件。你创造出一个价值不超过 25000GP 的物件，令其出现在地面上你能看见的一处未占据空间中。该物件不能是魔法物品，其在任意方向上的长度都不能超过 300 尺。

即刻治疗。你让你自己和至多二十个你可见的生物恢复全部生命值，并且终止它们身上一切在@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplGreaterRes]{高等复原术}中列举过的所有效应。

伤害抗性。你让至多十个你能看见的生物获得你所指定的一种伤害类型的抗性。此抗性是永久存在的。

免疫法术。你让最多十个你能看见的生物免疫于某道法术或某种其他魔法效应，持续 8 小时。

突来学识。你将你的一个专长替换为符合条件的另一个专长。你失去旧专长带来的全部好处，并获得新专长的好处。你无法取代作为你其他专长或特性先决条件的专长。

重新掷骰。你改变一件刚刚发生的事件。重掷前一轮（包括你的上一个回合）到现在期间的任意一次掷骰，并让现实随着你的新掷骰结果改变。例如，祈愿术以撤销队友的失败豁免或敌人的重击。你可以迫使重新进行的掷骰具有优势或劣势 ，并且可以选择是使用重投后的结果还是使用原来的结果。

重塑现实。你可能会许愿一些没有包含在上述效应中的东西。为了做到这样的效果，请尽可能准确地向地下城主描述你的愿望。在这种情况下，地下城主有极高的自由来裁决究竟会发生什么。不过愿望越大，出错的概率就越大。法术可能会直接失败，也可能部分的达成你想要的结果，还有可能因表述愿望时措辞不当而遭到意想不到的结果。例如，许愿让一个坏人死去可能会让你穿越到多年后该人已死的一个时间段，使你相当于离开了游戏一样。此外，许愿获取一件传说中的魔法物品或神器可能会立即将你传送到该物品当前的持有者身边。如果你许的愿望太过庞大，其效应影响到了社群、区域或是世界，你可能会引来强大的敌人。如果你的愿望会影响神，这名神的神仆会立刻干涉，阻止它或是鼓励你以一种特殊的方式许愿。如果你的愿望将会撤销多元宇宙本身，或是威胁到了印记城，或是以某种方式影响到了痛苦女士，你的心灵中就会浮现出一段她的影像：她摇了摇自己的脑袋，然后你的愿望失效了。

除了模仿其他法术外，施展该法术以达成的任何其他目的都会使你的身躯承受极大的负担，令你变得无比虚弱。承受负担后，直到你完成长休之前，你每次施展法术时都将受到一定伤害（伤害数值取决于你施展的法术的环阶，每环阶 1d10 点的暗蚀伤害），此伤害无法被任何方式减免。此外，你的力量属性值将变为 3，持续 2d4 日。这段时间内，你每花一整日休息（不从事轻度活动以外的行为），恢复需要的日数就减少 2 日。最后，承受负担时，你将有 [[/r 1d3cs1]]{33%} 的概率永远也无法再次施放祈愿术。

Wish Stress.name: Wish Stress
Wish Stress.description: Each time you cast a spell until you finish a Long Rest, you take [[/damage 1d10 type=necrotic]] damage per level of that spell. This damage can’t be reduced or prevented in any way. In addition, your Strength score becomes 3 for [[/r 2d4]] days.

Refract Elements.name: Refract Elements
Refract Elements.description:
Trigger: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes Acid, Cold, Fire, or Lightning damage. Response: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] gains Resistance to the triggering damage type, including the triggering damage, until the end of its next turn, During its next turn, its [[/item bPiS4GhVSfZHtwyi]] attack deals damage of that damage type instead of Radiant damage.

Foundry Note

You can use the "Refract Elements" enchant activity on this feature to enchant the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s Refracted Beam attack, changing its damage type in the process.

Refract Elements.name: Refract Elements
Refract Elements.condition: When the dreg takes Acid, Cold, Fire, or Lightning damage.

Refracted Acid.name: Refracted Acid
Refracted Acid.description: The crystalline dreg has refracted Acid damage. It gains resistance to Acid damage and its Refracted Beam attack gains new effects.

Refracted Fire.name: Refracted Fire
Refracted Fire.description: The crystalline dreg has refracted Fire damage. It gains resistance to Fire damage and its Refracted Beam attack gains new effects.

Refracted Cold.name: Refracted Cold
Refracted Cold.description: The crystalline dreg has refracted Cold damage. It gains resistance to Cold damage and its Refracted Beam attack gains new effects.

Refracted Lightning.name: Refracted Lightning
Refracted Lightning.description: The crystalline dreg has refracted Lightning damage. It gains resistance to Lightning damage and its Refracted Beam attack gains new effects.

Refracted Beam.name: Refracted Beam
Refracted Beam.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and the target has the &reference[Blinded] condition until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn. If this attack deals a different damage type due to Refract Elements, it has additional effects:

  • Acid or Fire: The target is also &reference[Burning] (2d6) of the corresponding damage type.

  • Cold: The target has the &reference[Frozen] Condition (DC 13).

  • Lightning: The target has the &reference[Shocked] Condition until the end of its next turn.

Refracted Beam.name: Refracted Beam
Refracted Beam.description: You are &reference[blinded apply=false] until the start of the crystalline dreg's next turn.

Burning (2d6 Fire).name: Burning (2d6 Fire)
Burning (2d6 Fire).description:
You are &reference[burning apply=false] from being covered in fire.

  • At the end of each of your turns, you take [[/damage average fire 2d6]] damage.

  • The condition ends if you or another creature within 5 feet of you spends an action to douse the fire or if some other effect removes it such as submerging yourself in water.

Burning (2d6 Acid).name: Burning (2d6 Acid)
Burning (2d6 Acid).description:
You are &reference[burning apply=false] from being covered in acid.

  • At the end of each of your turns, you take [[/damage average acid 2d6]] damage.

  • The condition ends if you or another creature within 5 feet of you spends an action to scrape off the acid or if some other effect removes it.

Frozen (DC 13).name: Frozen (DC 13)
Frozen (DC 13).description:
You're partially encased in ice:

  • You are &reference[Immobilized apply=false] & &reference[Defenseless apply=false].

  • You're &reference[Helpless apply=false] against attacks made with a weapon that deals bludgeoning damage.

  • You or another creature can take an action to break the ice away. To do so, you must succeed on a [[/check 13 str ath]] check.

Shocked.name: Shocked
Shocked.description:
You are &reference[dazed apply=false] and &reference[defenseless apply=false].

You drop whatever you're holding in your hands.

You must spend an action to draw, stow, or pick up an object.

Incorporeal Movement.name: Incorporeal Movement
Incorporeal Movement.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can move through other creatures and objects as if they were &reference[DifficultTerrain]. It takes [[/damage average]] damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

Psychic Scream.name: Psychic Scream
Psychic Scream.description: Intelligence Saving Throw: DC 13, each creature in a 30- foot Cone. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &reference[Frightened] condition (save ends).

Psychic Scream.name: Psychic Scream
Psychic Scream.description: 你陷入&reference[frightened apply=false]状态。你可以在自己每一回合结束时重复进行针对此效应的豁免检定，成功则终止该效应。

Possession.name: Possession
Possession.description:
Charisma Saving Throw: DC 13, one Humanoid the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within 5 feet. Failure: The target is possessed by the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] disappears, and the target has the &reference[Incapacitated] condition and loses control of its body. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] controls the target's body but doesn't deprive the target of awareness. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can't be targeted by any attack, spell, or other effect, except ones that turn undead. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] retains its alignment, Intelligence, Wisdom, Charisma, and Immunity to the Charmed and Frightened conditions. It otherwise uses the possessed target's game statistics, but doesn't gain access to the target's knowledge, class features, or proficiencies.

The possession lasts until the body drops to 0 Hit Points, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] ends it as a Bonus Action, or the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is turned or forced out by an effect like the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplDispelEvil]{Dispel Evil and Good} spell. When the possession ends, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] reappears in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the body. If the target succeeds on its save or the effect ends for it, it is immune to this [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s Possession for 24 hours.

Possessed.name: Possessed
Possessed.description: You have been possessed by the warp witch and are &reference[incapacitated apply=false].

Mutate Host.name: Mutate Host
Mutate Host.description: Charisma Saving Throw: DC 13, one creature the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is possessing. Failure: The target gains one Contamination level and a mutation.

Mutation Save.name: Mutation Save
Mutation Save.target: A creature that the warp witch is possessing.

Balefire Lantern.name: Balefire Lantern
Balefire Lantern.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and the target has the &reference[Slowed] condition until the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn.

Slowed by Balefire.name: Slowed by Balefire
Slowed by Balefire.description: You are &reference[slowed apply=false] until the end of the warp witch's next turn.

Steady Aim.name: Steady Aim
Steady Aim.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] grants itself Advantage on its next ranged attack roll this turn. It can use this Bonus Action only if it hasn't moved during this turn, and after it uses this Bonus Action, its Speed becomes 0 and can't increase until the end of this turn.

Chillsteel Longbow.name: Chillsteel Longbow
Chillsteel Longbow.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]]. Critical Hit: The target has the &reference[Frozen] condition (DC 10).

Frozen (DC 10).name: Frozen (DC 10)
Frozen (DC 10).description:
You're partially encased in ice:

  • You are &reference[Immobilized apply=false] & &reference[Defenseless apply=false].

  • You're &reference[Helpless apply=false] against attacks made with a weapon that deals bludgeoning damage.

  • You or another creature can take an action to break the ice away. To do so, you must succeed on a [[/check 10 str ath]] check.

Quiver.name: Quiver
Quiver.description: 箭袋至多能装入 20 根箭矢。

Arrows.name: Arrows
Arrows.description:
容器：@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbagQuiver00000]{箭袋}

具有@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbagAmmunitionV]{弹药}词条的武器需要弹药才能发射。武器的描述部分会指定这把武器需要哪种弹药。下面的弹药表列出了不同类型的弹药，以及购买这些弹药时一份能买到多少枚。列表还会列出这些弹药通常需要哪种容器存放；容器必须要单独购买。

Aura of the Blood Moon.name: Aura of the Blood Moon
Aura of the Blood Moon.description: 未失能的[[lookup @name lowercase]]笼罩在以其为中心的30尺半径光环内。每个处于光环内的生物都陷入&reference[Bloodied]状态，即便其生命值没有少于其最大生命值的一半。若[[lookup @name lowercase]]陷入&reference[Incapacitated apply=false]状态，此效应即刻终止。

Pack Tactics.name: Pack Tactics
Pack Tactics.description: 若[[lookup @name lowercase]]的攻击目标生物周围 5 尺范围内存在有至少一个未失能的盟友，则[[lookup @name lowercase]]对该生物进行的攻击检定具有优势。

Feast.name: 开宴
Feast.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]]对一名&reference[Bloodied]目标发动一次[[/item mLE2Ic73R8LN3OHa]]攻击。

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: [[/attack extended]]。[[/damage extended]]。

Spear.name: Spear
Spear.description: [[/attack extended]]。[[/damage extended]]，或使用双手发动近战攻击时[[/damage 1d8 + 3 piercing average]] 。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]]发动三次攻击。其可以将其中一次攻击替换为使用施法。

Bleeding (2d4).name: Bleeding (2d4)
Bleeding (2d4).description:
You're losing blood to an open wound.

  • Ongoing Damage: At the end of each of your turns, you lose [[/r 2d4]] Hit Points.

  • Regaining Hit Points: This condition ends if you regain any Hit Points.

  • Medical Treatment: You or another creature within 5 feet of you can spend an action and use a Healer's Kit to staunch the bleeding (no check required), ending the condition.

Electric Jolt.name: Electric Jolt
Electric Jolt.description: On hit, the target has the Shocked condition until the end of the Reanimator's next turn.

Shocked.name: Shocked
Shocked.description: You are &reference[shocked apply=false] until the end of the reanimator's next turn.

Necrotic Blast.name: Necrotic Blast
Necrotic Blast.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]]. On hit, he target has the &reference[Weakened] condition until the end of the Reanimator's next turn.

Necrotic Blast.name: Necrotic Blast
Necrotic Blast.description: You are &reference[weakened apply=false] until the end of the reanimator's next turn.

Touch of Death.name: Touch of Death
Touch of Death.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]]. This damage ignores Resistance and Immunity to Poison damage and can't be reduced or prevented in any way. If the target is reduced to 0 Hit Points, it automatically fails death saving throws until it finishes a Long Rest. A @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplHeal000000]{Heal} or @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplGreaterRes]{Greater Restoration} spell ends this effect early.

Reanimate.name: Reanimate
Reanimate.description: The Reanimator targets the corpse of one of its destroyed creations it can see within 30 feet. The target returns to life with 45 (10d8) Hit Points. The target has Resistance to all damage and Advantage on saving throws until the end of its next turn.

Reanimation Surge.name: Reanimation Surge
Reanimation Surge.description: The creature has advantage on all saving throws and resistance to all damage until the end of it's next turn.

Bodyguard.name: Bodyguard
Bodyguard.description: Trigger: A creature the Reanimator can see targets it with an attack or spell that targets only the reanimator. Response: The Reanimator chooses one of its creations within 10 feet and switches spaces with it. The creation becomes the target instead.

utility.condition: When a creature the Reanimator can see targets it with an attack or spell that targets only the reanimator.

Creator's Command.name: Creator's Command
Creator's Command.description: The Reanimator chooses a creature it can see that was reanimated or created by it. The target can use its Reaction to make an attack with Advantage or move up to its Speed without provoking Opportunity Attacks.

Writhing Aura.name: Writhing Aura
Writhing Aura.description: The ground within 30 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is filled with plant roots and becomes &reference[DifficultTerrain]. A creature that starts its turn in the aura takes [[/damage average]] damage.

Poison Ivy.name: Poison Ivy
Poison Ivy.description: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] would take Poison damage, it instead takes no damage and regains Hit Points equal to the Poison damage it would have received.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and the target has the &reference[Grappled] condition (escape DC 15). Until this grapple ends, the target has the &reference[Restrained] condition and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can't Bite another target.

Grappled by Bite.name: Grappled by Bite
Grappled by Bite.description: You are &reference[grappled apply=false] (escape DC 15). While grappled in this way, you are also &reference[restrained apply=false].

Spit Acid.name: Spit Acid
Spit Acid.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]]. On hit, the target has the &reference[Burning] condition (2d4 Acid). While Burning, the target has the &reference[Blinded] condition.

Burning (2d4 Acid).name: Burning (2d4 Acid)
Burning (2d4 Acid).description:
You are &reference[burning apply=false] from being covered in acid.

  • At the end of each of your turns, you take [[/damage average acid 2d4]] damage.

  • The condition ends if you or another creature within 5 feet of you spends an action to scrape off the acid or if some other effect removes it.

While Burning in this way, you are &reference[blinded apply=false]

Swallow.name: Swallow
Swallow.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes one Bite attack against a Medium or smaller target it has &reference[Grappled apply=false]. If the attack hits, the target is swallowed and the grapple ends. The swallowed target has the &reference[Blinded apply=false] and &reference[Restrained apply=false] conditions, has &reference[TotalCover] from attacks and effects outside the [[lookup @name lowercase]], and takes [[/damage average]] damage at the start of each of its turns. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can have up to four targets swallowed at a time.

If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes 15 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, it must succeed on a [[/save]] saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which land with the &reference[Prone] condition in unoccupied spaces within 10 feet of it. If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies, a swallowed creature no longer has the Restrained condition and can escape from the corpse using 5 feet of movement, exiting with the &reference[Prone] condition.

Regurgitate Save.name: Regurgitate Save
Regurgitate Save.condition: When the ravenous flora takes 15+ damage on a single turn from a creature inside it.

Start of Turn Damage.name: Start of Turn Damage
Start of Turn Damage.target: Creatures swallowed by the ravenous flora.

Swallowed.name: Swallowed
Swallowed.description:
You have been swallowed by the ravenous flora. While swallowed, you are &reference[blinded apply=false], &reference[restrained apply=false], and have &reference[totalcover] from effects originating from outside the ravenous flora.

You take [[/damage average acid 3d6]] damage at the start of each of the ravenous flora's turns.

Hypnotic Pollen.name: Hypnotic Pollen
Hypnotic Pollen.description: Wisdom Saving Throw: DC 16, each creature in a 60-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &reference[Weakened] condition (save ends). While Weakened, the target must spend all of its movement on each of its turns to move directly toward the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. During this movement, the target ignores &reference[DifficultTerrain] caused by the flora's @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.q32Lt79KLHKTLpxB.Item.Mp9bNtBayhk2lmP3]{Writhing Aura}.

Hypnotic Pollen.name: Hypnotic Pollen
Hypnotic Pollen.description:
You are &reference[weakened apply=false]. You can repeat your saving throw against this effect at the end of each of your turns, ending the effect on a success.

While Weakened in this way, you must spend all of your movement on each of your turns to move directly toward the ravenous flora. During this movement, you ignore &reference[DifficultTerrain] caused by the flora’s Writhing Aura.

However, they do not take an action or Bonus Action on their turn unless forced to do so by a spell or other effect. Instead, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes one of the following Epic Actions at the end of each player character's turn.

All this creature's actions are Epic Actions.

Epic Resistance.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] chooses one condition, spell, or other effect currently affecting them and rolls [[/r 1d20]]. On an 11 or higher, the effect ends on them. A creature within 5 feet can take an action to remove the threads with a successful [[/check]] check, ending the effect. Your eyes have been sewn shut. You are &reference[blinded apply=false].

If the check was failed by 5 or more, you take [[/damage average 2d10 slashing]] damage and the threads aren't removed.

Attach Limb.name: Attach Limb
Attach Limb.description:
Strength Saving Throw: DC 17, one creature the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within 10 feet (&reference[Grappled apply=false], &reference[Slowed apply=false], &reference[Restrained apply=false], &reference[Incapacitated apply=false], and &reference[Immobilized apply=false] creatures have Disadvantage). Failure: The target makes a [[/save]] saving throw at the start of each of its turns. On a success, it controls the limb until the start of its next turn. Otherwise, the limb is uncontrolled for the same duration. The target suffers one of the following effects depending on the attached limb:

  • Head. While controlled, the target has Advantage on Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma-based D20 Tests. While uncontrolled, the target can control its action or its movement on its turn, but the head controls the other. On a failure by 5 or more, the head chooses which to control instead of the target.

  • Arm. While controlled, the target can take an extra action on its turn, choosing from the Attack (one weapon attack only) or Utilize actions. While uncontrolled, the extra arm makes one melee weapon attack against the target at the start of its turn. The arm has a +9 attack bonus and deals 14 (3d6 + 4) Bludgeoning damage on a hit.

  • Leg. While controlled, the target can take an extra action on its turn, choosing from the Dash or Disengage actions. While uncontrolled, the leg forces the target to move up to its Speed in a random direction at the start of its turn. If this movement forces the target toward a hazard or precipice, the host can repeat the saving throw. On a successful save, it stops its movement and has the Prone condition before entering the hazard.

An attached limb can be attacked (AC 20, 20 Hit Points, Immunity to Poison and Psychic damage). A creature within 5 feet can take an action to remove the limb with a successful [[/check 17 wis med]] check or [[/check 15 str]] check. When removed by any means other than a successful Wisdom (Medicine) check, the target takes [[/damage average]] damage and has the &reference[Bleeding] condition (4d4).

Uncontrolled Head: While uncontrolled, you can control your action or your movement on your turn, but the head controls the other. On a failure by 5 or more, the head chooses which to control instead of you.

False Appearance.description: While the [[lookup @name lowercase]] remains motionless in its Structural Form, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary structure or vehicle, such as a house or a sailing ship

Structural Form.name: Structural Form
Structural Form.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can spend 10 minutes in Concentration to shape-shift into a Gargantuan structure or back into its true, amorphous form. Its game statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed.

While in the form of a structure, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes up its entire space and creates floors, walls, doorways, and windows within its space which resemble and behave like normal structures, while leaving behind open space within it to create rooms. Creatures can pass through the open spaces and stop there as if moving through a normal structure.

The walls and floors of the living city can be damaged and thus breached. Each 5-foot-by-5-foot section has AC 15 and 30 Hit Points. Reducing a section to 0 Hit Points destroys it and deals 30 damage to the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. A [[lookup @name lowercase]] can only take this damage once per turn.

In addition, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] extrudes pieces of itself inside its space which resemble furnishings and everyday objects. The extrusions appear, feel, sound, and behave exactly like the mimicked objects. A thin, slimy tendril connects any furnishings or objects to the body of the living city. The tendril has AC 15 and 1 Hit Point. If the tether is severed or destroyed, the simulacra melts into goo, but does no harm to the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

No Exit.name: No Exit
No Exit.description:
When it rolls for Initiative, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] reflexively closes the windows, doors, and other egress points on the outside of its body, preventing creatures inside it from leaving its space.

A creature in the [[lookup @name lowercase]] space that attempts to leave its space using teleportation or planar travel is subjected to the following effect. Charisma Saving Throw: DC 20. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage. Failure or Success: The teleportation or planar travel fails.

Creatures inside the [[lookup @name lowercase]] who are not directly observing the shift must succeed on a [[/check]] check to notice the change.

If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] creates a wall that cuts through another creature's space when it appears, the creature is pushed to one side of the wall (the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s choice). If a creature would be surrounded on all sides by the wall (or the wall and another solid surface), that creature can make a [[/save]] saving throw. On a success, it can use its Reaction to move up to its speed so that it is no longer enclosed by the wall.

Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes [[/item Fe0Cb6CUcooE0YHT]] attacks and one [[/item eXCJDYwktHJBaJde]] attack. It can replace its Bite with [[/item Kpkc84LFSb2FUyce]], if available.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and the target has the &reference[Enfeebled] condition until the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] regains Hit Points equal to the damage dealt by its Bite.

Enfeebling Bite.name: Enfeebling Bite
Enfeebling Bite.description: You are &reference[enfeebled apply=false] until the end of the belfray's next turn.

Lie Detection.name: Lie Detection
Lie Detection.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] always knows if it hears a lie, and has Advantage on Wisdom (Insight) checks.

Unmatched Intellect.name: Unmatched Intellect
Unmatched Intellect.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] adds its Intelligence modifier to its Initiative rolls.

Mind Thrust.name: Mind Thrust
Mind Thrust.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and the target is pushed 10 feet in any horizontal direction.

Mass Manipulation.name: Mass Manipulation
Mass Manipulation.description: Intelligence Saving Throw: DC 16, up to six creatures within 60 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] that can see and hear it. Failure: The target must use its Reaction to move up to its Speed and make a weapon attack or cast a cantrip. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] chooses the direction of the movement and the target of the attack or cantrip.

save.target: That can both see and hear the alienist.

Nerve Gas.name: Nerve Gas
Nerve Gas.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] creates a 10-foot radius Sphere of psychoactive fog centered on a point it can see within 60 feet. The fog spreads around corners and renders its area &reference[HeavilyObscured]. It lasts for 1 minute or until a strong wind disperses it.

A creature that enters the fog for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there is subjected to the following effect. Intelligence Saving Throw: DC 16. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &reference[Incapacitated] condition until the start of its next turn. Success: Half damage only.

Mind Over Matter.name: Mind Over Matter
Mind Over Matter.description: Trigger: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes damage. Response: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] gains Resistance to the triggering damage.

utility.condition: When the alienist takes damage.

Teleport.name: Teleport
Teleport.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] teleports to an unoccupied space it can see within 60 feet.

Detect Thoughts.name: 侦测思想
Detect Thoughts.description:
你激活下述效应之一。直到法术结束为止，你可以在你随后的回合用一个魔法动作以激活下述任意效应之一。

感知思想。 你感知距你 30 尺内，知晓语言或能够心灵感应的思想的存在。你并不会阅读这些思想，但你知道这里存在一名有理智的生物。

此法术会被 1 尺厚的岩石、泥土或木头，1 寸厚的金属，或薄薄一层铅阻隔。

阅读思想。 选择一名距你 30 尺内的可见生物，或一名距你 30 尺内被感知思想侦测到的生物。你了解到此时目标最关心的事情。如果目标不知晓任何语言也不会心灵感应，则你不能得到任何信息。

在你的下一回合，用一个魔法动作，你可以尝试深入目标的心灵。如果你选择这么做，目标进行一次感知豁免。豁免失败，则你了解到他的逻辑推理、情绪状态以及他头脑中的一些大事（比如忧虑、挚爱和仇恨的事物）。豁免成功，法术终止。无论哪种情况，目标都会知道你正在窥探其心灵，且直到你的注意力从它的心灵上移开为止，目标均可以在其回合内使用动作进行一次 [[/check ability=int skill=arc dc=@attributes.spelldc]] 检定，对抗你的法术豁免DC，目标胜出对抗时，法术终止。

Suggestion.name: Suggestion
Suggestion.description:
你以魔法影响施法距离内一个你能看见的生物，并对其施以某种行动暗示（不超过 25 个词）。由你指定的受术目标必须能听到并理解你的话语。暗示必须听起来可行，也不涉及明显会对目标及其盟友造成伤害的内容。比如说，你可以说“把邪教的宝库钥匙找来，然后给我。”或者：“别打了，让图书馆保持安静，然后出去别回来。”

目标必须成功通过一次感知豁免，否则在法术持续时间内陷入&Reference[charmed]{魅惑}，若你或你的盟友对其造成伤害此法术将提前结束。被魅惑的生物会尽其所能地执行你所描述的行为。你所暗示的行为可能会在法术持续时间内始终一直进行，而如果你所暗示的活动可以用更短的时间完成，则此法术会在目标完成了你的要求后随即终止。

Pursuing Suggestion.name: Pursuing Suggestion
Pursuing Suggestion.description: The Charmed target pursues the suggestion to the best of its ability. The suggested activity can continue for the entire duration, but if the suggested activity can be completed in a shorter time, the spell ends for the target upon completing it.

Modify Memory.name: Modify Memory
Modify Memory.description:
You attempt to reshape another creature's memories. One creature that you can see within range makes a Wisdom saving throw. If you are fighting the creature, it has Advantage on the save. On a failed save, the target has the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] condition for the duration. While Charmed in this way, the target also has the &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition and is unaware of its surroundings, though it can hear you. If it takes any damage or is targeted by another spell, this spell ends, and no memories are modified.

While this charm lasts, you can affect the target's memory of an event that it experienced within the last 24 hours and that lasted no more than 10 minutes. You can permanently eliminate all memory of the event, allow the target to recall the event with perfect clarity, change its memory of the event's details, or create a memory of some other event.

You must speak to the target to describe how its memories are affected, and it must be able to understand your language for the modified memories to take root. Its mind fills in any gaps in the details of your description. If the spell ends before you finish describing the modified memories, the creature's memory isn't altered. Otherwise, the modified memories take hold when the spell ends.

A modified memory doesn't necessarily affect how a creature behaves, particularly if the memory contradicts the creature's natural inclinations, alignment, or beliefs. An illogical modified memory, such as a false memory of how much the creature enjoyed swimming in acid, is dismissed as a bad dream. The DM might deem a modified memory too nonsensical to affect a creature.

A @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplRemoveCurs]{Remove Curse} or @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplGreaterRes]{Greater Restoration} spell cast on the target restores the creature's true memory.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You can alter the target's memories of an event that took place up to 7 days ago (level 6 spell slot), 30 days ago (level 7 spell slot), 365 days ago (level 8 spell slot), or any time in the creature's past (level 9 spell slot).

Memory Modification.name: Memory Modification
Memory Modification.description: While &Reference[Charmed apply=false] in this way, the target also has the &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition and is unaware of its surroundings, though it can hear you. If it takes any damage or is targeted by another spell, this spell ends, and no memories are modified.

Telekinesis.name: 心灵遥控
Telekinesis.description:
你获得以思想移动或操纵生物或物件的能力。你施展法术时或在法术终止前的其后回合中用一个魔法动作，你可以向施法距离内可见的一名生物或一个物件伸展你的意志，造成对应的下述效应。你可以一轮接一轮地影响同一个目标，也可以在任何时候选择一个新的目标。如果你改变了目标，则之前的目标将不再受该法术影响。

生物。 你可以尝试移动一名巨型或更小的生物。目标必须成功于一次力量豁免，否则你可以将其往任意方向移动 30 尺，但不能让它离开施法距离。在你的下个回合结束前，该生物陷入 &Reference[Restrained] 状态，而被你举到空中的生物会在半空中悬停。除非你再次使用此选项且目标失败于豁免，否则被举到空中的生物会在你的下个回合结束坠落。

物件。 你可以尝试移动一个巨型或更小的物件。如果该物品没有被着装或携带，则你可以自动使它朝任何方向移动 30 尺，但不能让它离开施法距离。

如果该物件已被一名生物着装或携带，则那名生物必须成功于一次力量豁免，否则你可以把目标物件从该生物身上拿走，并且使该物体朝任意方向移动 30 尺，但不能让它离开施法距离。

你可以使用心灵遥控对物体进行精密操作，例如操纵一件简单的工具，打开一扇门或一个容器，把东西放进或拿出一个打开的容器中，或是把一个小瓶子里的东西倒出来。

Aura of Storms.name: Aura of Storms
Aura of Storms.description: A creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of the [[lookup @name]] takes [[/damage average]] damage.

Frightful Screech.name: Frightful Screech
Frightful Screech.description: Wisdom Saving Throw: DC 15, one creature within 120 feet of the [[lookup @name]] that can hear them. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &reference[Frightened] condition (save ends). While Frightened, the target must take the Dash action and move away from the [[lookup @name]] by the safest available route on each of its turns unless there is nowhere to move.

Frightful Screech.name: Frightful Screech
Frightful Screech.description:
You are &reference[addled apply=false]. You can repeat your saving throw against this effect at the end of each of your turns, ending the effect on a success.

While Frightened in this way, you must take the Dash action and move away from the Crimson Countess by the safest available route on each of your turns unless there is nowhere to mvoe.

Lightning Strike.name: Lightning Strike
Lightning Strike.description: Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 15, each creatures in a 60-foot long, 5-foot wide Line. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &reference[Shocked] condition until the end of its next turn. Success: Half damage only.

Shocked.name: Shocked
Shocked.description: You are &reference[shocked apply=false] until the end of your next turn.

Pluck.name: Pluck
Pluck.description: The [[lookup @name]] doesn't need to spend extra movement to drag a Medium or smaller creature &reference[Grappled apply=false] by it.

Epic Boss.name: 史诗 Boss
Epic Boss.description:
This creature is an Epic Boss, a unique foe designed to pose a solo threat to an entire adventuring party. As such, it has additional game rules that sets it apart from normal creatures:

[[lookup @name]] always takes their turn on Initiative count 20. On their turn, they can use their movement and interaction as normal. However, they does not take an action or Bonus Action on their turn unless forced to do so by a spell or other effect. Instead, [[lookup @name]] takes one of the following Epic Actions at the end of each player character's turn.

All this creature's actions are Epic Actions.

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.syCsNXouOCtFZeb0.Item.c8ANnIaj5GjTb3lK]{Grasping Talons}

Epic Resistance.name: Epic Resistance
Epic Resistance.description: [[lookup @name]]选选择一个正影响其的状态、法术或其他效应，并投掷[[/r 1d20]]。若结果为 11 或更高，其身上的该效应终止。即使[[lookup @name]]无法执行动作、被其他生物控制动作或被法术或效应改变其游戏数据卡，其也可以执行该动作。

Grasping Talons.name: Grasping Talons
Grasping Talons.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and if the target is Medium or smaller, it has the &reference[Grappled] condition (escape DC 15).

Aerial Acrobat.name: Aerial Acrobat
Aerial Acrobat.description: The [[lookup @name]] flies up to her Speed without provoking Opportunity Attacks.

Fully Contaminated.name: Fully Contaminated
Fully Contaminated.description: The [[lookup @name]] is immune to &reference[drakkenheimContamination] and has Advantage on saving throws against contaminated spells. The [[lookup @name]] may cast contaminated spells even though it does not gain Contamination levels.

Life Support System.name: Life Support System
Life Support System.description: The [[lookup @name]] is protected by three machine nodes that make up its Life Support System. The nodes are positioned in a triangle, each no further than 30 feet apart from the rest. Each node is a Large object with AC 20, 25 Hit Points per player character, and Immunity to Poison and Psychic damage. The [[lookup @name]] can't move or be moved more than 60 feet away from any two of its Life Support System nodes.

Nightmare Aura.name: Nightmare Aura
Nightmare Aura.description: A creature that starts its turn within 120 feet of the [[lookup @name]] takes [[/damage average]] damage.

Shield Generator.name: Shield Generator
Shield Generator.description: As long as at least one machine node in the Life Support System remains, the [[lookup @name]]'s Immunities can't be ignored except by effects caused by level 9 spells or artifacts. If all nodes are destroyed, the [[lookup @name]] loses its Immunities.

Shield Generator.name: Shield Generator
Shield Generator.description: As long as at least one machine node in the Life Support System remains, the Think Tank’s Immunities can’t be ignored except by effects caused by level 9 spells or artifacts. If all nodes are destroyed, the Think Tank loses its Immunities.

Telepathic Eavesdropping.name: Telepathic Eavesdropping
Telepathic Eavesdropping.description: The [[lookup @name]] can project its consciousness to see and hear any creature or location within 5 miles as if it had cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplScrying000]{Scrying} (no action required). It can read the thoughts of creatures in this area, communicate with them telepathically, and listen in on telepathic communications which occur between other creatures in the region. It remains aware of its own surroundings while doing so. It cannot observe the area within a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbPrivateSanctu]{Private Sanctum} spell or locations and creatures protected by magic which blocks divination or scrying sensors.

Contaminated Blast.name: Contaminated Blast
Contaminated Blast.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]]. Constitution Saving Throw: DC 20. Failure: The target gains a &reference[drakkenheimContamination] level.

Telekinetic Grip.name: Telekinetic Grip
Telekinetic Grip.description:
The [[lookup @name]] reaches out with its mind to hold one creature or object it can see within 120 feet of it in its psychic grasp. If the target is a creature, it is subjected to the following effect. Strength Saving Throw: DC 20. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target is moved up to 30 feet in any direction and has the &reference[Restrained] condition until it escapes or the [[lookup @name]] has the &reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition. The [[lookup @name]] can hold up to two creatures or objects in its grip at one time. On its turn, a held creature can take an action to repeat the save, escaping the grip on a success.

If the target is an object weighing 1,000 pounds or less that isn't being worn or carried, it is telekinetically moved up to 30 feet in any direction. The [[lookup @name]] can also exert fine control on objects with its telekinesis, such as manipulating surgical tools or opening a door or a container.

Telekinetic Grip.name: Telekinetic Grip
Telekinetic Grip.description: You have been telekinetically &reference[restrained apply=false] by the Think Tank. You can repeat your save against this feature as an action, ending the effect on yourself on a successful save.

Pluck the Puppet Strings.name: Pluck the Puppet Strings
Pluck the Puppet Strings.description: Wisdom Saving Throw: DC 20, one creature within 120 feet of the [[lookup @name]]. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target must use its Reaction to move up to its Speed directly toward a creature of the [[lookup @name]]'s choice. If the target ends this movement within reach of the chosen creature, it must make a melee weapon attack against that creature with Advantage.

Mind Cage.name: Mind Cage
Mind Cage.description: Intelligence Saving Throw: DC 20, one creature the [[lookup @name]] can see within 120 feet. Success: [[/damage average]] damage. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target perceives itself to be trapped within a nightmare conjured forth from the depths of its own psyche until it escapes. While trapped, the target has the &reference[Immobilized apply=false], &reference[Blinded apply=false], and &reference[Deafened apply=false] conditions. On its turn, the target can take an action to repeat the save. Each time it does, it takes [[/damage average]] damage. On a success, the effect ends for it.

Unbind Gravity.name: Unbind Gravity
Unbind Gravity.description:
The [[lookup @name]] controls gravity in a 200-foot Cube centered on itself until the end of the next round. Each time the [[lookup @name]] uses this Epic Action, it decides which direction gravity pulls within the area. All creatures and objects that aren't somehow anchored to the ground in the area fall in the chosen direction until they reach the edge of the area. A creature can make a [[/save dex 20]] saving throw to grab onto a fixed object it can reach, avoiding the fall on a success.

If some solid object (such as a ceiling) is encountered in this fall, falling objects and creatures strike it just as they would during a nor- mal downward fall. If an object or creature reaches the edge of the area without striking anything, it remains there, oscillating slightly, for the duration.

Alternatively, the [[lookup @name]] can decide to prevent gravity from acting within the area. When it does, creatures within the area without a Fly Speed levitate in midair, and must move by pushing or pulling against a fixed object or surface within reach (such as a wall or a ceiling), which allows them to move as if they were climbing. Unattended objects float around randomly.

If the [[lookup @name]] doesn't use this Epic Action during the next round, the effect ends and affected objects and creatures fall back down.

This creature is an Epic Boss, a unique foe designed to pose a solo threat to an entire adventuring party. As such, it has additional game rules that sets it apart from normal creatures:

The [[lookup @name]] always takes their turn on Initiative count 20. On their turn, they can use their movement and interaction as normal. However, they do not take an action or Bonus Action on their turn unless forced to do so by a spell or other effect. Instead, the [[lookup @name]] takes one of the following Epic Actions at the end of each player character's turn.

All this creature's actions are Epic Actions.

Epic Boss.name: 史诗 Boss
Epic Boss.description:
This creature is an Epic Boss, a unique foe designed to pose a solo threat to an entire adventuring party. As such, it has additional game rules that sets it apart from normal creatures.

The creature always takes their turn on Initiative count 20. On their turn, they can use their movement and interaction as normal. However, they do not take an action or Bonus Action on their turn unless forced to do so by a spell or other effect. Instead, the creature takes one of the Epic Actions they have available.

Epic Resistance.name: Epic Resistance
Epic Resistance.description: The [[lookup @name]] chooses one condition, spell, or other effect currently affecting them and rolls [[/r 1d20]]. On an 11 or higher, the effect ends on them. The [[lookup @name]] can use this Epic Action even if they would otherwise be unable to take actions, their actions are being controlled by another creature, or if a spell or effect alters their game statistics.

Spindly Claw.name: Spindly Claw
Spindly Claw.description: Constitution Saving Throw: DC 11, one creature within 5 ft. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage and the target gains one &reference[drakkenheimContamination] level. Success: Half damage only.

Suckered Bite.name: Suckered Bite
Suckered Bite.description: Charisma Saving Throw: DC 15, one creature within 5ft. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage and the target has the &reference[Bewildered] condition (save ends) and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] regains 10 (3d6) Hit Points. Success: Half damage only.

Suckered Bite.name: Suckered Bite
Suckered Bite.description: You are &reference[bewildered apply=false]. You can repeat your saving throw against this effect at the end of each of your turns, ending the effect on a success.

Plane Shift.name: Plane Shift
Plane Shift.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplPlaneShift]{[[lookup @item.name]]} targeting only itself, requiring no components and using Charisma as its spellcasting ability.

Siphon Spell.name: Siphon Spell
Siphon Spell.description: Trigger: A spell is cast by a creature within 60 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. Response: Intelligence Saving Throw: DC 14, that creature. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage and the spell fails, but no resources are expended by the spell's casting.

save.condition: When a creature casts a spell within 60 feet of the Interloper.

Teleport.name: Teleport
Teleport.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] teleports to an unoccupied space it can see within 30 feet.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes one [[/item .lUDLcxTxGGlv5EIe]] attack and one [[/item .B7QKiK7nUWxZiUYq]] attack. If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has used [[/item .aWDsfrYU9Ze9y7dh]] since the end of its last turn, it can instead make three Spindly Claw or Suckered Bite attacks.

Pack Tactics.name: Pack Tactics
Pack Tactics.description: 若[[lookup @name lowercase]]的攻击目标生物周围 5 尺范围内存在有至少一个未失能的盟友，则[[lookup @name lowercase]]对该生物进行的攻击检定具有优势。

Aberrant Traits.name: Aberrant Traits
Aberrant Traits.description:
Given the contamination and delerium present within the Space Between Worlds, all creatures who dwell there are the product of contamination and unaffected by the normal dangers of delerium. As an aberrant, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has the following traits:

  • Fully Contaminated. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is immune to &reference[drakkenheimContamination] and has Advantage on saving throws against contaminated spells. This creature may cast contaminated spells even though it does not gain Contamination levels.

  • Delerium Healing. As an action, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can touch a delerium shard to regain 10 (3d6) Hit Points. Once the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has used a delerium shard in this way, the shard can't be used in this manner again for 24 hours.

  • Alien Intellect. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is immune to any effect that would sense its emotions or read its thoughts, as well as any divination spell that it refuses. Wisdom (Insight) checks made to ascertain the [[lookup @name lowercase]]s intentions or sincerity have Disadvantage.

w1u9fBG1lGxN0H4f.name: Plane Shift
w1u9fBG1lGxN0H4f.description:
You and up to eight willing creatures who link hands in a circle are transported to a different plane of existence. You can specify a target destination in general terms, such as the City of Brass on the Elemental Plane of Fire or the palace of Dispater on the second level of the Nine Hells, and you appear in or near that destination, as determined by the DM.

Alternatively, if you know the sigil sequence of a teleportation circle on another plane of existence, this spell can take you to that circle. If the teleportation circle is too small to hold all the creatures you transported, they appear in the closest unoccupied spaces next to the circle.

Blood Frenzy.name: Blood Frenzy
Blood Frenzy.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Advantage on melee attack rolls against a creature with the &reference[Bloodied] condition.

Blood Shield.name: Blood Shield
Blood Shield.description: Whenever the [[lookup @name lowercase]] damages a creature that has blood, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] gains 15 Temporary Hit Points.

Morrigan's Fury.name: Morrigan's Fury
Morrigan's Fury.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] howls at the moon, gaining Resistance to all damage except Acid and Radiant damage for 1 minute or until it has the &reference[Incapacitated] condition. As part of this Bonus Action, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves up to half its Speed toward a Hostile creature without provoking Opportunity Attacks.

Morrigan's Fury.name: Morrigan's Fury
Morrigan's Fury.description: The Zealot of Morrigan has Resistance to all damage except Acid and Radiant damage for 1 minute or until it has the &reference[Incapacitated] condition.

Vampire Weaknesses.name: Vampire Weaknesses
Vampire Weaknesses.description:
As a vampire, this creature has the following weaknesses:

  • Forbiddance. The vampire can't enter a residence without an invitation from one of the occupants.

Searing Light.description: Constitution Saving Throw: DC 14, one creature the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within 30 feet. Searing Light.name: Searing Light

Radiant Flames.description: Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 14, each creature of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s choice in a 30-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. Guidance.name: 神导术
Guidance.description: You touch a willing creature and choose a skill. Until the spell ends, the creature adds 1d4 to any ability check using the chosen skill.

Light.name: Light
Light.description:
You touch one Large or smaller object that isn't being worn or carried by someone else. Until the spell ends, the object sheds Bright Light in a 20-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional 20 feet. The light can be colored as you like.

Covering the object with something opaque blocks the light. The spell ends if you cast it again.

Spare the Dying.name: 维生术
Spare the Dying.description:
选择一个生命值为 0 但还未死亡的生物，使该生物变为伤势稳定。

戏法强化：到达特定等级后，此法术的施法距离将翻倍：5 级（30 尺），11 级（60 尺），17 级（120 尺）。

Thaumaturgy.name: Thaumaturgy
Thaumaturgy.description:
You manifest a minor wonder within range. You create one of the effects below within range. If you cast this spell multiple times, you can have up to three of its 1-minute effects active at a time.

Altered Eyes. You alter the appearance of your eyes for 1 minute.

Booming Voice. Your voice booms up to three times as loud as normal for 1 minute. For the duration, you have Advantage on [[/check ability=cha skill=itm]] checks.

Fire Play. You cause flames to flicker, brighten, dim, or change color for 1 minute.

Invisible Hand. You instantaneously cause an unlocked door or window to fly open or slam shut.

Phantom Sound. You create an instantaneous sound that originates from a point of your choice within range, such as a rumble of thunder, the cry of a raven, or ominous whispers.

Tremors. You cause harmless tremors in the ground for 1 minute.

Bless.name: Bless
Bless.description:
You bless up to three creatures within range. Whenever a target makes an attack roll or a saving throw before the spell ends, the target adds 1d4 to the attack roll or save.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You can target one additional creature for each spell slot level above 1.

Blessed.name: 祝福
Blessed.description: 在法术终止前，每当你进行攻击检定或豁免检定时，都可以在检定结果中额外加入 1d4。

Healing Word.name: Healing Word
Healing Word.description:
A creature of your choice that you can see within range regains Hit Points equal to 2d4 plus your spellcasting ability modifier.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The healing increases by 2d4 for each spell slot level above 1.

Lesser Restoration.name: 次等复原术
Lesser Restoration.description: You touch a creature and end one condition on it: &Reference[blinded], &Reference[deafened], &Reference[paralyzed], or &Reference[poisoned].

Aid.name: Aid
Aid.description:
选择法术距离内至多三个生物。每个目标的生命值上限和当前生命值 在法术持续时间内提高 5 点。

升环施法：使用的法术位每比二环高一环，每个目标的生命值就额外提高 5 点。

Foundry Note

默认的“治疗”行为配置了多个动态效果，用以代表该法术所提供的临时最大生命值上限。

用户应根据施放该法术时所使用的法术位等级，应用相应的动态效果

Level 2: +5 Max HP.name: Level 2: +5 Max HP
Level 2: +5 Max HP.description: The target's Hit Point maximum is increased for the duration.

Level 3: +10 Max HP.description: The target's Hit Point maximum is increased for the duration.

Dispel Magic.name: 解除魔法
Dispel Magic.description:
在施法距离内指定一名生物、一个物件或一处魔法效应。所有影响该目标的三环或更低环阶法术即告终止。每个影响目标的四环或更高环阶法术都需要以你的施法属性进行一次属性检定（DC 10 + 目标法术环阶），检定成功时目标法术终止。

升环施法： 你直接终止影响目标的小于等于该施法环阶的法术效应。

Spirit Guardians.name: Spirit Guardians
Spirit Guardians.description:
在法术持续时间内，保护性的灵体环绕在你的周围 15 尺灵光范围内飞舞。如果你属于善良或中立阵营，则它们飘渺的身形看起来像是天使或妖精（由你选择）。如果你属于邪恶阵营，则它们将形如邪魔。

施展此法术时，你可以指定特定生物让其不受该法术影响。除此之外的生物在灵光区域内将受法术影响致速度被减半。当灵光进入一个生物的空间、一个生物进入灵光或在灵光内结束回合时，其必须进行一次感知豁免。豁免失败将受到 3d8 点光耀伤害（如果你属于善良或中立）或 3d8 点暗蚀伤害（如果你属于邪恶），豁免成功则只受到一半伤害。一名生物一回合仅需进行一次该豁免。

升环施法： 使用的法术位每比三环高一环，此法术的伤害就增加 1d8。

Half Speed.description: The creature's speed is halved while within the Emanation.

Animate Haze Husk.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] reanimates the corpse of a @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.uzeoZGIO0MULOG8a]{Haze Husk} it can see within 60 feet. The haze husk is revived with 5 Hit Points and immediately stands.

Constitution Saving Throw: DC 16, each creature in a 30-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target gains one Contamination level. Failure or Success: The explosion triggers a random Arcane Anomaly.

Earth Glide.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can burrow through nonmagical, unworked earth and stone. While doing so, the elemental doesn't disturb the material it moves through.

Shard Slam.name: Shard Slam
Shard Slam.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]]. Constitution Saving Throw: DC 16. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target gains one &reference[drakkenheimContamination] level.

Dual Minds.name: Dual Minds
Dual Minds.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Advantage on saving throws to avoid or end the &reference[Blinded apply=false], &reference[Charmed apply=false], &reference[Deafened apply=false], &reference[Frightened apply=false], &reference[Stunned apply=false], and &reference[Unconscious apply=false] conditions.

Telekinetic Grip.name: Telekinetic Grip
Telekinetic Grip.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] reaches out with its mind to hold one creature or object it can see within 120 feet of it in its psychic grasp. If the target is a creature, it is subjected to the following effect. Strength Saving Throw: DC 16. Failure: The target is moved up to 30 feet in any direction and has the &reference[Restrained] condition until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn or until the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has the &reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition.

If the target is an object weighing 300 pounds or less that isn't being worn or carried, it is telekinetically moved up to 30 feet in any direction. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can also exert fine control on objects with its telekinesis, such as manipulating a simple tool or opening a door or a container.

Telekinetic Grip.name: Telekinetic Grip
Telekinetic Grip.description: You are &reference[restrained apply=false] until the start of the cerebrograft's next turn, or until the cerebrograft has the &reference[incapacitated apply=false] condition.

Psychic Crush.description: Intelligence Saving Throw: DC 16, each creature in a 20-foot Emanation originating from the cerebrograft. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &reference[Dazed] condition (save ends). Failure by 5 or More: The target instead has the &reference[Stunned] condition (save ends). Success: Half damage only.

Psychic Crush: Dazed.name: Psychic Crush: Dazed
Psychic Crush: Dazed.description: 你处于&reference[dazed apply=false]状态。你可以在自己每一回合结束时重复进行针对此效应的豁免检定，成功则终止该效应。

Psychic Crush: Stunned.name: Psychic Crush: Stunned
Psychic Crush: Stunned.description: 你陷入&reference[震慑 apply=false]状态。你可以在自己每一回合结束时重复进行针对此效应的豁免检定，成功则终止该效应。

Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes two [[/item ZlHjLDPiPObTEOnN]] attacks and uses [[/item HACS20GLleq1dqbv]].

Haze Aura.description: A creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes [[/damage average]] damage.

Tail.description: Strength Saving Throw: DC 18, one creature within 20 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and if the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the &reference[Prone] condition.

Mage Hand.name: 法师之手
Mage Hand.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplMageHand00]{Mage Hand} using Charisma as the spellcasting ability. The hand created by the spell is &reference[invisible apply=false].

Aberrant Traits.name: Aberrant Traits
Aberrant Traits.description:
Given the contamination and delerium present within the Space Between Worlds, all creatures who dwell there are the product of contamination and unaffected by the normal dangers of delerium. As an aberrant, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has the following traits:

  • Fully Contaminated. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is immune to &reference[drakkenheimContamination] and has Advantage on saving throws against contaminated spells. This creature may cast contaminated spells even though it does not gain Contamination levels.

  • Delerium Healing. As an action, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can touch a delerium shard to regain 10 (3d6) Hit Points. Once the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has used a delerium shard in this way, the shard can't be used in this manner again for 24 hours.

  • Alien Intellect. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is immune to any effect that would sense its emotions or read its thoughts, as well as any divination spell that it refuses. Wisdom (Insight) checks made to ascertain the [[lookup @name lowercase]]s intentions or sincerity have Disadvantage.

Epic Boss.name: 史诗 Boss
Epic Boss.description:
This creature is an Epic Boss, a unique foe designed to pose a solo threat to an entire adventuring party. As such, it has additional game rules that sets it apart from normal creatures:

The [[lookup @name lowercase]] always takes their turn on Initiative count 20. On their turn, they can use their movement and interaction as normal. However, they do not take an action or Bonus Action on their turn unless forced to do so by a spell or other effect. Instead, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes one of the following Epic Actions at the end of each player character's turn.

All this creature's actions are Epic Actions.

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.xw0LdSvseQHlNbq2.Item.HmP8BXCCpkszqkKs]{Bite}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.xw0LdSvseQHlNbq2.Item.ve5esAhbMtwbXkV3]{Contaminated Rend}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.xw0LdSvseQHlNbq2.Item.9TbgdBXtzNkmDtBX]{Mage Hand}

Epic Boss.description:
This creature is an Epic Boss, a unique foe designed to pose a solo threat to an entire adventuring party. As such, it has additional game rules that sets it apart from normal creatures.

The creature always takes their turn on Initiative count 20. On their turn, they can use their movement and interaction as normal. However, they do not take an action or Bonus Action on their turn unless forced to do so by a spell or other effect. Instead, the creature takes one of the Epic Actions they have available.

Epic Resistance.name: Epic Resistance
Epic Resistance.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] chooses one condition, spell, or other effect currently affecting them and rolls [[/r 1d20]]. On an 11 or higher, the effect ends on them. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can use this Epic Action even if they would otherwise be unable to take actions, their actions are being controlled by another creature, or if a spell or effect alters their game statistics.

Octarine Breath.name: Octarine Breath
Octarine Breath.description: Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 18, each creature in a 30-foot Cone. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage. Success: Half damage.

Dimension Hop.name: Dimension Hop
Dimension Hop.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] teleports to an unoccupied space it can see within 30 feet.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and if the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the &reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC 18). While Grappled, the target has the &reference[Restrained] condition.

Grappled by Bite.name: Grappled by Bite
Grappled by Bite.description: You are &reference[grappled apply=false] (escape DC 18). While grappled in this way, you are also &reference[restrained apply=false].

Contaminated Rend.name: Contaminated Rend
Contaminated Rend.description: Constitution Saving Throw: DC 15, one creature within 5 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target gains one &reference[drakkenheimContamination] level.

hAKIfRWYqeTWiOjf.name: 法师之手
hAKIfRWYqeTWiOjf.description:
一只漂浮的幽灵手出现在施法距离内你指定的一点。幽灵手持续存在至法术终止。如果幽灵手距你的距离超过 30 尺，或者当你再次施展了该法术时，则现存的幽灵手消失不见。

你可以在施展该法术时使用幽灵手实施一个行为：你可以操控一个物件，或者打开一扇未上锁的门或容器，或者将一件物品放入或取出一个打开的容器，或者将小瓶中的内容物倾倒出来。

在后续的回合中，以一个魔法动作，你可以控制幽灵手再次实施一个行为。作为那个动作的一部分，你可以令幽灵手移动至多 30 尺。

该幽灵手不能攻击，也不能激活魔法物品或承载超过 10 磅重的物质。

Invisibility.name: Invisibility
Invisibility.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplInvisibili]{Invisibility} on itself, requiring no spell components and using Wisdom as the spell-casting ability.

Reel.name: Reel
Reel.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] pulls each creature &reference[Grappled apply=false] by it up to 25 feet straight toward it.

utility.target: A creature grappled by the hulk.

egDNcl7tDKV2B6Tm.name: Invisibility
egDNcl7tDKV2B6Tm.description:
A creature you touch has the &Reference[invisible apply=false] condition until the spell ends. The spell ends early immediately after the target makes an attack roll, deals damage, or casts a spell.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You can target one additional creature for each spell slot level above 2.

Invisible.name: Invisible
Invisible.description: The spell ends early immediately after the target makes an attack roll, deals damage, or casts a spell.

Lashing Tendrils.name: Lashing Tendrils
Lashing Tendrils.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]]. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, the target has the &reference[Grappled] condition (escape DC 16). The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can grapple up to two creatures at once.

Grappled by Lashing Tendrils.name: Grappled by Lashing Tendrils
Grappled by Lashing Tendrils.description: You are &reference[grappled apply=false] (escape DC 16) by the creature.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes two [[/item sIIg5jfIJhjvQXOM]] attacks and one [[/item HKi2TVP6vHdmpp1P]] attack.

Protective Aura.name: Protective Aura
Protective Aura.description: A creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of [[lookup @name]] takes [[/damage average]] damage.

damage.condition: When a creature starts their turn within 30 feet of Minazorond.

Construct Resilience.name: Construct Resilience
Construct Resilience.description: If damage reduces [[lookup @name]] to 0 Hit Points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 plus the damage taken, unless the damage is Radiant or from a Critical Hit. On a success, [[lookup @name]] drops to 1 Hit Point instead.

save.condition: When damage other than Radiant or from a Critical Hit reduces the creature to 0 hit point.

Tail.name: Tail
Tail.description: Strength Saving Throw: DC 22, one creature [[lookup @name]] can see within 20 feet. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and if the target is Medium or smaller, it has the &reference[Prone] condition.

Shocking Burst.name: Shocking Burst
Shocking Burst.description: Wisdom Saving Throw: DC 20, one target [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within 120 feet. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &reference[Shocked] condition. Success: Half damage only.

Terrifying Roar.name: Terrifying Roar
Terrifying Roar.description: Wisdom Saving Throw: DC 20, each creature in a 120-foot Emanation originating from [[lookup @name]] that can hear it. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &reference[Frightened] condition (save ends).

Breathe Deep.name: Breathe Deep
Breathe Deep.description: [[lookup @name]]'s Breath Weapon recharges. [[lookup @name]] can only use this Epic Action if it's the first Epic Action it has taken this round.

Breath Weapon.name: Breath Weapon
Breath Weapon.description:
[[lookup @name]] uses one of its breath weapons. It can only use this Epic Action if it's the last Epic Action it takes this round.

Lightning Breath. Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 22, each creature in a 120-foot Cone. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &reference[Shocked] condition. Success: Half damage.

Thunder Breath. Constitution Saving Throw: DC 22, each creature in a 120-foot Cone. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target is pushed 20 feet away from [[lookup @name lowercase]] and has the Dazed condition (save ends). Failure by 5 or More: Double damage, and the target also has the &reference[Deafened] condition (save ends). Success: Half damage only.

Draconic Rebuke.name: Draconic Rebuke
Draconic Rebuke.description: Trigger: [[lookup @name]] becomes &reference[Bloodied]. It can use this Reaction even if it has the &reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition or is otherwise unable to take Reactions. Response: All conditions and spells on [[lookup @name]] immediately end unless it chooses to be affected by them, and it can fly up to its Speed without provoking Opportunity Attacks and ignoring &reference[DifficultTerrain]. [[lookup @name]] recharges and immediately uses its Terrifying Roar.

utility.condition: When Minazorond becomes Bloodied.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and if the target is Medium or smaller, it has the &reference[Grappled] condition (escape DC 17). While Grappled, the target has the &reference[Restrained] condition.

Grappled by Bite.name: Grappled by Bite
Grappled by Bite.description: You are &reference[grappled apply=false] (escape DC 17). While grappled in this way, you are also &reference[restrained apply=false].

Epic Resistance.name: Epic Resistance
Epic Resistance.description: [[lookup @name]]选选择一个正影响其的状态、法术或其他效应，并投掷[[/r 1d20]]。若结果为 11 或更高，其身上的该效应终止。即使[[lookup @name]]无法执行动作、被其他生物控制动作或被法术或效应改变其游戏数据卡，其也可以执行该动作。

Epic Boss.name: 史诗 Boss
Epic Boss.description:
This creature is an Epic Boss, a unique foe designed to pose a solo threat to an entire adventuring party. As such, it has additional game rules that sets it apart from normal creatures:

[[lookup @name]] always takes their turn on Initiative count 20. On their turn, they can use their movement and interaction as normal. However, they do not take an action or Bonus Action on their turn unless forced to do so by a spell or other effect. Instead, [[lookup @name]] takes one of the following Epic Actions at the end of each player character's turn.

All this creature's actions are Epic Actions.

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.yDK41qn8pudLTPYc.Item.cufrgh30u7FwYybR]{Bite}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.yDK41qn8pudLTPYc.Item.XwDErEnjpdskiS6i]{Claw}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.yDK41qn8pudLTPYc.Item.sPZF8SUrGiBgTiz0]{Tail}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.yDK41qn8pudLTPYc.Item.qIbcXLBcV5ylKMAN]{Shocking Burst}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.yDK41qn8pudLTPYc.Item.5JoD6XtmRPiROYXy]{Terrifying Roar}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.yDK41qn8pudLTPYc.Item.SKpngTRISLg75psq]{Breathe Deep}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.yDK41qn8pudLTPYc.Item.sNv2aoHYNrMvMjon]{Breath Weapon}

  • @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-monsters.monsters.Actor.yDK41qn8pudLTPYc.Item.OBTjwGqIjAAKXSIy]{Epic Resistance}

Magic Resistance.name: Magic Resistance
Magic Resistance.description: [[lookup @name]]为抵抗法术和其它魔法效应而作的豁免检定具有优势。

Warding Aura.name: Warding Aura
Warding Aura.description: [[lookup @name]] projects a 30-foot Emanation of warding magic. The first time on each turn that a creature within the Emanation deals damage or casts a spell on [[lookup @name]], that creature takes [[/damage average]] damage and is pushed 10 feet away from [[lookup @name]].

Teleport.name: Teleport
Teleport.description: [[lookup @name]] teleports to an unoccupied space he can see within 60 feet.

Chain Lightning.name: Chain Lightning
Chain Lightning.description: [[lookup @name]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplChainLight], using the spellcasting ability in Spellcasting.

Dispel Magic.name: 解除魔法
Dispel Magic.description: [[lookup @name]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplDispelMagi], using the spellcasting ability in Spellcasting.

Spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
Spellcasting.description:
[[lookup @name]] casts one of the following spells, using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 21, +13 to spell attacks):

At Will: Mage Armor, Mage Hand, Sending

2/Day Each: Arcane Hand ([[lookup @name]] may use an Epic Action to control the hand once per round), Banishment, Dimension Door, Ice Storm, Lightning Bolt, Scrying, Wall of Force

Greater Spellcasting.name: Greater Spellcasting
Greater Spellcasting.description:
[[lookup @name]] casts one of the following spells, using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 21, +13 to spell attacks):

1/Day Each: Forcecage, Globe of Invulnerability, Maze, Prismatic Spray, Prismatic Wall, Teleport

Academy Rings.name: Academy Rings
Academy Rings.description: River can cast a spell they know without expending a use of it.

Counterspell.name: Counterspell
Counterspell.description: [[lookup @name]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplCounterspe]{Counterspell} in response to that spell’s trigger, using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability.

S7T82zbsY19sIQOD.condition: 当你看见范围内一名生物施展一道法术时执行

DqNS8XJLauhOhPn0.name: Counterspell
DqNS8XJLauhOhPn0.description: 你试图打断一名正在施法的生物。该生物进行一次体质豁免。豁免失败则法术消散且毫无效果，并且用于施展法术的动作、附赠动作或反应随之浪费。如果那道法术是使用法术位施展的，则法术位并不会被消耗。

changes.system.activation: {"type":"reaction","condition":"when you see a creature within range casting a spell with Verbal, Somatic, or Material components"}

Robe of the Archmagi.name: 大法师法袍
Robe of the Archmagi.description:
奇物，传说（需术士、魔契师或法师同调）

这件典雅的长袍由精美的布料制成，并以符文装饰。

着装此长袍时，你获得下列增益：

护甲。若你未着装护甲，你的基础护甲等级为 15 + 你的敏捷调整值。

魔法抗性。 你对抗法术和其他魔法效应进行的豁免检定具有优势。

战争法师。 你的法术豁免DC和法术攻击加值均提升 2。

Foundry Note

大法师护甲激活效应将设定你的护甲等级（AC），若你仍着装护甲则应禁用该效应。

战争法师激活效应会自动提升你的法术豁免DC与法术攻击加值。

Staff of Power.name: Staff of Power
Staff of Power.description:
@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbafcStaffalsoa]{Staff}, Very Rare (Requires Attunement by a Sorcerer, Warlock, or Wizard)

This staff has 20 charges and can be wielded as a magic Quarterstaff that grants a +2 bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls made with it. While holding it, you gain a +2 bonus to Armor Class, saving throws, and spell attack rolls.

Spells. While holding the staff, you can cast one of the spells on the following table from it, using your spell save DC. The table indicates how many charges you must expend to cast the spell.

Spell Cost Table

Spell

Charge Cost

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplConeofCold]{Cone of Cold}

5

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplFireball00]{Fireball} (level 5 version)

5

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplGlobeofInv]{Globe of Invulnerability}

6

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplHoldMonste]{Hold Monster}

5

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplLevitate00]{Levitate}

2

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplLightningB]{Lightning Bolt} (level 5 version)

5

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplMagicMissi]{Magic Missile}

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplRayofEnfee]{Ray of Enfeeblement}

1
